original: Peṭakopadesa
analyzed: peṭaka upadesa

original: Hārasampātabhūmi
analyzed: hāra sampāta bhūmi

original: Yāni cattāri jhānāni, tesaṁ jhānānaṁ imāni aṅgāni, tesaṁ aṅgānaṁ samūho assa aṅgā, ayaṁ jhānabhūmi ko visesoti assa viseso.
analyzed: yāni cattāri jhānāni tesam jhānānam imāni aṅgāni tesam aṅgānam samūhaḥ assa aṅgāḥ ayam jhāna bhūmi kaḥ visesaḥ ti assa visesaḥ

original: Ime sambhārā tehi ayaṁ samudāgamo, tassa samudāgamassa ayaṁ upanisā, tāya upanisāya ayaṁ bhāvanā.
analyzed: ime sambhārā tehi ayam samudāgamaḥ tassa samudāgamassa ayam upanisā tāya upanisāya ayam bhāvanā

original: Tassā bhāvanāya ayaṁ ādīnavo.
analyzed: tassā bhāvanāya ayaṃ ādīnavaḥ

original: Tena ayaṁ parihāni.
analyzed: tena ayam

original: Kassa parihānīti tadupagajjhāyino.
analyzed: kassa

original: Taṁ yathā bhaṇitaṁ paccavekkhanto ayaṁ viseso.
analyzed: tam yathā bhaṇitam paccavekkhantaḥ ayam visesaḥ

original: Tena visesena ayaṁ assādo, so kassa assādo ajhāniyā jhāyino, tassā ajhāniyā jhāyino,
analyzed: tena visesena ayaṃ assādaḥ so kassa assādaḥ ajhāniyāḥ jhāyino tassāḥ ajhāniyāḥ jhāyino

original: idaṁ kallitā kosalle ṭhitajjhānaṁ anomaddiyataṁ gacchati jhānabalaṁ, jhānabale ṭhitassa
analyzed: idam kallitā kosalle ṭhita jhānam anomaddiyatam gacchati jhāna bala jhāna bale ṭhitassa

original: ayaṁ pāramippattassa imāni jhānaṅgāni anāvilasaṅkappo paṭhame jhāne jhānaṅgāni bhāvī.
analyzed: ayam pārami pattassa imāni jhāna aṅgāni anāvila saṅkappaḥ paṭhame jhāne jhāna aṅgāni bhāvī

original: So pīti tadanusārittāva paṭhame jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ tassaṅguno ca dhammā tadabhisannitāya ca.
analyzed: paṭhame jhāne ca dhammā tad abhisannitāya ca

original: Pīti dutiye jhāne jhānaṅgadhammatā kho pana tathā pavattassa sahagataṁ jhānaṅgadhammaṁ
analyzed: pi iti dutiye jhāne jhāna aṅga dhamma tā kho pana tathā pavattassa sahagatam jhāna aṅga dhamma

original: sasukhatāya ajjhattaṁ sampasādo dutiye jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ manosampasādanatāya tadabhisannitāya ca.
analyzed: sa sukha tāya ajjhattam sampasādaḥ dutiye jhāne jhān aṅgam manaḥ sampasādana tāya tad abhisannitāya ca

original: Pīti dutiye jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ samādhitā pīti dutiye jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ,
analyzed: pīti dutiye jhāne jhāna aṅgam ajjhattam sampasādanam samādhi tā pīti dutiye jhāne jhāna aṅga

original: cetaso ekodibhāvo dutiye jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ, upekkhā phassatā tatiye jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ,
analyzed: cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvaḥ dutiye jhāne jhāna aṅgaḥ upekkhā phassa tā tatiye jhāne jhāna aṅga

original: sukhaṁ tassa aṅganti ca.
analyzed: sukham tassa aṅganti ca

original: Cetaso ekodibhāvo catutthe jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ, upekkhā adukkhamasukhā catutthe jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ, abhinisābhūmi upekkhāsatipārisuddhi catutthe jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvo catutthe jhāne jhāna aṅga upekkhā adukkham asukhā catutthe jhāne jhāna aṅga abhinisā bhūmi upekkhā sati pārisuddhi catutthe jhāne jhāna aṅga

original: Satipārisuddhi ca anekajjhānabhūmīsu jhānaṅgasamāyuttā pīti cetaso ekodibhāvo catutthe jhāne jhānaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: ca aneka ajjhāna bhūmīsu jhāna aṅga samāyuttā pīti cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvo catutthe jhāne jhāna aṅga

original: Tattha katamā jhānabhūmi?
analyzed: tattha katamā jhāna bhūmi

original: Savitakke savicāre vivekā anugatā paṭhame jhāne jhānabhūmi.
analyzed: sa vitakke sa vicāre vivekā anugatā paṭhame jhāne jhāna bhūmi

original: Avitakke avicāre ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ janitaṁ pītimanugatā dutiye jhāne jhānabhūmi.
analyzed: a vitakke a vicāre ajjhattam sampasādanam janitam pītim anugatāḥ dutiye jhāne jhāna bhūmi

original: Sukhasātasamohitā sappītikā tatiye jhāne jhānabhūmi.
Tassa sukhadukkhasahagatā abhinīhārasahagatā catutthe jhāne jhānabhūmi.
analyzed: tassa sukha dukkha sahagatā abhinīhāra sahagatā catutthe jhāne jhāna bhūmi

original: Appamāṇasahagatā sattārammaṇā paṭhame jhāne jhānabhūmi.
analyzed: appamāṇa sahagatā satta ārammaṇā paṭhame jhāne jhāna bhūmi

original: Abhibhūmiāyatanasahagatā rūpasaññīsu dutiye jhāne jhānabhūmi.
analyzed: abhibhūmi āyatana sahagatā rūpa saññīsu dutiye jhāne jhāna bhūmi

original: Vimokkhasahagatānaṁ vimokkhesu tatiye jhāne jhānabhūmi.
analyzed: vimokkha sahagatānam vimokkhesu tatiye jhāne jhāna bhūmi

original: Anupassanāsahagatā kāyasaṅkhārā sammā catutthassa jhānassa bhūmi.
analyzed: anupassanā sahagatā kāya saṅkhārā sammā catutthassa jhānassa bhūmi

original: Tattha katame jhānavisesā?
analyzed: tattha katame jhāna visesā

original: Vivicceva kāmehi vivicca pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi cittacetasikasahagatā kāmadhātusamatikkamanatāpi, ayaṁ jhānaviseso.
analyzed: vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi citta cetasika sahagatā kāmadhātu samatikkamana tā api ayam jhāna visesaḥ

original: Avitakkā ceva avicārā ca sappītikāya satisahagatāya pītisahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
analyzed: a vitakkā ca iva a vicārā ca sa pītikāya sati sahagatāya pīti sahagatā saññā manasikārā samudācaranti

original: Ayaṁ jhānaviseso.
analyzed: ayam jhāna visesaḥ

original: Avitakkāya bhūmiyā avicāreyeva sati anugatā upekkhāsahagatā manasikārā samudācaranti.
analyzed: a vitakkāya bhūmiyā a vicāreya iva sati anugatāḥ upekkhā sahagatāḥ manasikārā samudācaranti

original: Tadanudhammatāya ca sati saṇḍahati.
analyzed: ca sati saṇḍahati

original: Tañca bhūmiṁ upasampajja viharati, ayaṁ jhānaviseso.
analyzed: tat ca bhūmim upasampajja viharati ayam jhāna visesaḥ

original: Satipārisuddhisahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, tañca bhūmiṁ upasampajja viharati, ayaṁ jhānaviseso.
analyzed: sati pārisuddhi sahagatā saññā manasikārā samudācaranti tat ca bhūmim upasampajja viharati ayam jhāna viseso

original: Viññāṇañcāyatanasahagatāya bhūmiyaṁ ākiñcaññāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, tañca bhūmiṁ upasampajja viharati, ayaṁ jhānaviseso.
analyzed: viññāṇañca āyatana sahagatāya bhūmiyam ākiñcaññāyatana sahagatā saññā manasikārā samudācaranti tat ca bhūmim upasampajja viharati ayam jhāna viseso

original: Jhānasambhārā nekkhammavitakko sambhāro kāmavitakkavinodanādhippāyatā.
analyzed: jhāna sambhārāḥ nekkhamma vitakko sambhāro kāma vitakka vinodana adhippāya tā

original: Abyāpādavitakko sambhāro byāpādavitakkapaṭivinodanādhippāyatā.
analyzed: a byāpāda vitakko sambhāraḥ byāpāda vitakka paṭivinodana adhippāya tā

original: Avihiṁsāvitakko sambhāro vihiṁsāvitakkapaṭivinodanādhippāyatā.
analyzed: a vihisā vitakko sambhāraḥ vihisā vitakka paṭivinodana adhippāya tā

original: Indriyesu guttadvāratā appicchatā sambhāro parisuddhājīvo catunnaṁ samāpattīnaṁ sambhāro akammassa vihāritā.
analyzed: indriyesu gutta dvāra tā appiccha tā sambhāraḥ parisuddha ājīvaḥ catunnam samāpattīnam sambhāraḥ akammassa vihāri tā

original: Maggasambhāro samāpattipajjanatā.
analyzed: magga sambhāraḥ samāpatti pajjana tā

original: Phalasambhāro jhānanibbattitāya jhānasamudāgamo.
analyzed: phala sambhāraḥ jhāna nibbatti tāya jhāna samudāgamaḥ

original: Kusalahetu yaṁ jhānaṁ samudayaṁ gacchanti ko ca na kutoci nekkhammappattā samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: kusala hetu yam jhānam samudayam gacchanti kaḥ ca na kutoci nekkhamma pattā samudāgacchanti

original: Ālambanirodhasamādhi santo samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: ālamba nirodha samādhi santaḥ samudāgacchanti

original: Avītikkantā samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: a vītikkantā samudāgacchanti

analyzed: sukha indriyam somanass indriyam pahānāya te ca a byāpajjatāya samudāgacchanti

original: Taṁ pana sandhāya samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: tam pana sandhāya samudāgacchanti

original: Aparidāhanāya samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: a paridāhanāya samudāgacchanti

original: Ayaṁ ñāṇasamudāgamo.
analyzed: ayam ñāṇa samudāgamaḥ

original: Tattha katamā upanisā?
analyzed: tattha katamā upanisā

analyzed: kalyāṇa mitta tā jhānassa upanisā

original: Kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā jhānassa upanisā.
analyzed: kalyāṇa sampavaṅka tā jhānassa upanisā

original: Indriyesu guttadvāratā jhānassa upanisā.
analyzed: indriyesu gutta dvāra tā jhānassa upanisā

analyzed: asantuṭṭhitā kusalesu dhammesu jhānassa upanisā

original: Saddhammassavanaṁ jhānassa upanisā.
analyzed: saddhammassavanam jhānassa upanisā

analyzed: savejaniye ṭhāne saviggassa padhāna

analyzed: ayam jhāna upanisā

original: Tattha katamā bhāvanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā bhāvanā

original: Mettāsevanā abyāpādavitakkabhāvanā.
analyzed: mettā sevanā a byāpāda vitakka bhāvanā

original: Karuṇāsevanā avihiṁsāvitakkabhāvanā.
analyzed: karuṇā sevanā a vihisā vitakka bhāvanā

original: Muditābhāvanā pītisukhasampajaññā kāritā.
analyzed: muditā bhāvanā pīti sukha sampajaññā kāritā

analyzed: upekkhā bhāvanā passava tā upekkhā bhāvanā apassava tā upekkhā ca ajjhupekkhā ca asubha saññā bhāvanā

analyzed: dukkha apaṭipadā dandha abhiññā bhava sandhā abhiññā bhava sandhāna sā chabbidhā bhāvanā
