analyzed: bhāvitā bahulīkatā anuṭṭhitā vatthukatā yānīkatā paricitā su samāraddhā

original: Ayaṁ bhāvanā.
analyzed: ayam bhāvanā

original: Evaṁ bhāvayantassa ayaṁ ādīnavo.
analyzed: evam bhāvayantassa ayam ādīnavaḥ

original: Paṭhame jhāne saṅkhārasamannāgato eso dhammo assuto sāsavo.
analyzed: paṭhame jhāne saṅkhāra samannāgato eso dhammo assutaḥ sa āsavaḥ

original: Sace esa dhammo ayaṁ sīlo āsannapaṭipakkho ca esa dhammo kāmo paticāro pativicāro samāpattīnaṁ ca sabboḷāriko esa dhammo vitakkavicāro ca.
analyzed: sace esa dhammo ayam sīlaḥ āsanna paṭipakkho ca esa dhammo kāmo paticāro pativicāro samāpattīnam ca sabboḷārikaḥ esa dhammo vitakka vicāro ca

original: Tattha cittaṁ khobhenti, kāyo cettha kilamati, kāyamhi cettha kilante cittaṁ vihaññati.
analyzed: tattha cittam khobhenti kāyo ca ittha kilamati kāyamhi ca ittha kilante cittam vihaññati

original: Anabhinīhārakkhamova abhiññānaṁ ime ādīnavā paṭhame jhāne.
analyzed: an abhinīhāra khamaḥ va abhiññānam ime ādīnavāḥ paṭhame jhāne

original: Dutiye jhāne ime ādīnavā pītipharaṇasahagato ca eso dhammo, na samudācārasseti cittaṁ.
analyzed: dutiye jhāne ime ādīnavā pīti pharaṇa sahagato ca eso dhammo na samudācārassa iti citta

original: Asodhayaṁ upagamo cesa dhammo upagamiparissayo domanassapaccatthiko cesa dhammo.
analyzed: a sodhayam upagamaḥ ca isa dhammo upagami parissayo domanassa paccatthiko ca isa dhammo

original: Tattha tattha yuttīnaṁ pīti parajjato cesa dhammo dukkaraṁ hoti, avattasantāsabhūmiparivajjayanto
analyzed: tattha tattha yuttīnam pīti parajjataḥ ca isa dhammo dukkaram hoti avatta santāsa bhūmi parivajjayanto

original: catūsu dukkhatāsu esa dhammo anuviddhāpanasaddhāya dukkhatāya ca na palibodhadukkhatāya
analyzed: catūsu dukkha tāsu esa dhammo anuviddha āpana saddhāya dukkha tāya ca na palibodha dukkha tāya

original: ca abhiññādukkhatāya ca rogadukkhatāya ca, ime ādīnavā dutiye jhāne.
analyzed: ca abhiññā dukkha tāya ca roga dukkha tāya ca ime ādīnavāḥ dutiye jhāne

original: Tattha katame ādīnavā tatiye jhāne?
analyzed: tattha katame ādīnavāḥ tatiye jhāne

original: Upekkhāsukhasahagatāya tattha sātāvīnaṁ pañcannaṁ upekkhāsukhaṁ parivattito esa dhammo tena niccasaññitānañca yaṁ hoti.
analyzed: upekkhā sukha sahagatāya tattha sātāvīnam pañcannam upekkhā sukham esa dhammo tena nicca saññitānam ca yam hoti

original: Dukkhopaniyaṁ sukhaṁ cittassa saṅkhobhataṁ upādāya sukhadukkhāya gato savati.
analyzed: dukkha upaniyam sukham cittassa saṅkhobhataṃ upādāya sukha dukkhāya gataḥ savati

original: Sukhadukkhānukatañca upādāya anabhihārakkhamaṁ cittaṁ hoti.
analyzed: sukha dukkha anukatañca upādāya an abhihāra kkhamam cittam hoti

original: Abhiññāya sacchikiriyāsu sabbepi cete dhammā tīsu jhānasamāpattīsu catūhi ca dukkhatāhi
analyzed: abhiññāya sacchikiriyāsu sabbe pi ca ete dhammā tīsu jhāna samāpattīsu catūhi ca dukkha tāhi

original: anuviddhānaṁ sā bhayā dukkhatāya palibodhadukkhatāya ca abhiññāya dukkhatāya ca ime
analyzed: anuviddhānam sā bhayā dukkha tāya palibodha dukkha tāya ca abhiññāya dukkha tāya ca ime

original: ādīnavā tatiye jhāne.
analyzed: ādīnavā tatiye jhāne

original: Tattha katame ādīnavā catutthe jhāne?
analyzed: tattha katame ādīnavā catutthe jhāne

original: Ākiñcaññāsamāpattikā te dhammānusamāpattikā etissā ca bhūmiyaṁ sātānaṁ bālaputhujjanānaṁ anekavidhāni diṭṭhigatāni uppajjanti.
analyzed: ākiñcaññā samāpattikā te dhamma anusamāpattikā etissā ca bhūmiyam sātānam bāla puthujjanānam anekavidhāni diṭṭhi gatāni uppajjanti

original: Oḷārikā sukhumehi ca rūpasaññāhi anuvidhāni etāni jhānāni sadā anudayamettājhānakalānudanukalāya
analyzed: oḷārikā su khumehi ca rūpa saññāhi anuvidhāni etāni jhānāni sadā

original: sādhāraṇā, dukkarā ca sabbe cattāro mahāsambhārā samudāgatāni ca etāni jhānāni aññamaññaṁ
analyzed: sādhāraṇā dukkarā ca sabbe cattāro mahāsambhārā samudāgatāni ca etāni jhānāni

original: nissāya samudāgacchanti.
analyzed: nissāya samudāgacchanti

original: Ettha samudāgatā ca ete dhammā na samattā honti.
analyzed: ettha samudāgatā ca ete dhammā na samattāḥ honti

original: Asamuggahitanimittā ca ete dhammā parihāyanti.
analyzed: a samuggahita nimittā ca ete dhammā parihāyanti

original: Nirujjhanti ca ete dhammā na upādiyanti nirujjhaṅgāni ca, etesaṁ dhammānaṁ jhānāni nimittāni na jhānanimittasaññā vokirati.
analyzed: nirujjhanti ca ete dhammā na upādiyanti nirujjhaṅgāni ca etesam dhammānam jhānāni nimittāni na jhāna nimitta saññā vokirati

original: Appaṭiladdhapubbā ca jhāyīvasena ca bhavati.
analyzed: a paṭiladdha pubbā ca jhāyī vasena ca bhavati

original: Imehi ādīnavehi ayaṁ jhānaparihāni.
analyzed: imehi ādīnavehi ayam

original: Nirodhasamāpattiyā apaṭisaṅkhāya avasesasaññino ākiñcaññāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti, so nirodhasamāpattito parihāyati.
analyzed: nirodha samāpattiyāḥ a paṭisaṅkhāya avasesa saññinaḥ ākiñcaññāyatana sahagatā saññā manasikārā samudācaranti saḥ nirodha samāpattitaḥ parihāyati

original: Āneñjasaññino asaññāyatanaṁ samāpannassa ākiñcaññāyatanasahagatā manasikārā samudācaranti, tañca bhūmiṁ na pajānāti, so tato parihāyati.
analyzed: āneñja saññinaḥ asaññāyatanam samāpannassa ākiñcaññāyatana sahagatāḥ manasikārāḥ samudācaranti tat ca bhūmim na pajānāti saḥ tatas parihāyati

original: Ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpannassa viññāṇañcāyatanasaññā manasikārā samudācaranti, tañca bhūmiṁ na pajānāti, so tato parihāyati.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatanam samāpannassa viññāṇañca āyatana saññāḥ manasikārā samudācaranti tat ca bhūmim na pajānāti saḥ tatas parihāyati

original: Viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samāpannassa rūpasaññāsahagatā.
analyzed: viññāṇam ca āyatanam samāpannassa rūpa saññā sahagatā

original: Vitthārena …pe…
analyzed: vitthārena pe

original: yāva paṭhame jhāne kāmasaññāsahagatā kātabbā.
analyzed: yāva paṭhame jhāne kāma saññā sahagatā kātabbā

original: Sakassa parihāyati, kalaṅkajjhāne kalaṅkaṁ jhāyati, parisamantato jhāyati, bhindanto jhāyati, na sajjhāyati, āyūhanto jhāyati, kiñci ca niparicito jhāyati.
analyzed: sakassa parihāyati kalaṅkajjhāne kalaṅkam jhāyati parisamantataḥ jhāyati bhindantaḥ jhāyati na sajjhāyati āyūhantaḥ jhāyati kiñci ca niparicitaḥ jhāyati

original: Atividhāvanto jhāyati, atimaññanto jhāyati, kāyasaṅkhāre appaṭisambhāre jhāyati,
analyzed: atividhāvantaḥ jhāyati atimaññantaḥ jhāyati kāya saṅkhāre appaṭisambhāre jhāyati

original: pariyuṭṭhānassa nissaraṇaṁ ajānanto jhāyati, nīvaraṇābhibhūto jhāyati, assāpattimanasikaronto
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhānassa nissaraṇam a jānantaḥ jhāyati nīvaraṇa abhibhūtaḥ jhāyati assa āpatti manasikarontaḥ

original: jhānassa assādo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṁ pahānaṁ jhānassa assādo kāmarāgahetūnaṁ dhammānaṁ
analyzed: jhānassa assādaḥ kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhānam pahānam jhānassa assādaḥ kāma rāga hetūnam dhammānaṃ

original: udayanti, nirujjhaṅgāni etesaṁ dhammānaṁ jhānāni uparimā sukhupekkhā kāmakammakilesānaṁ
analyzed: udayanti nirujjhaṅgāni etesam dhammānam jhānāni uparimā sukha upekkhā kāma kamma kilesāna

original: pahānaṁ assādo, evaṁ kho puna jhānassa assādo mahāsaṁvāsamappīḷite lokasannivāse
analyzed: pahānam assādaḥ evam kho puna jhānassa assādaḥ mahā savāsamappīḍite loka sannivāse

original: asambodhokāsā vigamessamidaṁ jhānappahānā.
analyzed: a sambodha ukāsā vigamessam idam jhāna pahānā

original: Ayaṁ palirodhamappalirodhalokasannivāse esanidhamidaṁ jhānaṁ anamataggasaṁsārasamāpannānaṁ
analyzed: ayam palirodham appalirodha loka sannivāse idam jhānam

original: sattānaṁ saṁsārappahānanā ānisaṁso, yamidaṁ jhānassa assādo kāyassa ajhāniyajhāyino bhavati.
analyzed: sattānam sasāra ppahānanā ānisasaḥ yam idam jhānassa assādaḥ kāyassa a jhāniya jhāyinaḥ bhavati

original: Ajhāniyajhāniyajhāyīhi aparāmasanto ajhāniyajhāyitaṁ jhāyati, yāni kalaṅkajjhāyino padāni, tāni anudhitāni paṭipakkhe.
analyzed: a jhāniya jhāniya jhāyīhi a parāmasantaḥ a jhāniya jhāyitam jhāyati yāni kalaṅka jhāyinaḥ padāni tāni anudhitāni paṭipakkhe

original: Tattha katamaṁ jhānakosallaṁ?
analyzed: tattha katamam jhānakosalla

original: Samāpattikosallaṁ jhānakosallaṁ, jhānavisesakosallaṁ jhānakosallaṁ, jhānantarikakosallaṁ
analyzed: samāpatti kosallam jhāna kosalla jhāna visesa kosallam jhāna kosalla jhānantarika kosalla

original: jhānakosallaṁ, samāpattivuṭṭhānakosallaṁ jhānakosallaṁ, jhāne sabhāvakosallaṁ jhānakosallaṁ,
analyzed: jhāna kosalla samāpatti vuṭṭhāna kosallam jhāna kosalla jhāne sabhāva kosallam jhāna kosalla

original: jhāne ādīnavakosallaṁ jhānakosallaṁ, jhāne nissaraṇakosallaṁ jhānakosallaṁ, jhānaphalena
analyzed: jhāne ādīnava kosallam jhāna kosalla jhāne nissaraṇa kosallam jhāna kosalla jhāna phalena

original: upādāya kosallaṁ, jhānaphalena paṭisaṅkhānaphale aparihānadhammatā nibbattijhāne
analyzed: upādāya kosalla jhāna phalena paṭisaṅkhāna phale a parihāna dhamma tā nibbatti jhāne

original: ca kīḷitāpi visesabhāgiyaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilabbhati.
analyzed: ca kīḷitā api visesa bhāgiyam jhānam paṭilabbhati

original: Idaṁ panassāti bhavahāritā ca ārammaṇānimittaggāho anabhinīhārabalaṁ, cittekaggatā
analyzed: idam pana assa ati bhava hāri tā ca ārammaṇa a nimitta ggāhaḥ an abhinīhāra bala citta ekagga tā

original: nimittāsu gatisahitā samathabalena asaṁsīdanañca jhāne maggaphalaṁ samathaṁ pavatte
analyzed: gati sahitā samatha balena a saṃsīdanam ca jhāne magga phalam samatham pavatte

original: samādhino upekkhāpalipubbāparanimittāsayo paggāhino satibalaṁ taṁ pavattitānañca
analyzed: samādhino upekkhā pali pubba apara nimitta āsayaḥ paggāhino sati balam tam pavatti tānam ca

original: vipassanānaṁ samaññābale.
analyzed: vipassanānam samaññā bale

original: Tattha katamā jhānapāramitā?
analyzed: tattha katamā jhāna pāramitā

original: Supāramitā mettā kāmesu sattā kāmasaṅgasattāti yamhi sutte desanāya vohārena dve
analyzed: su pāramitā mettā kāmesu sattā kāma saṅga sattā ati yamhi sutte desanāya vohārena dve

original: saccāni niddiṭṭhāni, dukkhañca samudayo ca, vicayena hārena ye saṁyojanīyesu dhammesu
analyzed: saccāni niddiṭṭhāni dukkham ca samudayaḥ ca vicayena hārena ye sayojanīyesu dhammesu

original: vajjaṁ na passanti, te oghaṁ tarissantīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vajjam na passanti te ogham tarissanti iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Na tarissantīti atthi esā yutti ca vicayo ca idaṁ nu kissa padaṭṭhānaṁ, kāmesu sattāti pañca kāmaguṇā, taṁ kāmataṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: na tarissanti iti atthi esā yutti ca vicayo ca idam nu kissa padaṭṭhāna kāmesu sattā ati pañca kāma guṇā tam kāma taṇhāya padaṭṭhāna

original: Saṁyojane vajjamapassamānāti avijjāya padaṭṭhānaṁ, na hi jātu saṁyojanasaṅgasattā oghaṁ tareyyuṁ vipulaṁ mahantanti upādānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: sayojane avijjāya padaṭṭhāna na hi jātu sayojana saṅga sattāḥ ogham tareyyum vipulam mahantam ti upādānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Kāmesu sattāti kāmā dvidhā—
analyzed: kāmesu sattā ati kāmāḥ dvidhā

original: vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca, tattha kilesakāmā kāmataṇhā kāmataṇhāya yuttā bhavanti rūpataṇhā bhavataṇhā lakkhaṇena hārena, saṁyojane vajjamapassamānāti saṁyojanassa.
analyzed: vatthu kāmā ca kilesa kāmā ca tattha kilesa kāmā kāma taṇhā kāma taṇhāya yuttāḥ bhavanti rūpa taṇhā bhava taṇhā lakkhaṇena hārena sayojane vajjam apassamānā ati sayojanassa

original: Yo tattha chandarāgo tassa kiṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ?
analyzed: yaḥ tattha chanda rāgo tassa kim padaṭṭhāna

original: Sukhā vedanā dve ca indriyāni—
analyzed: sukhā vedanā dve ca indriyāni

original: sukhindriyañca somanassindriyañca.
analyzed: sukha indriyam ca somanassindriyañca

original: Iti sukhāya vedanāya gahitāya tayopi vedanā gahitā honti.
analyzed: iti sukhāya vedanāya gahitāya vedanāḥ gahitāḥ honti

original: Vedanākkhandhe gahite sabbe pañcakkhandhā gahitā honti.
analyzed: vedanā kkhandhe gahite sabbe pañca kkhandhāḥ gahitāḥ honti

original: Rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbā gahitā, vatthukāmesu gahitesu sabbāni cha bāhirāni āyatanāni gahitāni honti.
analyzed: rūpa sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabbāḥ gahitāḥ vatthu kāmesu gahitesu sabbāni cha bāhirāni āyatanāni gahitāni honti

original: Ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu yo sato, ayaṁ vuccate lakkhaṇo hāro, tattha yo oḷārikamhi kilese ajjhāvasito sabbakilesesu yo na tato sukhumataresu na vītarāgo bhavati.
analyzed: ajjhattika bāhiresu āyatanesu yaḥ sataḥ ayam vuccate lakkhaṇaḥ hāro tattha yaḥ oḷārikamhi kilese ajjhāvasito sabba kilesesu yaḥ na tatas sukhumataresu na vīta rāgaḥ bhavati

original: Tattha bāhirasaṁyojanaṁ mamanti ajjhattasaṁyojanaṁ ahanti.
analyzed: tattha bāhira sayojanam mamanti ajjhatta sayojanam

original: Tattha bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: tattha bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye oghaṁ taritukāmā te saṁyojanīyesu dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharissantīti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye ogham taritu kāmā te sayojanīyesu dhammesu ādīnava anupassinaḥ viharissanti iti ayam ettha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Kāmesu sattāti yesu ca sattā yena ca sattā yesañca sattā ayaṁ catubbidho ākāro sabbesaṁ hārabhāgiyo.
analyzed: kāmesu sattā ati yesu ca sattā yena ca sattā yesam ca sattā ayam catubbidhaḥ ākāraḥ sabbesam hāra bhāgiyaḥ

original: Tattha katamāni tīṇi vipallāsāni padaṭṭhānāni ca?
analyzed: tattha katamāni tīṇi vipallāsāni padaṭṭhānāni ca

original: Cittavipallāsassa diṭṭhivipallāsassa saññāvipallāsassa tayo vipallāsā tīṇi akusalamūlāni padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: citta vipallāsassa diṭṭhi vipallāsassa saññā vipallāsassa tayo vipallāsā tīṇi akusala mūlāni padaṭṭhāna

original: Tīṇi akusalamūlāni hīnappaṇītakāriyakammassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tīṇi akusala mūlāni hīnappaṇīta kāriya kammassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Catunnañca upādānānaṁ doso akusalamūlaṁ dissati.
analyzed: catunnam ca upādānānam dosaḥ akusala mūlam dissati

original: Hīnappaṇītakāriyakammassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: hīnappaṇīta kāriya kammassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Yathā mātuyā vā pituno vā aññatarassa vā puna uḷārassa bhikkhuno abhayaṁ deti.
analyzed: yathā mātuyāḥ vā pituno vā aññatarassa vā puna uḷārassa bhikkhuno abhayam deti

original: Tattha añño micchā paṭipajjeyya kāyena vā vācāya vā.
analyzed: tattha aññaḥ micchā paṭipajjeyya kāyena vā vācāya vā

original: Tattha so byāpādamupādāya tesaṁ uḷārānaṁ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā anupālayanto yo uḷārānaṁ abhayaṁ deti.
analyzed: tattha saḥ byāpādam upādāya tesam uḷārānam rakkhā āvaraṇa guttiyā anupālayantaḥ yaḥ uḷārānam abhayam deti

original: Tesaṁ abhaye dinne yo tattha micchā paṭipajjeyya.
analyzed: tesam abhaye dinne yaḥ tattha micchā paṭipajjeyya

original: Tattha so byāpādaṁ upādāyanto dosajaṁ kammaṁ karoti.
analyzed: tattha saḥ byāpādam upādāyantaḥ dosa jam kammam karoti

original: Yo tattha asādhu indriyā nīvaraṇaṁ yaṁ tesaṁ abhayaṁ dakkhiṇato saññaṁ idaṁ paṇītaṁ
analyzed: yaṃ tattha asādhu indriyāḥ nīvaraṇam yam tesam abhayam dakkhiṇatas saññam idam paṇīta

original: kāraṇaṁ mayā puna tattha micchāpaṭipatti ayaṁ byāpādo hīnagamivakammaṁ lobho moho
analyzed: kāraṇam mayā puna tattha micchā paṭipatti ayam byāpādaḥ lobhaḥ moho

original: ca imāni nīvaraṇāni vacanāni tāni cattāri upādānāni tehi catūhi upādānehi yo so upādāno
analyzed: ca imāni nīvaraṇāni vacanāni tāni cattāri upādānāni tehi catūhi upādānehi yaḥ saḥ upādānaḥ

original: itthī vā puriso vā tesaṁ pañcakkhandhānaṁ teyeva upādāno samudayo idaṁ dukkhañca
analyzed: itthī vā purisaḥ vā tesam pañca kkhandhānam te yeva upādāno samudayaḥ idam dukkham ca

original: samudayo ca soyeva desanāhāro.
analyzed: samudayaḥ ca desanā āhāro

original: Tattha kāmesu ye na pajjanti, te ādīnavānupassanāya pajjanti.
analyzed: tattha kāmesu ye na pajjanti te ādīnava anupassanāya pajjanti

original: Itissā kāmadhātuyā nikkhamitukāmatā, ayaṁ vuccati nekkhammacchando.
analyzed: iti ssā kāmadhātuyā nikkhamitu kāma tā ayam vuccati nekkhamma chando

original: Yo tattha anabhisaṅkhārānaṁ kiñci visodheti tassa dhāvarā vā, ayaṁ abyāpādacchando.
analyzed: yaḥ tattha kiñci visodheti tassa dhāvarā vai ayam a byāpāda chandaḥ

original: Kiñci vihiṁsati, ayaṁ vihiṁsāchando.
analyzed: kiñci vihisati ayam vihisā chandaḥ

original: Iti nekkhammābhinīhatā tayo chandā—
analyzed: iti nekkhamma abhinīhatā tayaḥ chandā

original: nekkhammacchando abyāpādacchando avihiṁsāchando.
analyzed: nekkhamma chandaḥ a byāpāda chandaḥ a vihisā chandaḥ

original: Tattha nekkhammacchando alobho;
analyzed: tattha nekkhamma chandaḥ alobho

original: abyāpādacchando adoso;
analyzed: a byāpāda chandaḥ a dosaḥ

original: avihiṁsāchando amoho.
analyzed: a vihisā chandaḥ a mohaḥ

original: Imāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni aṭṭhasu sampattesu parahitāni, tesaṁyeva catunnaṁ upādānānaṁ nirodhāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: imāni tīṇi kusala mūlāni aṭṭhasu sampattesu para hitāni catunnam upādānānam nirodhāya savattanti

original: Sace vā puna kammaṁ kareyya kaṇhaṁ vā sukkaṁ vā tassa vipākahānāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: sace vā puna kammam kareyya kaṇham vā sukkam vā tassa vipāka hānāya savattanti

original: Idaṁ kammaṁ akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ kammakkhayāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: idam kammam a kaṇham a sukkam kamma kkhayāya savattati

original: Tattha yo tiṇṇaṁ akusalamūlānaṁ nirodho, ayaṁ nirodho.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ tiṇṇam akusala mūlānam nirodhaḥ ayam nirodhaḥ

original: Soyeva maggo tattha paṭipadāni imāni dve saccāni imāni cattāri saccāni āvaṭṭo hāro.
analyzed: saḥ yā iva maggo tattha paṭipadāni imāni dve saccāni imāni cattāri saccāni āvaṭṭaḥ hāro

original: Kāmesu sattāti ye sekkhā, te ekenevākārena sattā.
analyzed: kāmesu sattā ati ye sekkhā te ekena iva ākārena sattā

original: Ye puthujjanā, te dvīhākārehi sattā, tassāyaṁ pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo vattabbo.
analyzed: ye puthujjanā te dvīhākārehi sattā tassa ayam pañhaḥ vibhajja byākaraṇīyaḥ vattabbo

original: Kiñcāpi sotāpanno paṭisevanāya, no ca kho abhinivese satto yo hi apacayāya padahati, na upacayāya.
analyzed: kiñca api sotāpanno paṭisevanāya no ca kho abhinivese satto yaḥ hi apacayāya padahati na upacayāya

original: Sekkho hi kilesavasena kāme paṭisevati.
analyzed: sekkhaḥ hi kilesa vasena kāme paṭisevati

original: Puthujjano pana kilesasamuṭṭhānāya kāme paṭisevati.
analyzed: puthujjanaḥ pana kilesa samuṭṭhānāya kāme paṭisevati

original: Tattha kāmesu sattānaṁ catuoghaṁ tarissatīti vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo, ayaṁ vibhatti.
analyzed: tattha kāmesu sattānam catu ogham tarissati iti vibhajja byākaraṇīyaḥ ayam vibhatti

original: Parivattanoti kāme ye neva sajjanti na ca saṁyojanehi saṁyuttā, te oghaṁ tarissanti vipulaṁ mahantanti.
analyzed: kāme ye na iva sajjanti na ca sayojanehi sayuttā te ogham tarissanti vipulam mahantam ti

original: Ayaṁ suttassa paṭipakkho.
analyzed: ayam suttassa paṭipakkho

original: Vevacananti yo kāmesu satto yo ca tattha kāmānaṁ guṇo, tattha viso satto.
analyzed: yaḥ kāmesu sattaḥ yaḥ ca tattha kāmānam guṇaḥ tattha viso satto

original: Yepi kāmānaṁ āhārā dhammā, tattha viso satto.
analyzed: ye pi kāmānam āhārāḥ dhammā tattha visaḥ satto

original: Tatthimaṁ kāmānaṁ vevacanaṁ pāko rajo sallaṁ gaṇḍo īti upaddavoti.
analyzed: tatthimam kāmānam vevacanam pākaḥ rajaḥ sallam gaṇḍaḥ īti upaddavoti

original: Yāni vā pana aññāni vevacanāni tattha viso sattoti vevacanaṁ.
analyzed: yāni vā pana aññāni vevacanāni tattha viso satto ti vevacana

original: Satto bandho mucchito gadhito ajjhosito kāme ajjhāpannā parimutto tabbahulavihārīti.
analyzed: sattaḥ bandhaḥ mucchitaḥ gadhitaḥ ajjhositaḥ kāme ajjhāpannā parimuttaḥ tad bahula vihārī iti

original: Yāni vā pana aññāni vevacanāni, ayaṁ vevacano nāma.
analyzed: yāni vā pana aññāni vevacanāni ayam vevacanaḥ nāma

original: Kāmappacārapaññattiyā kilesagocarapaññattiyā paññattā cittanti vevacanaṁ.
analyzed: kāma ppacāra paññattiyā kilesa gocara paññattiyā paññattā cittam ti vevacana

original: Satto tabbahulavihārīti yāni vā pana aññāni.
analyzed: satto tad bahula vihārī iti yāni vā pana aññāni

original: Ime kāmappacārapaññattiyā kilesagocarapaññattiyā paññattā, bījapaññattiyā paññattā,
analyzed: ime kāma ppacāra paññattiyā kilesa gocara paññattiyā paññattā bīja paññattiyā paññattā

original: saṅkhārā saṁyojanapaññattiyā paññattā, upādānaṁ hetupaññattiyā paññattaṁ, puggalo
analyzed: saṅkhārā sayojana paññattiyā paññattā upādānam hetu paññattiyā paññatta puggalo

original: puthupaññattiyā paññatto.
analyzed: puthu paññattiyā paññattaḥ

original: Otaraṇoti imāya paṭiccasamuppādo dukkhañca samudayo ca.
analyzed: otaraṇo ti imāya paṭiccasamuppādo dukkham ca samudayo ca

original: Ye kilesā ye saṅkhārā saṁyojanāni ca pañcasu khandhesu saṅkhārakkhandho dhammāyatanesu akusalā dhammāyatanāni indriyesu sukhindriyañca, somanassindriyañca, ayaṁ indriyotaraṇo.
analyzed: ye kilesāḥ ye saṅkhārā sayojanāni ca pañcasu khandhesu saṅkhāra kkhandho dhamma āyatanesu akusalā dhamma āyatanāni indriyesu sukha indriyam ca somanassa indriyam ca ayam indriya utaraṇaḥ

original: Sodhanoti ettako.
analyzed: sodhanoti ettakaḥ

original: Eseva ārambho niddisitabbo suttattho.
analyzed: esa iva ārambhaḥ niddisitabbaḥ sutta ttho

original: Adhiṭṭhānoti ime dhammā atthi ekattatāya paññattā atthi vemattatāya.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāno ti ime dhammā atthi ekatta tāya paññattā atthi vematta tāya

original: Ye saññā bāhiro kāme, te vemattatāya paññattā.
analyzed: ye saññā bāhiraḥ kāme te vemattatāya paññattā

original: Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu sattāti pariyuṭṭhānavipallāsā vemattatāya paññattā oghaṁ tareyyuṁ.
analyzed: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu sattā ati pariyuṭṭhāna vipallāsāḥ vemattatāya paññattāḥ ogham tareyyu

original: Vipulaṁ mahantanti avijjā ekattatāya paññattā.
analyzed: vipulam mahantanti avijjā ekatta tāya paññattā

original: Parikkhāroti tassa ko hetu ko paccayo?
analyzed: parikkhāraḥ ti tassa kaḥ hetu kaḥ paccayo

original: Ārammaṇapaccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccaya tāya paccayaḥ

original: Ayoniso ca manasikāro sannissayassa paccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: ayoniso ca manasikāro sannissayassa paccaya tāya paccayo

original: Avijjā samanantarapaccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: avijjā samanantara paccaya tāya paccayaḥ

original: Rāgānusayo hetupaccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: rāga anusayaḥ hetu paccaya tāya paccayaḥ

original: Ayaṁ hetu, ayaṁ paccayo.
analyzed: ayam hetu ayam paccayo

original: Samāropano paccayoti ye kāmesu sattā sugatā surūpāti ayaṁ kāmadhātuyā chando rāgo te apuññamayā saṅkhārā.
analyzed: samāropano paccayo ti ye kāmesu sattā sugatā surūpā ati ayam kāmadhātuyā chandaḥ rāgaḥ te apuñña mayā saṅkhārā

original: Te kiṁ paccayā?
analyzed: te kim paccayā

original: Avijjā paccayā.
analyzed: avijjā paccayā

original: Te kissa paccayā?
analyzed: te kissa paccayā

original: Viññāṇassa paccayā.
analyzed: viññāṇassa paccayā

original: Iti avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā.
analyzed: iti avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā

original: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ yāva jarāmaraṇaṁ evametassa kevalassa mahato dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti ekaṁ suttaṁ gataṁ.
analyzed: saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam yāva jarā maraṇam evam etassa kevalassa mahataḥ dukkha kkhandhassa samudayaḥ hoti ekam suttam gata

original: Pañcanīvaraṇikaṁ suttaṁ kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: pañca nīvaraṇikam suttam

original: Tattha katamo desanāhāro nāma?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ desanā āhāraḥ nāma

original: Yā ca abhijjhā yo ca byāpādo yañca uddhaccaṁ, ayaṁ taṇhā.
analyzed: yā ca abhijjhā yā ca byāpādaḥ yat ca uddhat ca ayam taṇhā

original: Yañca thinamiddhaṁ, yañca kukkuccaṁ yā ca vicikicchā, ayaṁ diṭṭhi.
analyzed: yat ca yat ca kukkuccam yā ca vicikicchā ayam

original: Yā pana kāyassa akammaniyatā kiñcāpi taṁ middhaṁ no tu sabhāvakilesatāya kileso, iti yā ca cittasallīyanā yā ca kāyākammaniyatā, ayaṁ pakkhopakileso na tu sabhāvakileso.
analyzed: yā pana kāyassa akamma niyatā kiñca api tam middham no tu sabhāva kilesa tāya kileso iti yā ca citta sallīyanā yā ca kāya akamma niyatā ayam pakkha upakilesaḥ na tu sabhāva kilesaḥ

original: Tattha attasaññānupacittaṁ kilamatho kukkuccānupacittaṁ thinaṁ yā cittassa līyanā, iti ime pañca nīvaraṇā cattāri nīvaraṇāni sabhāvakilesā thinamiddhaṁ nīvaraṇapakkhopakileso.
analyzed: tattha atta saññā anupacittam kilamatho kukkucca anupacittam thinam yā cittassa līyanā iti ime pañca nīvaraṇā cattāri nīvaraṇāni sa bhāva kilesā thinam iddham nīvaraṇa pakkha upakileso

original: Yathā cattāro āsavā sabhāvaāsavatāya āsavā no tu cittasāsavatāya āsavā.
analyzed: yathā cattāraḥ āsavā sabhāvaāsavatāya āsavā no tu citta sāsavatāya āsavā

original: Sabhāvatāya āsavā.
analyzed: sabhāvatāya āsavā

original: Pakkhe āsavatāya āsavā.
analyzed: pakkhe āsava tāya āsavā

original: Atha panāha suttantaṁ yena te sampayuttā vā vippayuttā vā āsavā, teyeva ete vattabbā sāsavā vā anāsavā vā.
analyzed: atha pana āha suttantam yena te sampayuttāḥ vā vippayuttāḥ vā āsavā te yeva ete vattabbā sa āsavāḥ vā anāsavāḥ vā

original: Tattha katamo vicayo.
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ

original: Abhijjhā kāmataṇhā rūpataṇhā bhavataṇhā.
analyzed: abhijjhā kāma taṇhā rūpa taṇhā bhava taṇhā

original: Yaṁ vā pana kiñci ajjhosānagataṁ sāsavā abhijjhitassa mettānupassiya yo anatthaṁ carati.
analyzed: yam vā pana kiñci ajjhosāna gatam sa āsavā abhijjhitassa mettā anupassiya yaḥ anattham carati

original: Tattha yo byāpādaṁ uppādeti, acari carissatīti.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ byāpādam uppādeti acari carissati iti

original: Evaṁ nava āghātavatthūni kattabbāni, tassevaṁ byāpādānupassissa kileso yo paridāho kāyakilamatho akammaniyatā middhaṁ.
analyzed: evam nava āghāta vatthūni kattabbāni tassa ivam byāpāda anupassissa kilesaḥ yaḥ paridāhaḥ kāya kilamatho akamma niyatā

original: Cittānupassissa paṭighātena khiyanā, idaṁ thinamiddhaṁ.
analyzed: citta anupassissa paṭighātena khiyanā idam thinam iddha

original: Tattha adhikaraṇaavūpasamo, idaṁ uddhaccaṁ.
analyzed: tattha idam

original: Yaṁ kiṁ kasathamīti idaṁ kukkuccaṁ.
analyzed: yam kim iti idam kukkud ca

original: Yaṁ yathā idaṁ santīraṇaṁ, ayaṁ vicikicchā.
analyzed: yam yathā idam ayam vicikicchā

original: Tattha avijjā ca taṇhā ca atthi, idaṁ pariyuṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tattha avijjā ca taṇhā ca atthi idam pariyuṭṭhāna

original: Āvaraṇaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ chadanaṁ upakkileso ca atthi, idaṁ kāmacchando kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: āvaraṇam nīvaraṇam chadanam upakkileso ca atthi idam kāmacchandaḥ kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Byāpādo byāpādapariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: byāpādaḥ byāpāda pariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Thinamiddhaṁ thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: thinamiddham thinamiddha pariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Uddhaccakukkuccaṁ avijjāpariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: uddhacca kukkuccam avijjā pariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: vicikicchā vicikicchā pariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṁ anusayasaṁyojanassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhānam anusaya sayojanassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Byāpādapariyuṭṭhānaṁ paṭighasaṁyojanassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: byāpāda pariyuṭṭhānam paṭigha sayojanassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Thinamiddhapariyuṭṭhānaṁ mānasaṁyojanassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: thinamiddha pariyuṭṭhānam mānasa yojanassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Avijjāpariyuṭṭhānañca vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānañca diṭṭhisaṁyojanassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: avijjā pariyuṭṭhānam ca vicikicchā pariyuṭṭhānam ca diṭṭhi sayojanassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhāne vutte sabbāni pariyuṭṭhānāni vuttāni hontīti.
analyzed: kāma rāga pariyuṭṭhāne vutte sabbāni pariyuṭṭhānāni vuttāni honti iti

original: Saṁyojanesu vuttesu sabbasaṁyojanāni vuttāni honti.
analyzed: sayojanesu vuttesu sabba sayojanāni vuttāni honti

original: Ayaṁ lakkhaṇo hāro.
analyzed: ayam lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ hāro

original: Ye ime pañca nīvaraṇā jhānapaṭipakkho so dukkhasamudayo.
analyzed: ye ime pañca nīvaraṇāḥ jhāna paṭipakkho so dukkha samudayo

original: Yaṁ phalaṁ, idaṁ dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: yam phale idam

original: Tattha kāmacchandassa nekkhammavitakko paṭipakkho;
analyzed: tattha kāmacchandassa nekkhamma vitakko paṭipakkho

original: byāpādassa abyāpādavitakko paṭipakkho;
analyzed: byāpādassa a byāpāda vitakko paṭipakkho

original: tiṇṇaṁ nīvaraṇānaṁ avihiṁsāvitakko paṭipakkho.
analyzed: tiṇṇam nīvaraṇānam a vihisā vitakko paṭipakkho

original: Iti ime tayo vitakkā.
analyzed: iti ime tayaḥ vitakkā

original: Nekkhammavitakko samādhikkhandhaṁ bhajati.
analyzed: nekkhamma vitakko samādhi kkhandham bhajati

original: Abyāpādavitakko sīlakkhandhaṁ bhajati.
analyzed: a byāpāda vitakko sīla kkhandham bhajati

original: Avihiṁsāvitakko paññākkhandhaṁ bhajati.
analyzed: a vihisā vitakko paññā kkhandham bhajati

original: Ime tayo khandhā.
analyzed: ime tayaḥ khandhā

original: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo nīvaraṇappahānāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ nīvaraṇa ppahānāya savattati

original: Yaṁ nīvaraṇappahānaṁ, ayaṁ nirodho.
analyzed: yam nīvaraṇa pahāna ayam nirodhaḥ

original: Imāni cattāri saccāni.
analyzed: imāni cattāri saccāni

original: Ayaṁ catubyūho hāro.
analyzed: ayam catu byūhaḥ

original: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ āvaṭṭaḥ hāro

original: Pañca nīvaraṇāni dasa bhavanti.
analyzed: pañca nīvaraṇāni dasa bhavanti

original: Yadapi ajjhattaṁ sārajjati, tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: yat api ajjhattam sā ārajjati tat api

original: Yadapi bahiddhā sārajjati, tadapi nīvaraṇaṁ, evaṁ yāva vicikicchā ime dasa nīvaraṇā.
analyzed: yat api bahiddhā sā ārajjati tat api nīvaraṇaḥ evam ime dasa nīvaraṇāḥ

original: Ajjhattabahiddhā kilesā imāni dve saṁyojanāni ajjhattasaṁyojanañca bahiddhāsaṁyojanañca.
analyzed: ajjhatta bahiddhā kilesāḥ imāni dve sayojanāni ajjhatta sayojanam ca bahiddhā sayojanam ca

original: Tattha ahanti ajjhattaṁ, mamanti bahiddhā.
analyzed: tattha ahanti ajjhatta mamanti bahiddhā

original: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi ajjhattaṁ, ekasaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni bahiddhā.
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi ajjhatta ekasaṭṭhi diṭṭhi gatāni bahiddhā

original: Yo ajjhattaṁ chandarāgo rūpesu avītarāgo bhavati avītacchando.
analyzed: yaḥ ajjhattam chanda rāgaḥ rūpesu a vīta rāgaḥ bhavati a vīta chandaḥ

original: Evaṁ yāva viññāṇe, ayaṁ ajjhattā taṇhā.
analyzed: evam yāva viññāṇe ayam ajjhattā taṇhā

original: Yaṁ chasu bāhiresu āyatanesu tīsu ca bhavesu ajjhosānaṁ, ayaṁ bahiddhā taṇhā.
analyzed: yam chasu bāhiresu āyatanesu tīsu ca bhavesu ajjhosāna ayam bahiddhā taṇhā

original: Imāni dve saccāni saṁyojanāni saṁyojanīyā ca dhammā.
analyzed: imāni dve saccāni sayojanāni sayojanīyā ca dhammā

original: Tattha saṁyojanesu dhammesu yā nibbidānupassanā ca, ayaṁ maggo.
analyzed: tattha sayojanesu dhammesu yā nibbidā anupassanā ca ayam maggo

original: Yaṁ saṁyojanappahānaṁ, ayaṁ nirodho.
analyzed: yam ayam nirodhaḥ

original: Ayaṁ āvaṭṭo hāro.
analyzed: ayam āvaṭṭaḥ hāraḥ

original: Tattha katamo vibhattihāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vibhatti hāro

original: Saṁyojananti na etaṁ ekaṁsena.
analyzed: sayojananti naḥ etam eka sena

original: Mānasaṁyojanaṁ diṭṭhibhāgiyanti na taṁ ekaṁsena adiṭṭhamānaṁ nissāyamānaṁ na pajahati.
analyzed: mānasa yojanam na tam ekasena a diṭṭhamānam nissāyamānam na pajahati

original: Yo pañca uddhambhāgiyo māno kiñcāpi so diṭṭhipakkhe siyā.
analyzed: yo pañca uddhambhāgiyaḥ māno kiñcā api so diṭṭhi pakkhe siyā

original: Na tu orambhāgiyaṁ saṁyojanaṁ tassa pahānāya saṁvattatīti.
analyzed: na tu orambhāgiyam sayojanam tassa pahānāya savattati iti

original: Yo ca ahaṅkāro na paviddhoyaṁ panassa evaṁ hoti.
analyzed: yaḥ ca ahaṅkāraḥ na paviddhaḥ ayam panassa evam hoti

original: Kadāsu nāmāhaṁ taṁ santaṁ āyatanaṁ sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmi, yaṁ ariyā santaṁ āyatanaṁ upasampajja viharissantīti, ayaṁ abhijjhā na ca taṁ nīvaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: kadāsu nāma aham tam santam āyatanam sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmi yam ariyāḥ santam āyatanam upasampajja viharissanti iti ayam abhijjhā na ca tam nīvaraṇa

original: Atthi pana arahato kāyakilesamiddhañca okkamati na ca taṁ nīvaraṇaṁ tassa thinamiddhaṁ nīvaraṇanti.
analyzed: atthi pana arahato kāya kilesam iddham ca okkamati na ca tam nīvaraṇam tassa thinam iddham nīvaraṇaṃ ti

original: Na ekaṁsena.
analyzed: na ekasena

original: Ayaṁ vibhattihāro.
analyzed: ayam vibhatti hāraḥ

original: Parivattanoti pañca nīvaraṇā pañcaṅgikena jhānena pahānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: pañca nīvaraṇā pañcaṅgikena jhānena pahānam gacchanti

original: Ayaṁ tesaṁ paṭipakkho nīvaraṇo asukassa pahīnāti na aññānuminitabbaṁ, paramatthamajjhattaṁ, ayaṁ parivattanā.
analyzed: ayam tesam paṭipakkhaḥ nīvaraṇaḥ asukassa na ayam parivattanā

original: Tattha katamo vevacano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vevacanaḥ

original: Kāmacchando chandarāgo pemaṁ nikantīti vevacanaṁ.
analyzed: kāmacchandaḥ chanda rāgaḥ iti

original: Nīvaraṇaṁ chadanaṁ upakkileso pariyuṭṭhānanti vevacanaṁ.
analyzed: nīvaraṇam chadanam upakkilesaḥ pariyuṭṭhānam ti

original: Paññattīti avijjāpaccayā kiccapaññattiyā paññatti, byāpādo vikkhepapaññattiyā paññatti, thinamiddhaṁ asamugghātapaññattiyā paññatti.
analyzed: paññatti iti avijjā paccayā kicca paññattiyā paññatti byāpādaḥ vikkhepa paññattiyā paññatti thinamiddham asamugghāta paññattiyā paññatti

original: Evaṁ sabbepi ete pañca nīvaraṇā imamhi sutte vikkhepapaññattiyā paññatti.
analyzed: evam sabbe pi ete pañca nīvaraṇāḥ imamhi sutte vikkhepa paññattiyā paññatti

original: Tattha katamo otaraṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ

original: Ime pañca nīvaraṇā avijjā ca taṇhā ca tattha avijjāmūlā nīvaraṇā.
analyzed: ime pañca nīvaraṇāḥ avijjā ca taṇhā ca tattha avijjā mūlā nīvaraṇā

original: Yā taṇhā ime saṅkhārā, te avijjāpaccayā ime dve dhammā pañcasu khandhesu saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā,
analyzed: yā taṇhā ime saṅkhārā te avijjā paccayāḥ ime dve dhammā pañcasu khandhesu saṅkhāra khandha pariyāpannā

original: āyatanesu dhammāyatanaṁ, dhātūsu dhammadhātu, indriyesu imesaṁ dhammānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: āyatanesu dhammāyatana dhātūsu dhammadhātu indriyesu imesam dhammānam padaṭṭhāna

original: sukhindriyassa ca somanassindriyassa ca itthindriyassa ca purisindriyassa ca.
analyzed: sukha indriyassa ca somanassa indriyassa ca itthi indriyassa ca purisa indriyassa ca

original: Tattha katamo sodhano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhanaḥ hāro

original: Idaṁ suttaṁ yathā ārabbha nikkhittaṁ so attho bhāsito imehi pañcahi padehi.
analyzed: idam suttam yathā ārabbha nikkhittam saḥ atthaḥ bhāsitaḥ imehi pañcahi padehi

original: Tattha kāmacchando ca byāpādo ca vicikicchā ca na ekattatāya paññattā, kāmāti na ekattatāya paññattā, atha khalu vemattatāya paññattā.
analyzed: tattha kāmacchando ca byāpādo ca vicikicchā ca na ekatta tāya paññattā na ekatta tāya paññattā atha khalu vematta tāya paññattā

original: Ayaṁ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
analyzed: ayam adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāro

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāro

original: Kāmacchandassa ayoniso manasikāro subhārammaṇapaccayo;
analyzed: kāmacchandassa ayonisaḥ manasikāraḥ subha ārammaṇa paccayo

original: subhanimittañca hetu.
analyzed: subha nimittam ca

original: Byāpādassa ayoniso manasikāro āghātavatthūni ca paccayo;
analyzed: byāpādassa ayonisaḥ manasikāraḥ āghāta vatthūni ca paccayo

original: paṭighānusayo hetu.
analyzed: paṭigha anusayaḥ hetu

original: Thinamiddhassa paṭisaṁhāro paccayo;
analyzed: thinamiddhassa paṭisahāro paccayo

original: pavattiyā kilamathā calanā tañca hetu.
analyzed: pavattiyā kilamathā calanā tat ca hetu

original: Uddhaccakukkuccassa rajanīyaṁ ārammaṇiyaṁ assādiyākindriyaṁ tāva aparipuṇṇañca ñāṇaṁ paccayo;
analyzed: uddhacca kukkuccassa rajanīyam ārammaṇiyam assādiyākindriyam tāva aparipuṇṇam ca ñāṇam paccayo

original: kāmasaññā ca diṭṭhianusayo ca hetu.
analyzed: kāma saññā ca diṭṭhi anusayo ca hetu

original: Vicikicchāya nava mānavidhā ārammaṇaṁ mānānusayo, sova paccayo;
analyzed: vicikicchāya nava māna vidhāḥ ārammaṇam māna anusayo saḥ uva paccayo

original: vicikicchānusayo hetu.
analyzed: vicikicchā anusayaḥ hetu

original: Ete pañca dhammā sahetu sappaccayā uppajjanti.
analyzed: ete pañca dhammā sa hetu sappaccayāḥ uppajjanti

original: Tattha katamo samāropano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ samāropanaḥ hāro

original: Ime pañca nīvaraṇā cattāropi ete āsavā gaṇḍāpi ete sallāpi ete upādānāni ete.
analyzed: ime pañca nīvaraṇā cattāraḥ api ete āsavāḥ gaṇḍā api ete sallā api ete upādānāni ete

original: Tesu eva bāhiresu dhammesu saṅkilesabhāgiyaṁ suttanti paññattiṁ gacchati.
analyzed: tesu eva bāhiresu dhammesu saṅkilesa bhāgiyam suttanti paññattim gacchati

original: Ayaṁ samāropano hāro.
analyzed: ayam samāropanaḥ hāraḥ

original: Niddiṭṭhaṁ saṅkilesikabhāgiyaṁ suttaṁ.
analyzed: niddiṭṭham saṅkilesikabhāgiyam sutta

original: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti gāthā.
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti gāthā

original: Tattha katamo desanā hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ desanā hāro

original: Imamhi sutte ko attho khandhavavatthānena viññāṇakkhandhaṁ deseti, dhātuvavatthānena manoviññāṇadhātuṁ, āyatanavavatthānena manāyatanaṁ, indriyavavatthānena manindriyaṁ.
analyzed: imamhi sutte kaḥ attho khandha vavatthānena viññāṇa kkhandham deseti dhātu vavatthānena manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu āyatana vavatthānena mana āyatanaḥ indriya vavatthānena man indriya

original: Tassa kiṁ pubbaṅgamā dhammā?
analyzed: tassa kim pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā

original: Saṅkhittena cha dhammā pubbaṅgamā dhammā kusalamūlāni ca akusalamūlāni ca animittaṁ imamhi sutte kusalamūlaṁ desitaṁ.
analyzed: saṅkhittena cha dhammā pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā kusala mūlāni ca akusala mūlāni ca animittam imamhi sutte kusala mūlam desita

original: Tattha katamā manopubbaṅgamā dhammā?
analyzed: tattha katamāḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Mano tesaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ, yathāpi balassa rājā pubbaṅgamo, evameva dhammānaṁ manopubbaṅgamā.
analyzed: mano tesam pubbaṅgama yathā api balassa rājā pubbaṅgamaḥ evam eva dhammānam manaḥ pubbaṅgamā

original: Tattha tividhānaṁ pubbaṅgamānaṁ nekkhammacchandena abyāpādacchandena avihiṁsāchandena.
analyzed: tattha tividhānam pubbaṅgamānam nekkhamma chandena a byāpāda chandena a vihisā chandena

original: Alobhassa nekkhammacchandena pubbaṅgamā.
analyzed: alobhassa nekkhamma chandena pubbaṅgamā

original: Adosassa abyāpādacchandena pubbaṅgamā.
analyzed: a dosassa a byāpāda chandena pubbaṅgamā

original: Amohassa avihiṁsāchandena pubbaṅgamā.
analyzed: amohassa avihisā chandena pubbaṅgamā

original: Tattha manoseṭṭhāti manasā ime dhammā ussaṭā manena vā nimmitā.
analyzed: tattha manoseṭṭhā ti manasā ime dhammā ussaṭā manena vā nimmitā

original: Manova imesaṁ dhammānaṁ seṭṭhoti manova imesaṁ dhammānaṁ seṭṭhajeṭṭhoti manova imesaṁ dhammānaṁ ādhipaccaṁ karotīti manoseṭṭhā.
analyzed: manaḥ vaḥ imesam dhammānam seṭṭhaḥ iti manaḥ vaḥ imesam dhammānam seṭṭha jeṭṭhaḥ iti manaḥ vaḥ imesam dhammānam ādhipaccam karoti iti manaḥ seṭṭhā

original: Manojavāti yattha mano gacchati.
analyzed: manaḥ javāti yattha manaḥ gacchati

original: Tattha ime dhammā gacchantīti manojavā.
analyzed: tattha ime dhammā gacchanti iti manaḥ javā

original: Yathā vāto sīghaṁ gacchati añño vā koci sīghaṁ gāmako vuccate vātajavoti pakkhigāmikoti,
analyzed: yathā vātaḥ sīgham gacchati aññaḥ vā koci sīgham gāmakaḥ vuccate vāta javo ti pakkhi gāmiko ti

original: evameva ime dhammā manena sampajāyamānā gacchanti, tattha ime dhammā gacchantīti manojavāti.
analyzed: evam eva ime dhammā manena sampajāyamānāḥ gacchanti tattha ime dhammā gacchanti iti

original: Te tividhā chandasamudānitā anāvilatā ca saṅkappo.
analyzed: te tividhā anāvila tā ca saṅkappaḥ

original: Sattavidhā ca kāyikaṁ sucaritaṁ vācasikaṁ sucaritaṁ, te dasa kusalakammapathā.
analyzed: sattavidhā ca kāyikam su caritam vācasikam su carita te dasa kusala kamma pathā

original: Tattha manasā ce pasannenāti manokammaṁ.
analyzed: tattha manasā ce pasannena ati manaḥ kamma

original: Bhāsati vāti vacīkammaṁ.
analyzed: bhāsati vāti

original: Karoti vāti kāyakammaṁ.
analyzed: karoti vāti kāya kamma

original: Imehi imasmiṁ sutte dasa kusalakammapathā paramāpi santā sīlavatā paramā.
analyzed: imehi imasmin sutte dasa kusala kamma pathā paramā api santā sīlava tā paramā

original: So bhavati vivattiyaṁ na lokaniyyānāya vāsanābhāgiyaṁ suttaṁ bhavati.
analyzed: so bhavati vivattiyam na loka niyyānāya vāsanā bhāgiyam suttam bhavati

original: Ayaṁ desanā.
analyzed: ayam desanā

original: Tattha katamo vicayo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ hāro

original: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti kusalamūlāni ca aṭṭhaṅgasammattāni.
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti kusala mūlāni ca aṭṭhaṅga sammattāni

original: Idaṁ suttaṁ.
analyzed: idam sutta

original: Yuttīti dasannaṁ kusalakammapathānaṁ yo vipāko, so sukhavedanīyo abyāpādassaṅgamāno.
analyzed: yuttī iti dasannam kusala kamma pathānam yaḥ vipāko saḥ sukha vedanīyaḥ

original: Chāyāva anapāyinīti anugacchati atthi esā yutti.
analyzed: chāyā ava anapāyinī iti anugacchati atthi esā yutti

original: Padaṭṭhānanti aṭṭhārasannaṁ manopavicārānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam ti aṭṭhāra sannam mana upavicārānam padaṭṭhāna

original: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti sabbakusalapakkhassa ime dhammā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti sabba kusala pakkhassa ime dhammā padaṭṭhāna

original: Manasā ce pasannenāti yo cetaso pasādo, idaṁ saddhindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: manasā ce pasannena ati yaḥ cetaso pasādaḥ idam saddhi indriyassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Bhāsati vāti sammāvācāya.
analyzed: bhāsati vāti sammāvācāya

original: Karoti vāti sammākammantassa ca sammāvāyāmassa ca padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: karoti vāti sammā kammantassa ca sammā vāyāmassa ca padaṭṭhāna

original: Lakkhaṇoti iti pubbaṅgamā dhammāti vedanāpubbaṅgamāpi ete, saññāpubbaṅgamāpi ete, saṅkhārapubbaṅgamāpi ete.
analyzed: lakkhaṇo ti iti pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammāḥ ti vedanā pubbaṅgamāḥ api ete saññā pubbaṅgamāḥ api ete saṅkhāra pubbaṅgamāḥ api ete

original: Ye keci dhammā sahajātā sabbe pubbaṅgamā etesaṁ dhammānaṁ.
analyzed: ye keci dhammā sahajātā sabbe pubbaṅgamāḥ etesam

original: Tato naṁ sukhamanvetīti somanassamapi naṁ anveti yaṁ susukhacchāyā tadāpi naṁ sukhaṁ tadapi anveti.
analyzed: tatas nam sukham anveti iti somanassam api nam anveti yam su sukha chāyā tadā api nam sukham tat api anveti

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ hāro

original: Manopubbaṅgamāti na idaṁ ekādivacanaṁ.
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamā ti naḥ idam eka ādi vacana

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Sabbeyeva ime chaviññāṇakāyā, imamhi bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: sabbe iya eva ime cha viññāṇa kāyāḥ imamhi bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye sukhena atthikā, te manaṁ pasādentīti ayaṁ imamhi sutte bhagavato adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye sukhena atthikā te manam pasādenti iti ayam imamhi sutte bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Attho pubbeyeva niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: atthaḥ pubbe iya iva niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: Yāni hi kusalamūlāni, tāni aṭṭhānisaṁsamattā hetu, ayaṁ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
analyzed: yāni hi kusala mūlāni tāni aṭṭhānisa samattā hetu ayam aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: Dasa ṭhānāni desanāhetūni desanāpaccayā niddesanā ca.
analyzed: dasa ṭhānāni desanā hetūni desanā paccayāḥ niddesanā ca

original: Tattha yaṁ maññe dukkhena saha nāmarūpaṁ viññāṇasaccanti aṅgena kusalamūlaṁ pahīyati, ayaṁ appahīnabhūmiyaṁ samudayo.
analyzed: tattha yam maññe dukkhena saha nāma rūpam viññāṇa saccan ti aṅgena kusala mūlam pahīyati ayam appahīna bhūmiyam samudayaḥ

original: Yaṁ tesaṁ pahānā, ayaṁ nirodho.
analyzed: yam tesam pahānā ayam nirodhaḥ

original: Imāni cattāri saccāni.
analyzed: imāni cattāri saccāni

original: Ayaṁ āvaṭṭo hāro.
analyzed: ayam āvaṭṭaḥ hāraḥ

original: Vibhattīti—
analyzed: vibhatti iti

original: “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā,
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Manoseṭṭhā manojavā;
analyzed: manaḥ seṭṭhā manaḥ javā

original: Manasā ce pasannena,
analyzed: manasā ce pasannena

original: Bhāsati vā karoti vā;
analyzed: bhāsati vā karoti vā

original: Tato naṁ sukhamanveti,
analyzed: tatas nam sukham anveti

original: Chāyāva anapāyinī”ti.
analyzed: chāyā u anapāyinī iti

original: Taṁ na ekaṁsena samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā pana hoti.
analyzed: tam naḥ eka sena samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā pana hoti

original: Tassa vā micchādiṭṭhikassa sakasatthe cittaṁ pasādeti, tena ca pasannena cittena bhāsati byākaroti na taṁ sukhamanveti na chāyāva anugāminī, dukkhameva taṁ anveti.
analyzed: tassa vā micchādiṭṭhikassa saka satthe cittam pasādeti tena ca pasannena cittena bhāsati byākaroti na tam sukham anveti na chāyā ava anugāminī dukkham eva tam anveti

original: Yathā vahantaṁ cakkaṁ padamanveti, idaṁ taṁ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: yathā vahantam cakkam padam anveti idam tam vibhajja byākaraṇīya

original: Manasā ce pasannena kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ sukhavedanīyanti samaggate sukhavedanīyaṁ micchaggate dukkhavedanīyaṁ, ayaṁ vibhatti.
analyzed: manasā ce pasannena kāya kammam vacī kammam sukha vedanīyanti samaggate sukha vedanīyam micchaggate dukkha vedanīya ayam vibhatti

original: Tattha katamo parivattano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parivattanaḥ hāro

original: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti yaṁ manasā paduṭṭhena bhāsati vā karoti vā dukkhamassānugāminī, etāniyeva dve suttāni bhāsitāni esa eva ca paṭipakkho.
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti yam manasā paduṭṭhena bhāsati vā karoti vā dukkham assa anugāminī etāniyā eva dve suttāni bhāsitāni esaḥ eva ca paṭipakkho

original: Vevacananti yadidaṁ mano cittaṁ viññāṇaṁ manindriyaṁ manoviññāṇadhātu.
analyzed: yat idam manaḥ cittam viññāṇam man indriyam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Paññattīti manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti ayaṁ mano kiñci paññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: paññattī iti manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ati ayam mano kiñci paññattiyā paññatta

original: Dhammāti kusalakammapathapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: dhammā ati kusala kammapatha paññattiyā paññatta

original: Manoseṭṭhāti visiṭṭhapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: manoseṭṭhā ati visiṭṭha paññattiyā paññatta

original: Manojavāti sahapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: manojavā ati sahapaññattiyā paññatta

original: Cittanti nekkhammapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: cittan ti nekkhamma paññattiyā paññatta

original: Manasā ce pasannenāti saddhindriyapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: manasā ce pasannena ati saddhi indriya paññattiyā paññatta

original: Manasā ce pasannenāti anāvilasaṅkappadutiyajjhānapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: manasā ce pasannena ati anāvila saṅkappa dutiya jhāna paññattiyā paññatta

original: Manasā ce pasannenāti assaddhānaṁ paṭipakkhapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: manasā ce pasannena ati assaddhānam paṭipakkha paññattiyā paññatta

original: Bhāsati vāti sammāvācāpaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: bhāsati vāti sammā vācā paññattiyā paññatta

original: Karoti vāti sammākammantapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: karoti vā ati sammā kammanta paññattiyā paññatta

original: Tato naṁ sukhamanvetīti jhānasamādhānaṁ.
analyzed: tatas nam sukham anveti iti jhāna samādhāna

original: Indriyesu manindriyaṁ.
analyzed: indriyesu man indriya

original: Paṭiccasamuppāde viññāṇaṁ.
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppāde viññāṇa

original: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti mettā ca mudutā ca jhānesu dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ tatiyañca.
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ati mettā ca mudu tā ca jhānesu dutiyam jhānam tatiyam ca

original: Khandhesu saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno.
analyzed: khandhesu saṅkhāra khandha pariyāpannaḥ

original: Dhātūsu dhammadhātu, āyatanesu dhammāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: dhātūsu dhammadhātu āyatanesu dhammāyatana

original: Yaṁ kusalaṁ indriyesu sukhindriyañca somanassindriyañca padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: yam kusalam indriyesu sukha indriyam ca somanassa indriyam ca

original: Imesaṁ dhammānaṁ paṭiccasamuppannānaṁ phassapaccayā sukhavedanīyo phasso sukhavedanā manopavicāresu somanassavicāro chattiṁsesu paṭhamapadesu cha somanassanekkhammassitā.
analyzed: imesam dhammānam paṭiccasamuppannānam phassa paccayā sukha vedanīyaḥ phassaḥ sukha vedanā manaḥ pavicāresu somanassa vicāro chattisesu paṭhama padesu cha somanassa nekkhammassitā

original: Iti ayaṁ otaraṇo hāro.
analyzed: iti ayam otaraṇaḥ hāraḥ

original: Tattha katamo sodhano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhanaḥ hāro

original: Yaṁ atthaṁ ārabbha idaṁ suttaṁ bhāsitaṁ.
analyzed: yam attham ārabbha idam suttam bhāsita

original: So attho niyutto etamatthaṁ ārabbha suttaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ atthaḥ niyuttaḥ etam attham ārabbha sutta

original: Ayaṁ sodhano hāro.
analyzed: ayam sodhanaḥ hāro

original: Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāro

original: Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti vevacanapaññatti, na ekattapaññatti.
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti vevacana paññatti na ekatta paññatti

original: Dhammāti ekato na vevacanapaññatti.
analyzed: dhammā ati ekatas na vevacana paññatti

original: Manasā ce pasannenāti so pasādo dvidho ajjhattañca abyāpādāvikkhambhanabahiddhā ca okappanato.
analyzed: manasā ce pasannena ati saḥ pasādaḥ dvidhaḥ ajjhattam ca a byāpāda a vikkhambhana bahiddhā ca okappanato

original: So ajjhattapasādo dvidho.
analyzed: saḥ ajjhat tapas ādaḥ dvidhaḥ

original: Samugghātapasādo ca vikkhambhanapasādo ca byāpādapariyuṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: samugghāta pasādo ca vikkhambhana pasādo ca byāpāda pariyuṭṭhāna

original: Vighāto na mūlapasādo jātamūlampi vā.
analyzed: vighātaḥ na mūla pasādaḥ vā

original: Pasādo sabyāpādaṁ vighātena.
analyzed: vighātena

original: Tato naṁ sukhamanvetīti sukhaṁ kāyikañca cetasikañca appiyavippayogopi piyasampayogopi nekkhammasukhampi puthujjanasukhampi pītisambojjhaṅgampi cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ.
analyzed: tatas nam sukham anveti iti sukham kāyikam ca cetasikam ca appiya vippayogaḥ api piya sampayogaḥ api nekkhamma sukham pi puthujjana sukham pi pīti sambojjhaṅgam pi cetasikam sukha

original: Yampi passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vedeti, tampi kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ bojjhaṅgā ca cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ.
analyzed: yam pi passaddha kāyaḥ sukham vedeti tam pi kāyikam sukham bojjhaṅgā ca cetasikam sukha

original: Yampi passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vedesi, tampi tañca sukhapadaṭṭhānaṁ paññattiyā yathāvuttaṁ taṁ aparāmaṭṭhaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ.
analyzed: yam pi passaddha kāyaḥ sukham vedesi tam pi tam ca sukha padaṭṭhānam paññattiyā yathā vuttam tam a parāmaṭṭham kusalānam dhammānam

original: Anvetīti appanā sandissati na cāyaṁ vā pattabhūto anveti.
analyzed: anveti iti appanā sandissati na ca ayam vā patta bhūtaḥ anveti

original: Tadidaṁ suttaṁ dvīhi ākārehi adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ.
analyzed: tat idam suttam dvīhi ākārehi

original: Hetunā ca yo pasannamānaso vipākena ca yo dukkhavedanīyo.
analyzed: hetunā ca yaḥ pasanna mānasaḥ vipākena ca yaḥ dukkha vedanīyaḥ

original: Parikkhāroti bhagavā pañcasatena bhikkhusaṅghena nagaraṁ pavisati rājagahaṁ.
analyzed: parikkhāro ti bhagavā pañca satena bhikkhu saṅghena nagaram pavisati rājagaha

original: Tattha manusso puggalo bhagavantaṁ parivisati, tassa pasādo uppanno kusalamūlapubbayogāvacaropi.
analyzed: tattha manussaḥ puggalaḥ bhagavantam parivisati tassa pasādaḥ uppanno kusala mūla pubbayoga avacaraḥ api

original: So aññesañca akkhāti, idaṁ vācaṁ bhāsati lābhā tesaṁ, yesaṁ nivesanaṁ bhagavā pavisati, amhākampi yadi bhaveyya mayampi bhagavato sampasādaṁ lacchamhāti.
analyzed: saḥ aññesam ca idam vācam bhāsati lābhā nivesanam bhagavā pavisati amhākam pi yadi bhaveyya mayam pi bhagavato sampasādam lacchamha ati

original: Yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā “namo bhagavato namo bhagavato”ti abyāpādamāno ekamante aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā namaḥ bhagavataḥ namaḥ bhagavatā iti a byāpāda mānaḥ ekamante aṭṭhāsi

original: Tadanantare bhagavā imaṁ suttaṁ abhāsittha “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti.
analyzed: tad anantare bhagavā imam suttam abhāsittha manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti

original: Sabbaṁ suttaṁ tathā yaṁ paresaṁ bhāsati idaṁ vācākammaṁ.
analyzed: sabbam suttam tathā yam paresam bhāsati idam vācākamma

original: Yaṁ añjaliṁ paṇāmeti, idaṁ kāyakammaṁ.
analyzed: yam añjalim paṇāma iti idam kāya kamma

original: Yo manopasādo, idaṁ manokammaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ manaḥ upasādaḥ idam manaḥ kamma

original: Tattha yaṁ paresaṁ pakāseti bhāsati vaṇṇaṁ.
analyzed: tattha yam paresam pakāseti bhāsati

original: Yesaṁ bhagavā nivesanaṁ gacchatīti.
analyzed: bhagavā nivesanam gacchati iti

original: Sabbaṁ tassa alobho kusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: sabbam tassa alobho kusala mūla

original: Yaṁ bhagavati mettacitto, tassa adoso kusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: yam bhagavati metta cittaḥ tassa adosaḥ kusala mūla

original: Yaṁ añjaliṁ paṇāmeti mānañca niggaṇhāti, tatthassa amoho kusalamūlaṁ pātubhavati.
analyzed: yam añjalim paṇāmeti mānam ca niggaṇhāti tattha assa amohaḥ kusala mūlam pātubhavati

original: Yaṁ uḷārapaññaṁ paṭilabhati, idamassa diṭṭhivipallāsappahānaṁ.
analyzed: yam uḷāra paññam paṭilabhati idam assa diṭṭhi vipallāsa ppahāna

original: Yaṁ tathāyeva saṁvaro hoti, idamassa saññāvipallāsappahānaṁ.
analyzed: yam tathāya iva savaraḥ hoti idam assa saññā vipallāsa ppahāna

original: Yaṁ manassa pasādanaṁ, idamassa cittavipallāsappahānanti akusalavipallāsānaṁ vikkhambhanaṁ pahānaṁ paccayo.
analyzed: yam manassa pasādane idam assa citta vipallāsa ppahānam ti akusala vipallāsānam vikkhambhanam pahānam paccayaḥ

original: Tīṇi kusalamūlāni yo anāvilacittasaṅkappo, so tassa manasikāroti vuccati.
analyzed: tīṇi kusala mūlāni yaḥ anāvila citta saṅkappo so tassa manasikāro ti vuccati

original: Yaṁ kilesehi vikkhambhanaṁ iti vipallāsā ca ārammaṇā sappaccayatāya paccayo kusalamūlāni ca sandissayatāya paccayo, so ca manasikāro hetunā iminā paccayena cittaṁ uppannaṁ.
analyzed: yam kilesehi vikkhambhanam iti vipallāsā ca ārammaṇā sappaccaya tāya paccayaḥ kusala mūlāni ca sandissaya tāya paccayaḥ saḥ ca manasikāraḥ hetunā iminā paccayena cittam uppanna

original: Tattha yaṁ sasatthārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ pavattaṁ ayaṁ buddhānussati.
analyzed: tattha yam sa sattha ārammaṇam cittam pavattam ayam buddha anussati

original: Yampi bhagavato guṇe manasi karoti, ayamassa dhammānussati.
analyzed: yam pi bhagavataḥ guṇe manasi karoti ayam assa dhamma anussati

original: Tattha satisampajaññaṁ hetu, ayañca paccayo.
analyzed: tattha sati sampajaññam hetu ayam ca paccayo

original: Vācā paññā hetu vitakkavicārā paccayo.
analyzed: vācā paññā hetu vitakka vicārā paccayo

original: Kāyasaṅkhārā kammassa abhisaṅkhāro nāma hetu vā appaccayo sukhavedanīyassa kammassa upacayo hetukā kammassa paccayo.
analyzed: kāya saṅkhārā kammassa abhisaṅkhāraḥ nāma hetu vā appaccayaḥ sukha vedanīyassa kammassa upacayaḥ hetukā kammassa paccayo

original: Tattha katamo samāropano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ samāropanaḥ hāro

original: Manasāyeva pasannena satoyevettha pasanno api ca cittavodānā sattā vimuccantīti tena
analyzed: manasā iva pasannena satas yā iva itthā pasannaḥ api ca citta vodānāḥ sattāḥ vimuccanti iti tena

original: sattā cittapubbaṅgamā cittena pasannena cetanāpi tattha cittabhūtā bhavantīti paṭighā
analyzed: sattā citta pubbaṅgamā cittena pasannena cetanā api tattha citta bhūtā bhavanti iti paṭighā

original: ayaṁ cetanānaṁ pasādena kāyo cassa pasādo, so ca ārabhati pasādena pasanno saññānanti
analyzed: ayam cetanānam pasādena kāyo ca assa pasādo so ca ārabhati pasādena pasanno saññānan ti

original: cassa aviparītā, so pañcavidho vikkhambhanā, kāyapassambhanāyeva pasādo cittasito
analyzed: cassa aviparītā so pañcavidhaḥ vikkhambhanā kāya passambhanāya iva pasādaḥ citta sito

original: cittaṁ pana pubbaṁyeva pasannaṁ.
analyzed: cittam pana pubbayā iva pasanna

original: Ayaṁ samāropanā.
analyzed: ayam samāropanā

original: Evaṁ pañcannampi pasādo.
analyzed: evam pasādaḥ

original: Tato naṁ sukhamanvetīti katamaṁ bhagavā niddisati?
analyzed: tatas nam sukham anveti iti katamam bhagavā niddisati

original: Na hi attasaccaṁ tassa kammassa vipāko anveti.
analyzed: na hi atta saccam tassa kammassa vipākaḥ anveti

original: Tassa upāyo anugacchati yadā sitapaccayā uppajjate somanassaṁ avippaṭisāropi anveti.
analyzed: tassa upāyaḥ anugacchati yadā sita paccayā uppajjate somanassam a vippaṭisāraḥ api anveti

original: Ayaṁ samāropano hāro.
analyzed: ayam samāropanaḥ hāraḥ

original: Mahānāmasakkassa suttaṁ.
analyzed: mahānāmasakkassa sutta

original: Tasmiñce samaye assato asampajāno kālaṁ kareyya kāme bhavati.
analyzed: tasmin ce samaye assataḥ asampajānaḥ kālam kareyya kāme bhavati

original: Assato abhisamāhāro yo mā bhāyi, mahānāma, yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ dīgharattaṁ saddhāparibhāvitaṁ sīlaparibhāvitaṁ sutacāgaparibhāvitanti vitthārena kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: assataḥ abhisamāhāraḥ yaḥ mā bhāyi mahā nāma yam tam cittam dīgharattam saddhā paribhāvitam sīla paribhāvitam suta cāga paribhāvitanti vitthārena kātabba

original: Cāgena ca paññāya ca kiṁ dasseti?
analyzed: cāgena ca paññāya ca kim dasseti

original: Yā saddhā, sā cetaso pasādo.
analyzed: yā saddhā sā cetasaḥ pasādaḥ

original: Yā anāvilasaṅkappitā, sā saddhā.
analyzed: yā anāvila saṅkappitā sā saddhā

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Anāvilalakkhaṇā.
analyzed: anāvila lakkhaṇā

original: Anāvilalakkhaṇā hi saddhā.
analyzed: anāvila lakkhaṇā hi saddhā

original: Apare āhu guṇaparisuddhiniṭṭhāgamanalakkhaṇā, yañca apare vā vacanapaṭiggahalakkhaṇā saddhā.
analyzed: apare āhu guṇa parisuddhi niṭṭhā gamana lakkhaṇā yañca apare vā vacana paṭiggaha lakkhaṇā saddhā

original: Aparo pariyāyo attānaṁ yadi evaṁ okappeti “nāhaṁ kiñci jānāmīti esā ahaṁ tattha anuññattā anaññatā”ti.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ attānam yadi evam okappeti na aham kiñci jānāmi iti esā aham tattha anuññattā anaññatā ti

original: Ayaṁ saddhāti.
analyzed: ayam saddhāti

original: Aparo pariyāyo ekasaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatānaṁ ādīnavānupassanā aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ eka saṭṭhiyā diṭṭhi gatānam ādīnava anupassanā aniccam dukkham anattā ti

original: Tena ca padiṭṭhaṁ bhavati yathā gambhīre udapāne udakaṁ cakkhunā passati na ca kāyena abhisambhunāti.
analyzed: tena ca padiṭṭham bhavati yathā gambhīre udapāne udakam cakkhunā passati na ca kāyena abhisambhunāti

original: Evamassa ariyā nijjhānakkhantiyā diṭṭhi bhavati, na ca sacchikatā.
analyzed: evam assa ariyā nijjhāna kkhantiyā diṭṭhi bhavati na ca sacchikatā

original: Ayaṁ vuccati saddhā.
analyzed: ayam vuccati saddhā

original: Sā ca lokikā.
analyzed: sā ca lokikā

original: Aparo pariyāyo khamati puthujjanabhūtassa vīsati cāti ko sakkāyādhīnā na niveso.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ khamati puthujjana bhūtassa ca ati ko sakkāya adhīnā na niveso

original: Na etaṁ ekanti nayasaññā yathābhūtaṁ diṭṭhiyā tu khalu mudūhi pañcahi indriyehi dassanamaggena pahīnā bhavanti.
analyzed: na etam ekam ti naya saññā yathābhūtam diṭṭhiyā tu khalu mudūhi pañcahi indriyehi dassana maggena pahīnāḥ bhavanti

original: Diṭṭhekaṭṭhā ca kilesā, ayaṁ saddhā.
analyzed: diṭṭhekaṭṭhā ca kilesāḥ ayam saddhā

original: Sotāpattaṅgamadukkhāyaṁ bhūmiyaṁ paripuṇṇā vuccati.
analyzed: sotāpatta aṅgama dukkhāyam bhūmiyam paripuṇṇā vuccati

original: Tasmiṁyeva bhūmiyaṁ sekkhasīlaṁ ariyā dhāranti vuccati.
analyzed: tasmiyā iva bhūmiyam sekkha sīlam ariyāḥ dhāranti vuccati

original: Tasmiṁyeva bhūmiyaṁ mudupaññā paññindriyanti vuccati.
analyzed: tasmiyā iva bhūmiyam mudu paññā paññindriyanti vuccati

original: Tasmiṁyeva bhūmiyaṁ khandhehi anatthikatā, ayaṁ cāgo.
analyzed: tasmiyā iva bhūmiyam khandhehi anatthika tā ayam ca āgo

original: Tasmā saddhā cāgādhiṭṭhānena niddisitabbā.
analyzed: tasmā saddhā cāga adhiṭṭhānena niddisitabbā

original: Yatikena bhiyyo manena sā hissa viparītā diṭṭhikā assaddhā, sā nayanaupadhīsu pamattā samādinnā.
analyzed: yatikena bhiyyas manena sā hissa viparītā diṭṭhikā assaddhā sā nayana opadhīsu pamattā samādinnā

original: Tattha saddhindriyaṁ yo kāmaṁ parivissanti iti santapāpapaṭinissaggā na cāgādhiṭṭhānaṁ paññindriyena paññādhiṭṭhānaṁ, sīlena upasamādhiṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tattha saddhi indriyam yo kāmam parivissanti iti santa pāpa paṭinissaggā na cāga adhiṭṭhānam paññindriyena paññā adhiṭṭhāna sīlena upasama adhiṭṭhāna

original: Ime cattāro dhammā sīlaṁ paribhāvayanti saddhā sīlaṁ cāgo ca paññāti.
analyzed: ime cattāro dhammā sīlam paribhāvayanti saddhā sīlam ca āgo ca paññā ti

original: Tattha saddhāya oghaṁ tarati.
analyzed: tattha saddhāya ogham tarati

original: Yaṁ sīlaṁ, ayaṁ appamādo.
analyzed: yam sīla ayam appamādaḥ

original: Yo cāgo, idaṁ paññāya kammaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ ca āgaḥ idam paññāya kamma

original: Yā paññā, idaṁ paññindriyaṁ, tattha yaṁ saddhindriyaṁ.
analyzed: yā paññā idam paññindriya tattha yam saddhindriya

original: Taṁ tīsu aveccappasādesu.
analyzed: tam tīsu avecca ppasādesu

original: Yaṁ sīlaṁ, taṁ saddhindriyesu.
analyzed: yam sīla tam saddhindriyesu

original: Yo cāgo, so catūsu jhānesu.
analyzed: yaḥ cāgaḥ saḥ catūsu jhānesu

original: Yā paññā, sā saccesu, sati sabbatthagāminī.
analyzed: yā paññā sā saccesu sati sabbattha gāminī

original: Tassa sekkhassa bhaddikā bhati, bhaddiko abhisamparāyo.
analyzed: tassa sekkhassa bhaddikā bhati bhaddikaḥ abhisamparāyaḥ

original: Tassa sammuṭṭhassatikassa sīlaṁ karontassa na kāyasammuṭṭhassatitāya tāni vā indriyāni taṁ vā kusalamūlaṁ kammavipākaṁ bhavati.
analyzed: tassa sammuṭṭha ssatikassa sīlam karontassa na kāya sammuṭṭha ssati tāya tāni vā indriyāni tam vā kusala mūlam kamma vipākam bhavati

original: Tassa tikassa atthaniddeso.
analyzed: tassa tikassa attha niddesaḥ

original: Tattha saddhā sīlaṁ cāgo paññā cattāro dhammā.
analyzed: tattha saddhā sīlam cāgaḥ paññā cattāro dhammā

original: Yā saddhā yā ca paññā, idaṁ manosucaritaṁ.
analyzed: yā saddhā yā ca paññā idam

original: Yaṁ sīlaṁ, idaṁ kāyikaṁ vācasikaṁ sucaritaṁ.
analyzed: yam sīlaḥ idam kāyikam vācasikam

original: Yo cāgo, idaṁ cetasikaṁ alobho sucaritaṁ.
analyzed: idam cetasikam

original: Iti citte gahite pañcakkhandhā gahitā bhavanti.
analyzed: iti citte gahite pañca kkhandhāḥ gahitāḥ bhavanti

original: Imehi dhammehi sucaritaṁ idaṁ dukkhañca ariyasaccaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ maggassa.
analyzed: imehi dhammehi su caritam idam dukkham ca ariya saccam padaṭṭhānam maggassa

original: Tattha katamo vicayo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ hāro

original: Yā ca saddhā yañca sīlaṁ.
analyzed: yā ca saddhā yat ca sīla

original: Taṁ kissa karoti?
analyzed: tam kis sa karoti

original: Yā saddhā tāya bhagavantaṁ anussarati mattenapi hatthinā samāgatā, assa bho kukkurā
analyzed: yā saddhā tāya bhagavantam anussarati mattena api hatthinā samāgatā bho kukkurā

original: sabbaṁ sīlena nappaṭipajjati kāyena vā vācāya vā ṭhānaṁ visārado bhavatīti avippaṭisārī
analyzed: sabbam sīlena na paṭipajjati kāyena vā vācāya vā ṭhānam visāradaḥ bhavati iti a vippaṭisārī

original: paññā yassa paññattaṁ upaṭṭhapeti.
analyzed: paññā yassa paññattam upaṭṭhapeti

original: Tassa akhaṇḍassa sīlaṁ yaṁ na pacchi tassaṁ mohassa akusalacittaṁ uppajjati micchādiṭṭhisahagataṁ vā, ayaṁ vicayo hāro.
analyzed: tassa akhaṇḍassa sīlam yam na mohassa akusala cittam uppajjati micchādiṭṭhi sahagatam vā ayam vicayaḥ hāro

original: Dhammavādino bhaddikārāti bhavissati atthi esā yutti.
analyzed: dhammavādinaḥ bhaddikārāti bhavissati atthi esā yutti

original: Tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ padaṭṭhānaḥ hāro

original: Yamidaṁ cittaṁ dīgharattaṁ paribhāvitaṁ saddhāya sīlena cāgena paññāya samādhinā paṭhamajjhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: yam idam cittam dīgharattam paribhāvitam saddhāya sīlena cāgena paññāya samādhinā paṭhama jhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Yā saddhā assa anāvilasaṅkappo, taṁ dutiyajjhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: yā saddhā assa anāvila saṅkappo tam dutiya jhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Tīṇi ca aveccappasādā yaṁ sīlaṁ, taṁ ariyakantaṁ, taṁ sīlakkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tīṇi ca avecca ppasādā yam tam tam sīlakkhandhassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Yā paññā, sā paññākkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: yā paññā sā paññā kkhandhassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Ime ca dhammā idañca cittaṁ ekodibhūtasamādhissa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: ime ca dhammā idam ca cittam ekodibhūta samādhissa padaṭṭhāna

original: Saddhā saddhindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: saddhā saddhā indriyassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Cāgo samādhindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: samādhi indriyassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Paññā paññindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: paññā paññindriyassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Saddhā ca paññā ca vipassanāya padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: saddhā ca paññā ca vipassanāya padaṭṭhāna

original: Sīlañca cāgo ca samathassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: sīlañca cāgaḥ ca samathassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Saddhā ca paññā ca avijjā virāgāya paññāvimuttiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: saddhā ca paññā ca avijjā virāgāya paññā vimuttiyāḥ padaṭṭhāna

original: Sīlañca cāgo ca rāgavirāgāya cetovimuttiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: sīlam ca cāgo ca rāga virāgāya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Viññāṇe vutte saddhāsatibhāvite sabbe pañcakkhandhā vuttā bhavanti.
analyzed: viññāṇe vutte saddhā sati bhāvite sabbe pañca kkhandhāḥ vuttāḥ bhavanti

original: Saddhāya bhaṇitāya sabbāni satta dhanāni bhaṇitāni honti saddhādhanaṁ …pe…
analyzed: saddhāya bhaṇitāya sabbāni satta dhanāni bhaṇitāni honti saddhā dhanam pe

original: sīlakkhandhe vutte samādhikkhandho ca paññākkhandho ca vuttā bhavanti.
analyzed: sīla kkhandhe vutte samādhi kkhandho ca paññā kkhandho ca vuttāḥ bhavanti

original: Yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ dīgharattaṁ paribhāvitaṁ pacchimake kāle na tadanuparivatti bhavissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: yam tam cittam dīgharattam paribhāvitam pacchimake kāle na tad anuparivatti bhavissati iti na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Tattha saññāpi tadanuparivattinī bhavati.
analyzed: tattha saññā api tad anuparivattinī bhavati

original: Yepi tajjātikā dhammā, tepi tadanuparivattino bhavanti.
analyzed: ye pi tad jātikāḥ dhammāḥ te pi tad anuparivattinaḥ bhavanti

original: Rūpasaññā rūpasañcetanānupassanamanasikāro evaṁ channaṁ āyatanānaṁ viññāṇakāye, ayaṁ lakkhaṇo hāro.
analyzed: rūpa saññā rūpa sañcetanā anupassana manasikāraḥ evam channam āyatanānam viññāṇa kāye ayam lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ hāro

original: Idha sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: idha sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye bhaddikaṁ bhatiṁ ākaṅkheyya bhaddikañca abhisamparāyaṁ, te saddhaṁ sīlaṁ cāgaṁ paññañca manasi karissanti, ayaṁ adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye bhaddikam bhatim ākaṅkheyya bhaddikam ca abhisamparāya te saddham sīlam cāgam paññam ca manasi karissanti ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye caññepi sattā tathāgatassa sammukhaṁ na paṭiyujjhante, imaṁ dhammaṁ sotā avippaṭisārato kālaṁ karissantīti, ayaṁ adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye ca aññe pi sattā tathāgatassa sammukham na paṭiyujjhante imam dhammam sotāḥ a vippaṭisārataḥ kālam karissanti iti ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ āvaṭṭaḥ hāro

original: Idampi cattāro dhammā saddhā ca paññā ca assaddhiyañca avijjañca hananti.
analyzed: idam pi cattāro dhammā saddhā ca paññā ca assaddhiyam ca avijjañca hananti

original: Sīlañca cāgo ca taṇhā ca dosañca hananti.
analyzed: sīlam ca ca ago ca taṇhā ca dosam ca hananti

original: Tassa dve mūlāni pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa dve mūlāni pahīyanti

original: Dukkhaṁ nivatteti appahīnabhūmiyañca dvimūlāni pañcakkhandhā.
analyzed: dukkham nivatteti appahīna bhūmiyam ca dvi mūlāni pañca kkhandhā

original: Dve ariyasaccāni samatho ca vipassanā ca.
analyzed: dve ariya saccāni ca vipassanā ca

original: Dvinnaṁ mūlānaṁ pahānaṁ.
analyzed: dvinnam mūlānam pahāna

original: Imāni dve saccāni nirodho ca maggo ca.
analyzed: imāni dve saccāni nirodho ca maggo ca

original: Ayaṁ āvaṭṭo hāro.
analyzed: ayam āvaṭṭaḥ hāraḥ

original: Tattha katamo vibhatti?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ

original: Yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ saddhāparibhāvitaṁ …pe…
analyzed: yam tam cittam saddhā paribhāvitam pe

original: sace puthujjanassa tassapi bhaddikā bhati bhavissatīti na ekaṁsena tassa kammaṁ diṭṭheyeva dhamme vipākanti paccessati, aparamhi vā pariyāye bhavissati.
analyzed: sace puthujjanassa tassa api bhaddikā bhati bhavissati iti na ekasena tassa kammam diṭṭheya iva dhamme vipākanti paccessati aparamhi vā pariyāye bhavissati

original: Yaṁ vā atītaṁ vipākāya paccupaṭṭhitaṁ, tappaccayāni cetāni, ye yathā mahākammavibhaṅge “tenāyaṁ vibhajjabyākaraṇiyo niddeso dhammacārino yā bhaddikā bhatī”ti.
analyzed: yam vā atītam vipākāya tad paccayāni ye yathā mahā kamma vibhaṅge tena ayam vibhajja byākaraṇiyaḥ niddesaḥ dhamma cārinaḥ yā bhaddikā bhati iti

original: Tattha katamā parivattanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā parivattanā

original: Assaddhiyaṁ dussīlyaṁ yaṁ maccheraṁ duppaññaṁ ca yañca paṭipakkhena pahīnā bhavanti, ayaṁ parivattanā.
analyzed: assaddhiyam dussīlyam yam maccheram duppaññam ca yam ca paṭipakkhena pahīnāḥ bhavanti ayam parivattanā

original: Tattha katamaṁ vevacanaṁ?
analyzed: tat tha katamam vevacana

original: Yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ dīgharattaṁ paribhāvitaṁ cittaṁ manoviññāṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: yam tam cittam dīgharattam paribhāvitam cittam manaḥ viññāṇam pe

original: yaṁ saddhābalaṁ saddhindriyaṁ, yaṁ sīlaṁ taṁ sucaritaṁ, saṁyamo niyamo damo khandhatā imāni tassa vevacanāni.
analyzed: yam saddhā balam saddhi indriya yam sīlam tam su carita sayamaḥ niyamaḥ damaḥ imāni tassa vevacanāni

original: Yo cāgo so paṭinissaggo alobho vosaggo cāgoyiṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ cāgaḥ so paṭinissaggo alobhaḥ vosaggo

original: Yā paññā sā paññattā paññappabhā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ.
analyzed: yā paññā sā paññattā pañña ppabhā paññindriyam paññā bala

original: Tattha katamā paññatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā paññatti

original: Yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ bījaṁ paññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: yam tam cittam bījam paññattiyā paññatta

original: Paribhāvanā vāsanā paññattiyā paññatti.
analyzed: paribhāvanā vāsanā paññattiyā paññatti

original: Saddhā pasādapaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: saddhā pasāda paññattiyā paññattā

original: Sīlaṁ sucaritapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: sīlam su carita paññattiyā paññatta

original: Cāgo puññakiriyapaññattiyā paññatto.
analyzed: cāgaḥ puñña kiriya paññattiyā paññattaḥ

original: Paññā vīmaṁsapaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: paññā vīmasa paññattiyā paññattā

original: Ime tayo dhammā saddhā sīlaṁ cāgo paññavato pārisuddhiṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: ime tayo dhammā saddhā sīlam cāgaḥ paññavataḥ pārisuddhim gacchanti

original: Tattha katamo otaraṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ

original: Yaṁ cittaṁ, taṁ khandhesu viññāṇakkhandho, dhātūsu manoviññāṇadhātu, āyatanesu manāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: yam tam khandhesu viññāṇa kkhandhaḥ dhātūsu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu āyatanesu mana āyatana

original: Ye cattāro dhammā, te khandhesu saṅkhārakkhandhe pariyāpannā …pe…
analyzed: ye cattāro dhammā te khandhesu saṅkhāra khandhe pariyāpannā pe

original: dhātūsu āyatanesu.
analyzed: dhātūsu āyatanesu

original: Tattha katamo sodhano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhanaḥ hāro

original: Idaṁ bhagavato bhāsitaṁ mahānāmena sakkena pucchitena sabbaṁ taṁ niyuttaṁ.
analyzed: idam bhagavataḥ bhāsitam mahānāmena sakkena pucchitena sabbam tam niyutta

original: Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ adhiṭṭhāno

original: Idaṁ cittaṁ vemattatāya paññattaṁ akusalehi cittehi aparibhāvitehi paribhāvitanti
analyzed: idam cittam vemattatāya paññattam akusalehi cittehi a paribhāvitehi paribhāvitanti

original: yāni puna paribhāvitāni aññesampi tattha upādāya paññattaṁ sabbepime cattāro dhammā
analyzed: yāni puna paribhāvitāni aññesam pi tattha upādāya paññattam sabbe pi me cattāro dhammā

original: ekattatāya paññattā.
analyzed: ekatta tāya paññattā

original: Bhaddikā bhatīti kāmabhogino teva rūpadhātu arūpadhātu manussāti sabbā bhaddikā bhati tadeva kathāya paññattaṁ, ayaṁ paññatti.
analyzed: bhaddikā bhati iti kāmabhogino teva rūpa dhātu arūpa dhātu manussā ati sabbā bhaddikā bhati tat eva kathāya paññatta ayam paññatti

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāro

original: Cittassa indriyāni paccayo ādhipateyyapaccayatāya manasikāro.
analyzed: cittassa indriyāni paccayaḥ ādhipateyya paccaya tāya manasikāraḥ

original: Hetupaccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: hetu paccaya tāya paccayaḥ

original: Saddhāya lokikā paññā hetupaccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: saddhāya lokikā paññā hetu paccaya tāya paccayaḥ

original: Yoniso ca manasikāro paccayo.
analyzed: yoniso ca manasikāro paccayo

original: Sīlassa patirūpadesavāso paccayo.
analyzed: sīlassa patirūpadesa vāso paccayo

original: Attasammāpaṇidhānañca hetu.
analyzed: hetu

original: Cāgassa alobho hetu.
analyzed: cāgassa alobho hetu

original: Avippaṭisāro ca hetupaccayo.
analyzed: a vippaṭisāro ca hetu paccayo

original: Paññā parato ca ghoso ajjhattañca yoniso manasikāro hetupaccayo ca.
analyzed: paññā paratas ca ghosaḥ ajjhattam ca yonisas manasikāro hetu paccayo ca

original: Tattha katamo samāropano?
analyzed: tattha katamo samāropano

original: Yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ dīgharattaṁ paribhāvitanti cetasikāpi.
analyzed: yam tam cittam dīgharattam cetasikā api

original: Ettha sabbe dhammā paribhāvitā bhaddikā te bhati bhavissati, bhaddikā upapattiko abhisamparāyo.
analyzed: ettha sabbe dhammā paribhāvitāḥ bhaddikā te bhati bhavissati bhaddikā upapattikaḥ abhisamparāyo

original: Iti ye keci manussakā upabhogaparibhogā sabbe bhaddikā bhatiyeva, ayaṁ samāropano.
analyzed: iti ye keci manussakā upabhoga paribhogā sabbe bhaddikā ayam samāropanaḥ

original: Uddhaṁ adho sabbadhi vītarāgoti gāthā.
analyzed: uddham adhas sabbadhi vīta rāgo ti gāthā

original: Tattha kiṁ uddhaṁ nāma?
analyzed: tattha kim uddham nāma

original: Yaṁ ito uddhaṁ bhavissati anāgāmī, idaṁ uddhaṁ.
analyzed: yam itas uddham bhavissati anāgāmī idam uddha

original: Adho nāma yamatikkantamatītaṁ, idamavoca apadānatanti uddhaṁ.
analyzed: adhas nāma yam atikkantam atītaḥ idam avoca uddha

original: Tattha atītena sassatadiṭṭhi pubbantākappikānaṁ aparantadiṭṭhi kesañci, ucchedadiṭṭhiṁ yaṁ vuttakappikānaṁ imā ceva diṭṭhiyo ucchedadiṭṭhi ca sassatadiṭṭhi ca.
analyzed: tattha atītena sassata diṭṭhi pubbanta ākappikānam aparanta diṭṭhi kesañci uccheda diṭṭhim yam vutta kappikānam imāḥ ca iva diṭṭhiyaḥ uccheda diṭṭhi ca sassata diṭṭhi ca

original: Tatthāyaṁ sassatadiṭṭhi imāni pannarasa padāni sakkāyadiṭṭhi sassataṁ bhajanti.
analyzed: tattha ayam sassata diṭṭhi imāni pannarasa padāni sakkāya diṭṭhi sassatam bhajanti

original: Rūpavantaṁ me attā, attani me rūpaṁ, rūpaṁ me attāti yaduccate paññaṁ paridahanti.
analyzed: rūpavantam me attā attani me rūpa rūpam me attā ati yat uccate paññam paridahanti

original: Yā ucchedadiṭṭhi sā pañcasatāni ucchedaṁ bhajanti.
analyzed: yā ucchedadiṭṭhi sā pañca satāni ucchedam bhajanti

original: Te “taṁ jīvaṁ taṁ sarīran”ti passanti, rūpaṁ me attāti tathārūpā catubbidhā sakkāyadiṭṭhi ucchedena ca sassatena ca.
analyzed: te tam jīvam tam sarīranti passanti rūpam me attā ati tathārūpā catubbidhā sa kāyadiṭṭhi ucchedena ca sassatena ca

original: Evaṁ pañcasu khandhesu vīsativatthukāya diṭṭhiyā pannarasa padāni pubbantaṁ bhajanti.
analyzed: evam pañcasu khandhesu vīsati vatthukāya diṭṭhiyā pannarasa padāni pubbantam bhajanti

original: Sassatadiṭṭhiyā pañca padāni aparantaṁ bhajanti ucchedadiṭṭhiyā.
analyzed: pañca padāni aparantam bhajanti uccheda diṭṭhiyā

original: Tattha “ayamahamasmī”ti passantā rūpaṁ attato samanupassati, so ucchedavādī rūpavantañca
analyzed: tattha ayam aham asmi iti passantā rūpam attataḥ samanupassati saḥ uccheda vādī rūpavantam ca

original: attānaṁ, attani ca rūpaṁ, rūpasmiṁ vā attāti so passati cāti iti ucchedadiṭṭhi ca,
analyzed: attāna attani ca rūpa rūpasmim vā attā ati so passati ca ati iti uccheda diṭṭhi ca

original: attato paṭissarati sassatadiṭṭhi pubbantato ca paṭissarati.
analyzed: attataḥ paṭissarati sassata diṭṭhi pubba antataḥ ca paṭissarati

original: “Ayamahamasmī”ti na samanupassati.
analyzed: ayam aham asmi iti na samanupassati

original: Tassa diṭṭhāsavā pahānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa diṭṭha āsavā pahānam gacchanti

original: Yo tīsu addhāsu pubbante ca aparante ca tena tena niddiṭṭhānena uddhaṁ adho sabbadhi
analyzed: yaḥ tīsu addhāsu pubba ante ca apara ante ca tena tena uddham adhas sabbadhi

original: vītarāgo “ahamasmī”ti na anupassatīti iminā dvārena iminā payogena iminā upāyena
analyzed: vīta rāgaḥ aham asmi iti na anupassati iti iminā dvārena iminā payogena iminā upāyena

original: idaṁ dassanabhūmi ca sotāpattiphalañca so ariyo payogo anabhāvaṅgatena saṁsārena
analyzed: idam dassana bhūmi ca sa utāpatti phalam ca saḥ ariyaḥ payogaḥ sa sārena

original: apunabbhavāti yo koci ariyo payogo punabbhavāya mudūni vā pañcindriyāni majjhāni
analyzed: a punar bhavāti yaḥ koci ariyaḥ payogaḥ punabbhavāya mudūni vā pañca indriyāni majjhāni

original: adhimattāni vā sabbaṁ apunabbhavappahānāya saṁvattanti.
analyzed: adhimattāni vā sabbam apunabbhava ppahānāya savattanti

original: Ahanti diṭṭhogho kāmogho bhavogho avijjogho ca odhiso.
analyzed: diṭṭha oghaḥ kāma oghaḥ bhava oghaḥ avijja oghaḥ ca odhiso

original: Tattha desanāhārena cattāri saccāni pañcahi indriyehi sotāpattiphalena ca dve saccāni maggo ca nirodho ca.
analyzed: tattha desanā āhārena cattāri saccāni pañcahi indriyehi sotāpatti phalena ca dve saccāni maggo ca nirodho ca

original: Sakkāyasamudayena dve saccāni dukkhañca samudayo ca, ayaṁ desanā hāro.
analyzed: sakkāya samudayena dve saccāni dukkham ca samudayo ca ayam desanā hāro

original: Tattha katamo vicayo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ

original: “Ayamahamasmī”ti asamanupassanto tīṇi dassanappahātabbāni saṁyojanāni pajahati.
analyzed: ayam aham asmi iti a samanupassantaḥ tīṇi dassana pahātabbāni sayojanāni pajahati

original: Ayaṁ vicayo.
analyzed: ayam vicayaḥ

original: Tattha katamā yutti?
analyzed: tattha katamā yutti

original: Tividhā puggalā koci ugghaṭitaññū koci vipañcitaññū koci neyyo.
analyzed: tividhā puggalā koci ugghaṭita ññū koci vipañcita ññū koci neyyaḥ

original: Ugghaṭitaññū tikkhindriyo ca tato vipañcitaññū mudindriyo tato mudindriyehi neyyo.
analyzed: tikkha indriyo ca tatas mud indriyo tatas mud indriyehi neyyaḥ

original: Tattha ugghaṭitaññū tikkhindriyatāya dassanabhūmimāgamma sotāpattiphalaṁ pāpuṇāti, ekabījako bhavati.
analyzed: tattha ugghaṭita ññū tikkhindriya tāya dassana bhūmim āgamma sotāpatti phalam pāpuṇāti eka bījakaḥ bhavati

original: Ayaṁ paṭhamo sotāpanno.
analyzed: ayam paṭhamaḥ sotāpannaḥ

original: Vipañcitaññū mudūhi indriyehi dassanabhūmimāgamma sotāpattiphalaṁ pāpuṇāti, kolaṅkolo ca hoti.
analyzed: vipañcitaññū mudūhi indriyehi dassana bhūmim āgamma sotāpatti phalam pāpuṇāti kolaṅkolo ca hoti

original: Ayaṁ dutiyo sotāpanno.
analyzed: ayam dutiyaḥ sotāpannaḥ

original: Tattha neyyo dassanabhūmimāgamma sotāpattiphalaṁ pāpuṇāti, sattakkhattuparamo ca bhavati.
analyzed: tattha neyyaḥ dassana bhūmim āgamma sotāpatti phalam pāpuṇāti satta kkhattu paramaḥ ca bhavati

original: Ayaṁ tatiyo sotāpanno.
analyzed: ayam tatiyaḥ sotāpannaḥ

original: Atthi esā yutti mudumajjhādhimattehi indriyehi mudumajjhādhimattaṁ bhūmiṁ sacchikareyya sakkāyadiṭṭhippahānena vā diṭṭhigatāni pajahati.
analyzed: atthi esā yutti mudu majjha adhimattehi indriyehi mudu majjha adhimattam bhūmim sacchikareyya sakkāya diṭṭhi ppahānena vā diṭṭhi gatāni pajahati

original: Ayaṁ yutti.
analyzed: ayam

original: Tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ padaṭṭhāno

original: Tattha sakkāyadiṭṭhi sabbamicchādiṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tattha sakkāyadiṭṭhi sabbamicchādiṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhāna

original: Sakkāyo nāmarūpassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: sakkāyaḥ nāma rūpassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Nāmarūpaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: nāma rūpam sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhāna

original: Pañca indriyāni rūpīni rūparāgassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: pañca indriyāni rūpīni rūparāgassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Saḷāyatanaṁ ahaṅkārassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: saḷāyatanam ahaṅkārassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇo

original: Dvīsu diṭṭhīsu pahīnāsu tattha ekā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni pahānaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: dvīsu diṭṭhīsu pahīnāsu tattha ekā diṭṭhi diṭṭhi gatāni pahānam gacchanti

original: Uddhaṁ ca adho ca vītarāgo sabbarajanīyesu vītarāgo hoti.
analyzed: uddham ca adho ca vīta rāgo sabba rajanīyesu vīta rāgaḥ hoti

original: Tajjā parabhūmiyaṁ, idaṁ paccayanti yathābhūtaṁ passati.
analyzed: tad jā para bhūmiyaḥ idam paccayanti yathābhūtam passati

original: So sabbapaṭiccasamuppādaṁ āmasati.
analyzed: so sabba paṭiccasamuppādam āmasati
