analyzed: ayam lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ hāro

original: Imamhi sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: imamhi sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye sattā ye nābhiramissanti, te diṭṭhippahānāya vāyamissanti.
analyzed: ye sattāḥ ye na abhiramissanti te diṭṭhi ppahānāya vā āyamissanti

original: Ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
analyzed: ayam ettha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ayaṁ catubyūho hāro.
analyzed: ayam catu byūhaḥ

original: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ āvaṭṭaḥ hāro

original: Yānimāni mudūni pañcindriyāni tāni orambhāgiyāni pañcindriyāni.
analyzed: yāni imāni mudūni pañca indriyāni tāni orambhāgiyāni pañca indriyāni

original: Sabbena sabbaṁ samūhananti abhijjhābyāpādo ca bhāvanākārena sekkhāya vimuttiyā balaṁ
analyzed: sabbena sabbam samūhananti abhijjhā byāpādaḥ ca bhāvanā ākārena sekkhāya vimuttiyā

original: saddhā, uddhambhāgiyāni diṭṭhivasena balaṁ saddhā, vīriyindriyaṁ ārabhitattā satindriyaṁ
analyzed: saddhā uddhambhāgiyāni diṭṭhi vasena balam saddhā vīriya indriyam

original: paggahitattā accantaṁ niṭṭhaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: paggahita ttāḥ accantam niṭṭham gacchanti

original: Tattha yāni indriyāni, ayaṁ maggo saṅkilesappahānaṁ.
analyzed: tattha yāni indriyāni ayam maggo saṅkilesa ppahāna

original: Ayaṁ nirodho āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo, idaṁ dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: ayam nirodhaḥ āyatim an uppāda dhammaḥ idam dukkha

original: Ayaṁ āvaṭṭo hāro.
analyzed: ayam āvaṭṭaḥ hāraḥ

original: Tattha katamo vibhatti hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vibhatti hāro

original: “Ayamahamasmī”ti yo samanupassati, so ca kho adhimattena lokikā yaṁ bhūmiyaṁ na tu ariyena payogena so sakkāyadiṭṭhi pajahati.
analyzed: ayam aham asmi iti yaḥ samanupassati so ca kho adhimattena lokikā yam bhūmiyam na tu ariyena payogena so sakkāyadiṭṭhi pajahati

original: Yaṁ vuccati tajjāya bhūmiyā adhimattāya.
analyzed: yam vuccati tad jāya bhūmiyai adhimattāya

original: Tattha tajjāya bhūmiyaṁ pañcahi ākārehi adhimattataṁ paṭilabhati sīlena vatena bāhusaccena samādhinā nekkhammasukhena.
analyzed: tattha tajjāya bhūmiyam pañcahi ākārehi adhimatta tam paṭilabhati sīlena vatena bāhusaccena samādhinā nekkhamma sukhena

original: Tattha appatte pattasaññī adhimānaṁ gaṇhāti.
analyzed: tattha appatte patta saññī adhimānam gaṇhāti

original: Etasmiṁyeva vatthuppattiyaṁ bhagavā idaṁ suttaṁ bhāsati.
analyzed: etasmiya eva vatthu pattiyam bhagavā idam suttam bhāsati

original: Sīlavā vatamattenāti.
analyzed: sīlavā vata mattena ati

original: Tattha yo appatte pattasaññī tassa yo samādhi, so sāmiso kāpurisasevito pana so kāpurisā vuccanti puthujjanā.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ appatte patta saññī tassa yo samādhi so sāmisaḥ kāpurisa sevito pana saḥ kāpurisāḥ vuccanti puthujjanā

original: Āmisaṁ yañca ariyamaggamāgamma lokikā anariyaṁ tena samādhi hoti anariyo kāpurisasevito.
analyzed: āmisam yat ca ariya maggam āgamma lokikāḥ anariyam tena samādhi hoti anariyaḥ kāpurisa sevito

original: Yo pana ariyākārena yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati, so adhigamanaṁ pajahati yo ariyena samādhinā akāpurisasevitena nirāmisena nīyati, tattha akāpurisā vuccanti ariyapuggalā.
analyzed: yaḥ pana ariya ākārena yathābhūtam na jānāti na passati so adhigamanam pajahati yaḥ ariyena samādhinā a kāpurisa sevitena nirāmisena nīyati tattha a kāpurisāḥ vuccanti ariya puggalāḥ

original: Yo tehi sevito samādhi, so akāpurisasevito.
analyzed: yaḥ tehi sevito samādhi saḥ a kāpurisa sevito

original: Tasmā ekaṁ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyaṁ “ayamahamasmī”ti asamanupassanto tathā pāteti.
analyzed: tasmai ekam vibhajja byākaraṇīyam ayam aham asmi iti a samanupassanto tathā pāta iti

original: Tattha katamā parivattanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā parivattanā

original: Imāya dassanabhūmiyā kilesā pahātabbā, tehi pahīyanti aniddiṭṭhāpi bhagavatā niddisitabbā yo.
analyzed: imāya dassana bhūmiyā kilesā pahātabbā tehi pahīyanti aniddiṭṭhā api bhagavatā niddisitabbā yaḥ

original: Tattha katamaṁ vevacanaṁ?
analyzed: tat tha katamam vevacana

original: Yā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā attadiṭṭhiyā.
analyzed: yā sakkāya diṭṭhiyā atta diṭṭhiyā

original: Ayaṁ bhūmi.
analyzed: ayam bhūmi

original: Ye kilesā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ye kilesā pahātabbā

original: Te appahīyanti aniddiṭṭhāpi bhagavatā sassatadiṭṭhi ca ucchedadiṭṭhi ca, sā pariyantadiṭṭhi ca.
analyzed: te appahīyanti an iddiṭṭhā api bhagavatā sassata diṭṭhi ca uccheda diṭṭhi ca sā pariyanta diṭṭhi ca

original: Yā apariyantadiṭṭhi ca, sā sassatadiṭṭhi ca.
analyzed: yā a pariyanta diṭṭhi ca sā sassata diṭṭhi ca

original: Yā ucchedadiṭṭhi, sā natthikā diṭṭhi.
analyzed: yā uccheda diṭṭhi sā natthikā diṭṭhi

original: Yā sassatadiṭṭhi, sā akiriyadiṭṭhi.
analyzed: yā sassata diṭṭhi sā akiriya diṭṭhi

original: Idaṁ vevacanaṁ.
analyzed: idam vevacana

original: Tattha katamā paññatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā paññatti

original: Taṇhā saṁyojanapaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: taṇhā sayojana paññattiyā paññattā

original: Maggo paṭilābhapaññattiyā paññatto.
analyzed: maggaḥ paṭilābha paññattiyā paññattaḥ

original: Indriyā paṭilābhapaññattiyā paññattāti.
analyzed: indriyā paṭilābha paññattiyā paññattā ati

original: Tattha katamo otaraṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ

original: Sakkāyo dukkhaṁ dassanappahātabbo.
analyzed: sakkāyaḥ dukkham dassana ppahātabbaḥ

original: Samudayo maggo.
analyzed: samudayaḥ maggo

original: Indriyāni tāni ca niddiṭṭhāni khandhadhātuāyatanesu.
analyzed: indriyāni tāni ca niddiṭṭhāni khandha dhātu āyatanesu

original: Tattha katamo sodhano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhanaḥ hāro

original: Yañhi ārabbha bhagavatā idaṁ suttaṁ bhāsitaṁ, so ārabbha niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: yat hi ārabbha bhagavatā idam suttam bhāsita saḥ ārabbha niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāro

original: Nāmarūpassa hetupaccayopi viññāṇaṁ hetu bījaṁ.
analyzed: nāma rūpassa hetu paccayaḥ api viññāṇam hetu bīja

original: Tena avijjā ca saṅkhārā ca paccayo.
analyzed: tena avijjā ca saṅkhārā ca paccayo

original: Nivattinayo na aparo pariyāyo sabbabhavo, ye ca sabbabhavassa hetu parabhaṇḍapaccayo iti sammādiṭṭhi parato ca ghoso yoniso ca manasikāro paccayo.
analyzed: nivatti nayaḥ na aparaḥ pariyāyo sabba bhavaḥ ye ca sabba bhavassa hetu parabhaṇḍa paccayo iti sammādiṭṭhi paratas ca ghosaḥ yoniso ca manasikāro paccayo

original: Yā paññā uppādeti, esā hetu sammādiṭṭhiyā sammāsaṅkappo bhavati, yā sammāsamādhi, ayaṁ parikkhāro.
analyzed: yā paññā uppādeti esā hetu sammādiṭṭhiyā sammāsaṅkappaḥ bhavati yā sammāsamādhi ayam parikkhāro

original: Tattha katamo samāropano?
analyzed: tattha katamo samāropano

original: “Ayamahamasmī”ti asamanupassī dukkhato rogato …pe…
analyzed: ayam aham asmi iti a samanupassī dukkhataḥ rogataḥ pe

original: pannarasa padāni.
analyzed: pannarasa padāni

original: Sīlāni bhagavā kimatthiyāni kimānisaṁsāni.
analyzed: sīlāni bhagavā kimatthiyāni kimānisasāni

original: Sīlāni, ānanda, avippaṭisāratthāni yāva vimutti.
analyzed: sīlāni ānanda a vippaṭisāra tthāni yāva vimutti

original: Tattha duvidho attho—
analyzed: tattha duvidhaḥ attho

original: purisattho ca vacanattho ca.
analyzed: purisa attho ca vacana attho ca

original: Tattha katamo purisattho?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ purisattho

original: Yāyaṁ na pacchānutāpitā ayaṁ avippaṭisāro, ayaṁ purisattho.
analyzed: yā ayam na pacchā anutāpitā ayam a vippaṭisāraḥ ayam purisattho

original: Yathā koci brūhayati imatthamāsevati so bhaṇeyya, kiñci mamettha adhīnaṁ tassatthāya idaṁ kiriyaṁ ārabhāmīti.
analyzed: yathā koci brūhayati imattham āsevati saḥ bhaṇeyya kiñci mama ittha adhīnam tassa atthāya idam kiriyam ārabhāmi iti

original: Ayaṁ purisattho.
analyzed: ayam purisattho

original: Tattha katamo vacanattho?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vacana tthaḥ

original: Sīlāni kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā sucaritaṁ avippaṭisāroti.
analyzed: sīlāni kāyikam vā vācasikam vā su caritam a vippaṭisāroti

original: Tattha sīlassa vatassa ca bhāsoyeva.
analyzed: tattha sīlassa vatassa ca

original: Anaññā sugatakammatā sucaritaṁ ayaṁ avippaṭisāro.
analyzed: anaññā sugata kamma tā su caritam ayam a vippaṭisāro

original: Evaṁ yāva vimuttīti ekamekasmiṁ pade dve atthā—
analyzed: evam ekam ekasmin pade dve

original: purisattho ca vacanattho ca, yathā imamhi sutte evaṁ sabbesu suttesu dve dve atthā.
analyzed: purisa attho ca vacana attho ca yathā imamhi sutte evam sabbesu suttesu dve dve atthā

original: Ayaṁ hi paramattho uttamattho ca.
analyzed: ayam hi parama tthaḥ uttama tthaḥ ca

original: Yaṁ nibbānasacchikaṁ nissāya yaṁ sakaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ bhavati, so vuccati katassa katthoti.
analyzed: yam nibbāna sacchikam nissāya yam sakam sacchikātabbam bhavati saḥ vuccati katassa katthā ti

original: Ayaṁ puna vevacanaṁ sampajānāti.
analyzed: ayam punar vevacanam sampajānāti

original: Iminā niyuttatthamabhilabbhanti vacanattho.
analyzed: iminā vacanattho

original: Tattha yaṁ atthaṁ sāvako abhikaṅkhati.
analyzed: tattha yam attham sāvakaḥ abhikaṅkhati

original: Tassa yo paṭilābho, ayaṁ purisattho.
analyzed: tassa yaḥ paṭilābhaḥ ayam purisattho

original: Yaṁ yaṁ bhagavā dhammaṁ deseti, tassa tassa dhammassa yā atthaviññatti.
analyzed: yam yam bhagavā dhammam deseti tassa tassa dhammassa yā attha viññatti

original: Ayaṁ attho, tattha sīlānaṁ avippaṭisāro atthopi ānisaṁsopi.
analyzed: ayam tattha sīlānaṃ a vippaṭisāraḥ attho api ānisasaḥ api

original: Eso ca ānisaṁso yaṁ duggatiṁ na gacchati.
analyzed: yam duggatim na gacchati

original: Yathā taṁ bhagavatā esānisaṁso dhamme suciṇṇe na duggatiṁ gacchati dhammacārī, ayaṁ attho.
analyzed: yathā tam bhagavatā esa anisasaḥ dhamme su ciṇṇe na duggatim gacchati dhamma cārī ayam attho

original: Yaṁ puriso bhāvanābhūmiyaṁ sīlāni ārabbha sīlena saṁyutto hoti evaṁ yāva vimutti tathā sīlakkhandho.
analyzed: yam purisaḥ bhāvanā bhūmiyam sīlāni ārabbha sīlena sayuttaḥ hoti evam yāva vimutti tathā sīlakkhandho

original: Tattha yo ca avippaṭisāro anusayavasena niddiṭṭho, tañca sīlaṁ ayaṁ sīlakkhandho.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ ca a vippaṭisāraḥ anusaya vasena niddiṭṭhaḥ tat ca sīlam ayam sīla kkhandho

original: Pāmojjapītipassaddhīti ca samādhindriyena, ayaṁ samādhikkhandho.
analyzed: ca samādhi indriyena ayam samādhi khandhaḥ

original: Yaṁ samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ayaṁ paññākkhandho.
analyzed: yam samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam paññā kkhandho

original: Ime tayo khandhā sīlaṁ samādhi paññā ca tathā sīlaṁ paripūreti yaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ
analyzed: ime tayo khandhā sīlam samādhi paññā ca tathā sīlam paripūreti yam

original: tena kāraṇena so sīlaṁ paripūreti, anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppādāya vāyamati,
analyzed: tena kāraṇena saḥ sīlam paripūreti anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppādāya vā āyamati

original: uppannassa ca pahānāya anuppannassa ca kusalassa uppādāya, uppannassa ca kusalassa
analyzed: uppannassa ca pahānāya anuppannassa ca kusalassa uppādāya uppannassa ca kusalassa

original: bhiyyobhāvāya iti vīriyindriyaṁ niddiṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: bhiyyobhāvāya iti vīriyindriyam

original: Tattha yo samādhikkhandho, idaṁ samādhindriyaṁ.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ samādhi khandhaḥ idam samādhi indriya

original: Paññākkhandho paññindriyaṁ, taṁ catūsu sammappadhānesu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
analyzed: paññā kkhandho tam catūsu sammappadhānesu daṭṭhabba

original: Tathā yo anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppādāya vāyamati, idaṁ paṭhamaṁ sammappadhānaṁ.
analyzed: tathā yaḥ anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppādāya vāyamati idam paṭhamam sammappadhāna

original: Yaṁ uppannassa, idaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: uppannassa idam

original: Cattāri sammappadhānāni catūsu jhānesu passitabbāni.
analyzed: cattāri sammappadhānāni catūsu jhānesu passitabbāni

original: Tathā sīlakkhandhena nekkhammadhātu ca adhikā, tayo ca vitakkā nekkhammavitakko abyāpādavitakko avihiṁsāvitakko ca.
analyzed: tathā sīla kkhandhena nekkhamma dhātu ca adhikā tayo ca vitakkā nekkhamma vitakko a byāpāda vitakko a vihisā vitakko ca

original: Sādhāraṇabhūtā.
analyzed: sādhāraṇa bhūtā

original: Yā piyāyamānassa pāmojjena idaṁ kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ ānitaṁ aniyamītipemena, idaṁ dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: yā piyāyamānassa pāmojjena idam kāyikam sukham ānitam idam dukkha

original: Yo tattha avikkhepo, ayaṁ samādhi.
analyzed: yaḥ tattha avikkhepaḥ ayam samādhi

original: Idaṁ pañcaṅgikaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ.
analyzed: idam pañcaṅgikam paṭhamam jhāna

original: Yā cetasikā passaddhi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ virodhanaṁ, yo kileso ca paridāho, so paṭhame jhāne niruddho.
analyzed: yā cetasikā passaddhi sa vitakkam sa vicāram yaḥ kileso ca paridāho so paṭhame jhāne niruddho

original: Tathā yā ca kilesapassaddhi yā ca vitakkavicārānaṁ passaddhi, ubhayepi ete dhamme passaddhāyaṁ.
analyzed: tathā yā ca kilesa passaddhi yā ca vitakka vicārānam passaddhi ubhaye api ete dhamme passaddhāya

original: Tattha kāyassa cittassa ca sukhaṁ sukhāyanā, idaṁ pītisukhino passaddhi.
analyzed: tattha kāyassa cittassa ca sukham sukhāyanāḥ idam pīti sukhino passaddhi

original: Yopi ekodibhāvo cittassa, tena ekodibhāvena yaṁ cittassa ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ, idaṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṅgaṁ.
analyzed: ekodibhāvo cittassa tena ekodibhāvena yam cittassa ajjhattam sampasādane idam catuttham

original: Iti ajjhattañca sampasādo cetaso ca ekodibhāvo pīti ca sukhañca, idaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ caturaṅgikaṁ.
analyzed: iti ajjhattam ca sampasādaḥ cetaso ca eka ādi bhāvaḥ ca sukham ca idam dutiyam jhānam caturaṅgika

original: Yo passaddhakāyo sukhaṁ vedeti, tena adhimattena sukhena pharitvā sukhaṁ cetasikaṁ yaṁ, so pītivītarāgo evaṁ tassa pītivītarāgatāya upekkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: yaḥ passaddha kāyaḥ sukham vedeti tena adhimattena sukhena pharitvā sukham cetasikam so pīti vīta rāgaḥ evam tassa pīti vīta rāga tāya upekkham paṭilabhati

original: So pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: so pītiyā ca virāgā upekkham paṭilabhati

original: Sukhañca paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: sukham ca paṭisaveda iti

original: Sati ca sammā paññāya paṭilabhati.
analyzed: sati ca sammā paññāya paṭilabhati

original: Sace sati ekaggatā idaṁ pañcaṅgikaṁ tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ.
analyzed: sace sati ekagga tā idam pañcaṅgikam tatiyam jhāna

original: Yaṁ sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati, ayaṁ ekaggatāya parāvidhānabhāgiyā, paṭhame jhāne atthi cittekaggatā no cakkhussa vedanā sabbaṁ pāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: yam sukhinaḥ cittam samādhiyati ayam ekagga tāya parāvidhāna bhāgiyā paṭhame jhāne atthi citta ekagga tā no cakkhussa vedanā sabbam pāripūrim gacchati

original: Yathā catutthe jhāne, tathā yā upekkhā passambhayaṁ satisampajaññaṁ cittekaggatā ca, idaṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
analyzed: yathā catutthe jhāne tathā yā upekkhā passambhayam sati sampajaññam citta ekagga tā ca idam catuttham jhāna

original: Yathā samādhi dassayitabbaṁ, tathā paññindriyaṁ taṁ catūsu ariyasaccesu passitabbaṁ.
analyzed: yathā tathā paññindriyam tam catūsu ariya saccesu passitabba

original: Yaṁ samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, sā pajānanā catubbidhā asubhato dukkhato anattato
analyzed: yam samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti sā pajānanā catubbidhā asubhataḥ dukkhataḥ anattato

original: ca, yadārammaṇaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ, yaṁ pajānanto nibbindati vimuccati tathā
analyzed: ca yad ārammaṇam tam dukkham ariya sat ca yam pajānantaḥ nibbindati vimuccati tathā

original: yaṁ kāmāsavassa pahānaṁ bhavāsavassa diṭṭhāsavassa avijjāsavassa, ayaṁ nirodho appahīnabhūmiyaṁ āsavasamudayo.
analyzed: yam kāma āsavassa pahānam bhava āsavassa diṭṭha āsavassa avijja āsavassa ayam nirodhaḥ appahīna bhūmiyam āsava samudayo

original: Imāni cattāri ariyasaccāni yathā paññindriyaṁ passitabbaṁ.
analyzed: imāni cattāri ariya saccāni yathā paññindriyam

original: Yathāyaṁ samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ayaṁ dassanabhūmi.
analyzed: yathā ayam samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam dassana bhūmi

original: Sotāpattiphalañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānanto nibbindatīti, idaṁ tanukañca.
analyzed: sa utāpatti phalam ca yathābhūtam pajānantaḥ nibbindati iti idam tanukam ca

original: Kāmarāgabyāpādaṁ sakadāgāmiphalañca yaṁ nibbindati virajjati, ayaṁ paṭhamajjhānabhāvanābhūmi ca rāgavirāgā cetovimutti anāgāmiphalañca.
analyzed: kāma rāga byāpādam sakadāgāmi phalam ca yam nibbindati virajjati ayam paṭhama jhāna bhāvanā bhūmi ca rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti anāgāmi phalam ca

original: Yaṁ vimutti vimuccati, ayaṁ avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti arahattañca.
analyzed: yam vimutti vimuccati ayam avijjā virāgā paññā vimutti arahattañca

original: Ime avippaṭisārā ca vīriyindriyañca cattāro sammappadhānā avippaṭisārā tañca upari yāva samādhi, evaṁ te cattāri jhānāni samādhindriyañca yaṁ samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: ime avippaṭisārā ca vīriya indriyañca cattāro sammappadhānāḥ avippaṭisārā tat ca upari yāva samādhi evam te cattāri jhānāni samādhi indriyañca yam samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā sīlapāripūrimupādāya cāgasaṁhitena ca nibbedhikānañca nimittānaṁ anāvilamanā, idaṁ satindriyaṁ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: ime cattāraḥ sati paṭṭhānā sīla pāripūrim upādāya cāga sahitena ca nibbedhikānam ca nimittānam anāvila manāḥ idam sati indriyam cattāraḥ sati paṭṭhānā

original: Yaṁ puna imāya dhammadesanāya tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhogamanakindriyaṁ kilesapahānena ca sekkhasīlaṁ, idaṁ saddhindriyaṁ.
analyzed: yam puna imāya dhamma desanāya tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhogamanaka indriyam kilesa pahānena ca idam saddhindriya

original: Cattāri ca sotāpattiyaṅgāni phalāni.
analyzed: cattāri ca sa utāpattiyaṅgāni phalāni

original: Samādhindriyāni sopaniyāhārīni sabbasuttesu niddisitabbāni.
analyzed: samādhi indriyāni sa upaniyāhārīni sabba suttesu niddisitabbāni

original: Yaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilabhanaṁ vīriyagahitaṁyeva ñāṇaṁ paṭissarato, ayaṁ sutamayī paññā.
analyzed: yam jhānam paṭilabhanam vīriya gahitayā iva ñāṇam paṭissarataḥ ayam suta mayī paññā

original: Yo samādhi pubbāparanimittābhāso anomagatitāya yathākāmo, ayaṁ cintāmayī paññā, yaṁ tathāsamāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ayaṁ bhāvanāmayī paññā.
analyzed: yaḥ samādhi pubba apara nimitta ābhāsaḥ anomagati tāya yathākāmaḥ ayam cintā mayī paññā yam tathā samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam bhāvanā mayī paññā

original: Ayaṁ suttaniddeso.
analyzed: ayam sutta niddesaḥ

original: Imaṁ suttaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ bujjhakāradhikaṁ bujjhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: imam suttam nibbedha bhāgiyam

original: Yehi aṅgehi samannāgataṁ taṁ bujjhissanti tassa aṅgāni bujjhissanti, tena bojjhaṅgā.
analyzed: yehi aṅgehi samannāgatam tam bujjhissanti tassa aṅgāni bujjhissanti tena bojjhaṅgā

original: Tathā ādito yāva sīlaṁ vataṁ cetanā karaṇīyā, kissa sīlāni pāripūreti.
analyzed: tathā āditas yāva sīlam cetanā karaṇīyā sīlāni pāripūreti

original: Anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppādāya uppannassa ca akusalassa pahānāya anuppannassa
analyzed: anuppannassa ca akusalassa anuppādāya uppannassa ca akusalassa pahānāya anuppannassa

original: kusalassa uppādāya uppannassa ca kusalassa bhiyyobhāvāya, idaṁ vīriyaṁ tassa tassa
analyzed: kusalassa uppādāya uppannassa ca kusalassa bhiyyobhāvāya idam vīriyam tassa tassa

original: bujjhitassa aṅganti.
analyzed: bujjhitassa aṅganti

original: Ayaṁ vīriyasambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: ayam vīriya sambojjhaṅgo

original: Iminā vīriyena dve dhammā ādito avippaṭisāro pāmojjañca yā puna pīti avippaṭisārapaccayā pāmojjapaccayā, ayaṁ pītisambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: iminā vīriyena dve dhammā āditas a vippaṭisāro pāmojjam ca yā puna pīti a vippaṭisāra paccayā pāmojja paccayā ayam pīti sambojjhaṅgo

original: Yaṁ pītimanassa kāyo passambhati.
analyzed: yam pīti manassa kāyo

original: Ayaṁ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: ayam passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo

original: Tena kāyikasukhamānitaṁ yaṁ sukhino cittaṁ samādhiyati, ayaṁ samādhisambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: tena kāyika sukha mānitam yam sukhinaḥ cittam ayam samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: Yaṁ samāhito yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ayaṁ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: yam samāhitaḥ yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgo

original: Yā sīlamupādāya pañcannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ upādāyānulomatā nimittāyanā pītibhāgiyānañca visesabhāgiyānañca apilāpanatā sahagatā hoti anavamaggo, ayaṁ satisambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: yā sīlam upādāya pañcannam bojjhaṅgānam upādāya anuloma tā nimitta ayanā pīti bhāgi yānaṃ ca visesa bhāgi yānaṃ ca apilāpana tā sahagatā hoti anavamaggaḥ ayam sati sambojjhaṅgo

original: Yaṁ yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, accāraddhavīriyaṁ karoti.
analyzed: yam yathābhūtam pajānāti acca āraddha vīriyam karoti

original: Uddhaccabhūmīti katā abhipatthitaṁ peseti.
analyzed: uddhacca bhūmī iti katā abhipatthitam peseti

original: Kosajjabhūmīti garahito rahitehi aṅgehi bujjhati yaṁ cakkhusamathapathaṁ, sā upekkhāti.
analyzed: kosajja bhūmī iti gara hitaḥ rahitehi aṅgehi bujjhati yam sā upekkhāti

original: Tena sā upekkhā tassa bojjhaṅgassa aṅganti karitvā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgoti vuccate.
analyzed: tena sā upekkhā tassa bojjhaṅgassa aṅgam ti karitvā upekkhā sambojjhaṅgā iti vuccate

original: Eso suttaniddeso.
analyzed: eso sutta niddeso

original: Tattha katamā desanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā desanā

original: Asmiṁ sutte cattāri ariyasaccāni desitāni.
analyzed: asmim sutte cattāri ariya saccāni desitāni

original: Tattha katamo vicayo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ

original: Sīlavato avippaṭisāro yāva vimutti imissāya pucchāya minikimatthassamīti dve padāni
analyzed: sīlavataḥ a vippaṭisāraḥ yāva vimutti imissāya pucchāya dve padāni

original: pucchā dve padāni visajjanāni dvīhi padehi dve abhiññaṁ dvīhi ceva padehi visajjanā
analyzed: pucchā dve padāni visajjanāni dvīhi padehi dve abhiññam dvīhi ca iva padehi visajjanā

original: kiṁ pucchati nibbādhikaṁ kāyabhūmiṁ kammassa tathā hi patiṭṭhā ca asekkhe dhamme uppādeti.
analyzed: kim pucchati nibbādhikam kāya bhūmim kammassa tathā hi patiṭṭhā ca asekkhe dhamme uppādeti

original: Tattha katamā yutti?
analyzed: tattha katamā yutti

original: Sīlavato avippaṭisāro bhavati kiṁ nicchandassa ca virāgo atthi esā yutti.
analyzed: sīlavataḥ a vippaṭisāraḥ bhavati kim nicchandassa ca virāgaḥ atthi esā yutti

original: Tattha katamaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ?
analyzed: tattha katamam padaṭṭhāna

original: Vīriyaṁ vīriyindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: vīriyam vīriya indriyassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Samādhi samādhindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: samādhi samādhi indriyassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Paññā paññindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: paññā paññindriyassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Vīriyaṁ adosassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: vīriyam a dosassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Samādhi alobhassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: samādhi alobhassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Paññā amohassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: paññā amohassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Vīriyindriyaṁ tiṇṇaṁ maggaṅgānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, sammāvācāya sammākammantassa sammāājīvassa.
analyzed: vīriya indriyam tiṇṇam maggaṅgānam padaṭṭhāna sammā vācāya sammā kammantassa sammā ājīvassa

original: Samādhindriyaṁ tiṇṇaṁ maggaṅgānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, sammāsaṅkappassa sammāvācāya sammāsamādhino.
analyzed: samādhi indriyam tiṇṇam maggaṅgānam padaṭṭhāna sammā saṅkappassa sammā vācāya sammā samādhino

original: Paññindriyaṁ dvinnaṁ maggaṅgānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, sammāsatiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā ca.
analyzed: paññindriyam dvinnam maggaṅgānam padaṭṭhāna sammāsatiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā ca

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇo

original: Sīlakkhandhe vutte sabbe tayo khandhā vuttā bhavanti, sīlameva hi selopamatā yathā selo sabbapaccatthikehi akaraṇīyo evaṁ taṁ cittaṁ sabbakilesehi na kampatīti, ayaṁ amoho.
analyzed: sīla kkhandhe vutte sabbe tayo khandhāḥ vuttāḥ bhavanti sīlam eva hi sela upama tā yathā selaḥ sabba paccatthikehi a karaṇīyaḥ evam tam cittam sabba kilesehi na kampati iti ayam amoho

original: Virattaṁ rajanīyesūti ayaṁ alobho.
analyzed: virattam ayam alobhaḥ

original: Kopaneyye na kuppatīti ayaṁ adoso.
analyzed: kopaneyye na kuppati iti ayam adosaḥ

original: Tattha paññā amoho kusalamūlaṁ, alobho alobhoyeva, adoso adosoyeva.
analyzed: tattha paññā amoho kusala mūla alobhaḥ alobhaḥ yeva adosaḥ adosaḥ yeva

original: Imehi tīhi kusalamūlehi sekkhabhūmiyaṁ ṭhito asekkhamaggaṁ uppādeti.
analyzed: imehi tīhi kusala mūlehi sekkha bhūmiyam ṭhitaḥ asekkha maggam uppādeti

original: Sekkhabhūmi sampattikammadhamme uppādeti, sā ca sammāvimutti, yañca vimuttirasañāṇadassanaṁ ime dasa asekkhānaṁ arahattaṁ dhammā.
analyzed: sekkha bhūmi sampatti kamma dhamme uppādeti sā ca sammāvimutti yat ca vimutti rasa ñāṇa dassanam ime dasa asekkhānam arahattam dhammā

original: Tattha aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena catubbidhā bhāvanāpi labbhati.
analyzed: tattha aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena catubbidhā bhāvanā api labbhati

original: Sīlabhāvanā kāyabhāvanā cittabhāvanā paññābhāvanā ca.
analyzed: sīla bhāvanā kāya bhāvanā citta bhāvanā paññā bhāvanā ca

original: Tattha sammākammantena sammāājīvena ca kāyo bhāvito.
analyzed: tattha sammā kammantena sammā ājīvena ca kāyaḥ bhāvito

original: Sammāvācāya sammāvāyāmena ca sīlaṁ bhāvitaṁ.
analyzed: sammāvācāya sammāvāyāmena ca sīlam bhāvita

original: Sammāsaṅkappena sammāsamādhinā ca cittaṁ bhāvitaṁ.
analyzed: sammā saṅkappena sammā samādhinā ca cittam bhāvita

original: Sammādiṭṭhiyā sammāsatiyā ca paññā bhāvitā.
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhiyā sammāsatiyā ca paññā bhāvitā

original: Imāya catubbidhāya bhāvanāya dve dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti cittaṁ paññañca.
analyzed: imāya catubbidhāya bhāvanāya dve dhammā bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti cittam paññam ca

original: Cittaṁ bhāvanāya samatho, paññā bhāvanāya vipassanā.
analyzed: cittam bhāvanāya samatho paññā bhāvanāya vipassanā

original: Tattha paññā avijjāpahānena cittaṁ upakkilesehi amissīkatanti.
analyzed: tattha paññā avijjā apahānena cittam upakkilesehi amissīkatam ti

original: Paññā bhāvanāya cittabhāvanaṁyeva paripūreti.
analyzed: paññā bhāvanāya citta bhāvanayā iva paripūrā iti

original: Evaṁ yassa subhāvitaṁ cittaṁ kuto taṁ dukkhamessatīti.
analyzed: evam yassa su bhāvitam cittam kutas tam dukkham essati iti

original: Api ca kho pana tassa āyasmato abyāpādadhātu adhimuttā, na so petaṁ samāpanno tassa saṅkhāpahāraṁ deti, saṅkhāvitakkite sarīre dukkhaṁ na vediyati, ayaṁ suttattho.
analyzed: api ca kho pana tassa āyasmataḥ a byāpāda dhātu adhimuttā na saḥ petam samāpanno tassa saṅkhā apahāram deti saṅkhā vitakkite sarīre dukkham na vediyati ayam sutta tthaḥ

original: Tattha katamā desanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā desanā

original: Imamhi sutte dasa asekkhā arahattadhammā desitā appamāṇā ca sammā vibhāvanā.
analyzed: imamhi sutte dasa asekkhāḥ arahatta dhammāḥ desitāḥ appamāṇā ca sammā vibhāvanā

original: Tattha katamo vicayo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ

original: Selopamatā ye ye dhammā vedanīyasukhadukkhopagatā, te sabbe nirūpaṁ vānupassantānaṁ vūpagatā kāyato vedayitaparikkhāro appavattito dukkhaṁ na vediyati.
analyzed: sela upamatāḥ ye ye dhammāḥ vedanīya sukha dukkha upagatā te sabbe nirūpam vā anupassantānam vūpagatā kāyataḥ vedayita parikkhāraḥ appavattitaḥ dukkham na vediyati

original: Tattha katamā yutti, yassevaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittaṁ kuto taṁ dukkhamessatīti.
analyzed: tattha katamā yutti yassa evam bhāvitam cittam kutas tam dukkham essati iti

original: Tīsu bhāvanāsu dukkhaṁ nakkhamati cittaṁ cittabhāvanāya ca.
analyzed: tīsu bhāvanāsu dukkham na khamati cittam citta bhāvanāya ca

original: Nirodhabhāvanāya ca ānantarikā samādhibhāvanāya ca.
analyzed: nirodha bhāvanāya ca ānantarikā samādhi bhāvanāya ca

original: Iti yassevaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittanti samādhi phalassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: iti yassa evam bhāvitam cittam ti samādhi phalassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇo

original: Yassevaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittanti cittāni bhāvitāni yathā paṭhamaṁ niddiṭṭhāni paññā sīlaṁ
analyzed: yassa ivam bhāvitam cittam ti cittāni bhāvitāni yathā paṭhamam niddiṭṭhāni paññā sīla

original: kāyo cittaṁ, sīlampi subhāvitaṁ kāyikacetasikañca ṭhitattā nānupakampatīti vedanāpi
analyzed: su bhāvitam kāyika cetasikam na an upakampati iti vedanā api

original: tathā saññāpi saṅkhārāpi.
analyzed: tathā saññā api saṅkhārā api

original: Kuto taṁ dukkhamessatīti sukhampi nānugacchati, adukkhamasukhampi nāgatanti.
analyzed: kutas tam dukkham essati iti sukham pi na anugacchati adukkham asukham pi na āgatanti

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ hāro

original: Idha bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: idha bhagavato kaḥ adhippāyo

original: Ye dukkhena adhikā bhavissanti, te evarūpāhi samāpattīhi virahissanti.
analyzed: ye dukkhena adhikāḥ bhavissanti te evarūpāhi samāpattīhi virahissanti

original: Ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
analyzed: ayam ettha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye ca appasannā, te hi bhavissanti, pasannānañca pītipāmojjaṁ bhavissati, ayaṁ tattha bhagavato adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye ca appasannā te hi bhavissanti pasannānam ca pīti pāmojjam bhavissati ayam tattha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Āvaṭṭoti natthi āvaṭṭanassa bhūmi.
analyzed: āvaṭṭo ti natthi āvaṭṭanassa bhūmi

original: Vibhattīti yassevaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittaṁ kuto taṁ dukkhamessatīti duvidho niddeso—
analyzed: vibhatti iti yassa evam bhāvitam cittam kutas tam dukkham essati iti duvidhaḥ niddesaḥ

original: dukkhahetuniddeso ca paṭipakkhaniddeso ca.
analyzed: dukkha hetu niddeso ca paṭipakkha niddeso ca

original: Ko so dukkhahetu?
analyzed: kaḥ saḥ dukkha hetu

original: Yato dukkhaṁ āgacchati paṭipakkhe vutte sesadhammānaṁ sīlaṁ hetu ca paccayo ca, te sabbe dhammā vuttā honti.
analyzed: yatas dukkham āgacchati paṭipakkhe vutte sesa dhammānam sīlam hetu ca paccayo ca te sabbe dhammā vuttāḥ honti

original: Ekabodhipakkhiye dhamme vutte sabbe bodhagamanīyā dhammā vuttā bhavanti.
analyzed: eka bodhi pakkhiye dhamme vutte sabbe bodha gamanīyāḥ dhammāḥ vuttāḥ bhavanti

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ hāro

original: Imamhi sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: imamhi sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye avippaṭisārena chandikā, te sīlapāripūrī bhavanti pāmojjachandikā avippaṭisārīpāripūrī, ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo …pe…
analyzed: ye a vippaṭisārena chandikā te sīla pāripūrī bhavanti pāmojja chandikā a vippaṭisārī pāripūrī ayam ettha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ pe

original: ayaṁ catubyūho hāro.
analyzed: ayam catu byūhaḥ

original: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ āvaṭṭaḥ

original: Idaṁ suttaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ.
analyzed: idam suttam nibbedha bhāgiya

original: Yo nibbedho, ayaṁ nirodho.
analyzed: yaḥ nibbedhaḥ ayam nirodhaḥ

original: Yena nibbijjhati, so maggo.
analyzed: yena nibbijjhati saḥ maggaḥ

original: Yaṁ nibbijjhati, taṁ dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: yam nibbijjhati tam dukkha

original: Yaṁ nibbedhagāminā maggena pahīyati, samudayoyaṁ vutto.
analyzed: yam nibbedha gāminā maggena pahīyati samudayaḥ yam vuttaḥ

original: Tattha katamā vibhatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā vibhatti

original: Sīlavato avippaṭisāroti vibhajjabyākaraṇīyaṁ, parāmasantassa natthi avippaṭisāro yāva dosakataṁ kāyena vā vācāya vā akusalaṁ ārabhati.
analyzed: sīlavataḥ a vippaṭisāro ti parāmasantassa natthi a vippaṭisāraḥ yāva dosa katam kāyena vā vācāya vā akusalam ārabhati

original: Kiñcipissa evaṁ hoti “sukatametaṁ sucaritametaṁ no cassa tena avippaṭisārena pāmojjaṁ jāyati yāva vimutti, tassa sīlavato avippaṭisāro”ti vibhajjabyākaraṇīyaṁ, ayaṁ vibhattihāro.
analyzed: evam hoti su katam etam su caritam etam no ca sa tena a vippaṭisārena pāmojjam jāyati yāva vimutti tassa sīlavato a vippaṭisāro ti ayam vibhatti hāro

original: Tattha katamā parivattanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā parivattanā

original: Imehi sattahi upanisāsampattīhi ekādasa upanisā vibhattiyaṁ pajahānaṁ pajahanti, ayaṁ parivattanā.
analyzed: imehi sattahi upanisā sampattīhi ekādasa upanisāḥ vibhattiyam pajahānam pajahanti ayam parivattanā

original: Tattha katamā vevacanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā vevacanā

original: Imesaṁ ariyadhammānaṁ balabojjhaṅgavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṁ imāni vevacanāni.
analyzed: imesam ariya dhammānam bala bojjhaṅga vimokkha samādhi samāpattīnam imāni vevacanāni

original: Tattha katamā paññatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā paññatti

original: Sīlavato avippaṭisāroti sīlakkhandhe nekkhammapaññattiyā paññattaṁ, nisajjapaññatti ca evaṁ dasa aṅgāni dvīhi dvīhi aṅgehi paññattāni.
analyzed: sīlavataḥ a vippaṭisāraḥ ti sīla kkhandhe nekkhamma paññattiyā paññatta nisajja paññatti ca evam dasa aṅgāni dvīhi dvīhi aṅgehi paññattāni

original: Tattha katamo otaraṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ

original: Idaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyasuttaṁ pañcasu otiṇṇaṁ yathā yaṁ paṭhamaṁ niddiṭṭhaṁ evamindriyādikhandhadhātuāyatanesu niddisitabbāni.
analyzed: idam nibbedhabhāgiya suttam pañcasu otiṇṇam yathā yam paṭhamam niddiṭṭham evam indriya ādi khandha dhātu āyatanesu niddisitabbāni

original: Tattha katamo sodhano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhanaḥ hāro

original: Sīlavato avippaṭisāroti na tāva suddho ārambho avippaṭisārino pāmojjanti na tāva suddho ārambho yāni ekādasa padāni desitāni yadā tadā suddho ārambho, ayaṁ sodhano.
analyzed: sīlavataḥ na tāva suddhaḥ ārambhaḥ avippaṭisārinaḥ na tāva suddhaḥ ārambhaḥ yāni ekādasa padāni desitāni yadā tadā suddhaḥ ārambhaḥ ayam sodhano

original: Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ adhiṭṭhāno

original: Sīlavemattatāya paññattaṁ evaṁ dasa padāni sabbāni sīlakkhandhassa ānisaṁso, te ca
analyzed: sīla vemattatāya paññattam evam dasa padāni sabbāni sīlakkhandhassa ānisasaḥ te ca

original: patirūpadesavāso ca paccayo attasammāpaṇidhānañca hetu, samādhikkhandhassa sukhaṁ
analyzed: patirūpadesa vāsaḥ ca paccayaḥ atta sammāpaṇidhānañca hetu samādhi kkhandhassa sukha

original: hetu passaddhi paccayo, yena jhānasahajāti ca ṭhānanti jhānaṅgā aparo pariyāyo kāmesu
analyzed: hetu passaddhi paccayaḥ yena jhāna sahajāti ca ṭhānanti jhān aṅgā aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ kāmesu

original: ādīnavānupassanā samādhino paccayo nekkhamme ānisaṁsadassāvitā hetu.
analyzed: ādīnava anupassanā samādhino paccayaḥ nekkhamme hetu

original: Tattha katamā samāropanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā samāropanā

original: Yaṁ vīriyindriyaṁ, so sīlakkhandho.
analyzed: yam vīriyindriya saḥ sīlakkhandho

original: Yaṁ sīlaṁ, te cattāro dhammā padhānā.
analyzed: yam sīla te cattāro dhammā padhānā

original: Yaṁ dhammānudhammapaṭipatti, so pātimokkhasaṁvaro.
analyzed: yam dhamma anudhamma paṭipatti so pātimokkha savaraḥ

original: Yassa selopamaṁ cittanti gāthā, selopamanti upamā yathā selo vātena na kampati na uṇhena na sītena saṅkampati.
analyzed: yassa sela upamam cittanti gāthā sela upamanti upamā yathā selaḥ vātena na kampati na uṇhena na sītena saṅkampati

original: Yathā anekā acetanā, te uṇhena milāyanti, sītena avasussanti, vātena bhajanti.
analyzed: yathā anekā acetanā te uṇhena milāyanti sītena avasussanti vātena bhajanti

original: Na evaṁ selo (…) virattaṁ rajanīyesu dosanīye na dussatīti kāraṇaṁ dosanīye domanassantaṁ,
analyzed: na evam selaḥ virattam rajanīyesu dosanīye na dussati iti kāraṇam dosanīye

original: na duṭṭhena vā kampati uṇhena vā, so milāyati sītena vā avasussati, evaṁ cittaṁ rāgena
analyzed: na duṭṭhena vā kampati uṇhena vā saḥ milāyati sītena vā avasussati evam cittam rāgena

original: nānussati sītena kampatīti.
analyzed: na anussati sītena kampati iti

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Virattaṁ rajanīyesu dosanīye na dussati.
analyzed: virattam rajanīyesu dosanīye na dussati

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Dosanīye panassanti na dussati, aduṭṭhaṁ taṁ na kosissanti, tena kuppanīye na kuppati,
analyzed: dosanīye panassanti na dussati aduṭṭham tam na kosissanti tena kuppanīye na kuppati

original: yassevaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittaṁ kuto taṁ dukkhaniddeso ca kuto evarūpassa dukkhaṁ āgamissatīti niddiṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: yassa evam bhāvitam cittam kutas tam dukkha niddeso ca kutas evarūpassa dukkham āgamissati iti

original: Parivattanāti kuto taṁ dukkhamessatīti yaṁ cetasikaṁ sukhaṁ anupādisesā ayaṁ natthi sopādisesā ayaṁ atthi.
analyzed: kutas tam dukkham essati iti yam cetasikam sukham anupādisesā ayam natthi sa upādisesā ayam atthi

original: Puna evamāhaṁsu taṁ khaṇaṁ taṁ muhuttaṁ ubhayameva avedayitaṁ sopādisesaṁ yañca anupādisesaṁ yañca taṁ khaṇaṁ taṁ muhuttaṁ anupādisesaṁ yañca sopādisesaṁ ca avedayitaṁ.
analyzed: punar tam khaṇam tam muhuttam ubhayam eva avedayitam sa upādisesam yat ca an upādisesam yat ca tam khaṇam tam muhuttam anupādisesam yat ca sa upādisesam ca avedayita

original: Sukhamāpannassa anāvattikanti ayamettha viseso parivattanā.
analyzed: sukham āpannassa anāvattikam ti ayam ettha visesaḥ parivattanā

original: Tattha katamo vevacano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vevacanaḥ

original: Yassevaṁ bhāvitaṁ cittaṁ vā bhāvitaṁ subhāvitaṁ anuṭṭhitaṁ vatthukataṁ susamāraddhaṁ.
analyzed: yassa evam bhāvitam cittam vā bhāvitam su bhāvitam anuṭṭhitam vatthu katam su samāraddha

original: Cittanti mano viññāṇaṁ manindriyaṁ manoviññāṇadhātu.
analyzed: cittam ti manaḥ viññāṇam man indriyam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: Tattha katamā paññatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā paññatti

original: Cittaṁ mano saṅkhārā vūpasamapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: cittam manaḥ saṅkhārāḥ vūpasama paññattiyā paññatta

original: Samādhi asekkhapaññattiyā paññatto.
analyzed: samādhi asekkha paññattiyā paññatto

original: Dukkhaṁ ucchinnapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: dukkham ucchinna paññattiyā paññatta

original: Tattha katamo otaraṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ

original: Citte niddiṭṭhe pañcakkhandhā niddiṭṭhā honti, ayaṁ khandhesu otaraṇo, manoviññāṇadhātuyā niddiṭṭhāya aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo niddiṭṭhā honti, ayaṁ dhātūsu otaraṇo.
analyzed: citte niddiṭṭhe pañca kkhandhāḥ niddiṭṭhāḥ honti ayam khandhesu otaraṇaḥ manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā niddiṭṭhāya aṭṭhārasa dhātuyaḥ niddiṭṭhāḥ honti ayam dhātūsu otaraṇaḥ

original: Manāyatane niddiṭṭhe sabbāni āyatanāni niddiṭṭhāni honti.
analyzed: manāyatane niddiṭṭhe sabbāni āyatanāni niddiṭṭhāni honti

original: Tattha manāyatanaṁ nāmarūpassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tattha mana āyatanam nāma rūpassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: nāma rūpa paccayā

original: Tathā paṭiccasamuppāde.
analyzed: tathā paṭiccasamuppāde

original: Ayaṁ otaraṇo.
analyzed: ayam otaraṇaḥ

original: Tattha katamo sodhano suddhoyeva ārambho.
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhanaḥ ārambho

original: Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ adhiṭṭhāno

original: Chaḷindriyaṁ bhāvanā ekattāyaṁ paññatti chaṭṭhitena kāyo ekattāya paññatto.
analyzed: chaṭṭhitena kāyaḥ ekattāya paññatto

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāro

original: Cittassa pubbahetu samuppādāya manasikāro ca tappoṇatā ca yaṁ asamāhitabhūmiyaṁ ca
analyzed: cittassa pubba hetu samuppādāya manasikāro ca tad poṇa tā ca yam asamāhita bhūmiyam ca

original: visesadhammānaṁ abhāvitattā cittasatataṁ gacchati, sace samādhino sukhaṁ hetu avippaṭisāro
analyzed: visesa dhammānam a bhāvita ttā citta satatam gacchati sace samādhino sukham hetu a vippaṭisāro

original: paccayo, ayaṁ hetu ayaṁ paccayo parikkhāro.
analyzed: paccayaḥ ayam hetu ayam paccayaḥ parikkhāro

original: Tattha katamā samāropanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā samāropanā

original: Yassevaṁ bhāvitanti tassa dhammā samāropayitabbā.
analyzed: yassa evam bhāvitanti tassa dhammā samāropayitabbā

original: Kāyo sīlaṁ paññā bhāvitacittanti anabhirataṁ anapaṇataṁ anekaṁ anutaṁ anāpajjāsattaṁ
analyzed: kāyaḥ sīlam paññā bhāvita cittanti an abhiratam an apaṇatam an ekam anutam an āpajja asatta

original: ayaṁ samaññāyatanā na tassa sekkhassa sammāsamādhi sabbe asekkhā dasa arahantadhammā niddiṭṭhā honti.
analyzed: ayam samaññāyatanā na tassa sekkhassa sammāsamādhi sabbe asekkhā dasa arahanta dhammā niddiṭṭhāḥ honti

original: Asekkhabhāgiyāni suttāni.
analyzed: asekkha bhāgiyāni suttāni

original: Yassa nūna, bhante, kāyagatāsati abhāvitā, ayaṁ so aññataraṁ sabrahmacāriṁ āsajja
analyzed: yassa nūna bhante kāya gatā asati a bhāvitā ayam saḥ aññataram sabrahmacārim āsajja

analyzed: samāpajja a paṭinissajja janapada cārikam pakkameyya saḥ āyasmai imasmin vippaṭijānāti

original: dve pajāni paṭijānāti cittabhāvanāyañca diṭṭhiyā pahānaṁ, kāyabhāvanāyañca diṭṭhippahānaṁ,
analyzed: dve pajāni paṭijānāti citta bhāvanāyañca diṭṭhiyāḥ pahāna kāya bhāvanāyañca diṭṭhi ppahāna

original: kāyabhāvanāyañca taṇhāpahānaṁ, yaṁ paṭhamaṁ upamaṁ karoti.
analyzed: taṇhā apahāna yam paṭhamam upamam karoti

original: Asucināpi sucināpi pathavī neva aṭṭiyati na jigucchati na pītipāmojjaṁ paṭilabhati, evameva hi pathavīsamena so cetasā anvayena appakena averena abyāpajjena viharāmīti.
analyzed: asucinā api sucinā api pathavī na iva aṭṭiyati na jigucchati na pīti pāmojjam paṭilabhati evam eva hi pathavī samena saḥ cetasā anvayena appakena averena abyāpajjena viharāmi iti

original: Iti so āyasmā kiṁ paṭijānāti, kāyabhāvanāya sukhindriyapahānaṁ paṭijānāti, cittabhāvanāya somanassindriyapahānaṁ paṭijānāti.
analyzed: iti saḥ kim paṭijānāti kāya bhāvanāya sukha indriya pahānam paṭijānāti citta bhāvanāya somanassa indriya pahānam paṭijānāti

original: Kāyikā vedanā rāgānusayamanugatānaṁ sukhindriyaṁ paṭikkhipati.
analyzed: kāyikā vedanā rāga anusayam anugatānam sukha indriyam paṭikkhipati

original: Na hi vedanākkhandhaṁ yā cetasikā sukhavedanā tattha ayaṁ paṭilābhapaccayā uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ.
analyzed: na hi vedanā khandham yā cetasikā sukha vedanā tattha ayam paṭilābha paccayā uppajjati sukham somanassa

original: Sotaṁ paṭikkhipati, na hi manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ.
analyzed: sotam paṭikkhipati na hi manaḥ samphassa jam vedana

original: Tattha catūsu mahābhūtesu rūpakkhandhassa anusayapaṭighapahānaṁ bhaṇati.
analyzed: tattha catūsu mahābhūtesu rūpa kkhandhassa anusaya paṭigha pahānam bhaṇati

original: Kāme rūpañca tañca asekkhabhūmiyaṁ.
analyzed: kāme rūpañca tat ca

original: Kāye kāyānupassanā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārañca.
analyzed: kāye kāya anupassanā diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārañca

original: Balena ca ussāhena ca sabbaṁ manasi katattānaṁ pahānaṁ medaṁ katālikāya ca purisena
analyzed: balena ca ussāhena ca sabbam manasi kata ttānam pahānam mā idam ca purisena

original: ca maṇḍanakajātikena ca, etehi imassa mātāpitusambhūtaṁ paccavekkhaṇaṁ, so kāyena
analyzed: ca maṇḍanaka jātikena ca etehi imassa mātā pitu sambhūtam paccavekkhaṇa kāyena

original: ca kāyānupassanāya ca cittena ca cittānupassanāya ca dve dhamme dhāreti.
analyzed: ca kāya anupassanāya ca cittena ca citta anupassanāya ca dve dhamme dhāreti

original: Kāyakilesavatthuṁ cittena ca cittasannissaye cittena subhāvitena sattannaṁ ca samāpattīnaṁ viharituṁ paṭijānāti.
analyzed: kāya kilesa vatthum cittena ca citta sannissaye cittena su bhāvitena sattannam ca samāpattīnam viharitum paṭijānāti

original: Gahapatiputtopamatāya ca yathā gahapatiputtassa nānāraṅgānaṁ vatthakaraṇḍako puṇṇo
analyzed: gahapati putta upama tāya ca yathā gahapati puttassa nānā raṅgānam vattha karaṇḍakaḥ puṇṇaḥ

original: bhaveyya, so yaṁ yadeva vatthayugaṁ pubbaṇhasamaye ākaṅkhati, pubbaṇhasamaye nibbāpeti,
analyzed: bhaveyya saḥ yam yat eva vattha yugam pubbaṇha samaye ākaṅkhati pubbaṇha samaye nibbāpeti

original: evaṁ majjhanhikasamaye, sāyanhasamaye, evameva so āyasmā cittassa subhāvitattā yathārūpena
analyzed: evam majjhanhika samaye sāyanha samaye evam eva saḥ āyasmai cittassa yathārūpena

original: vihārena ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tathārūpena pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharati,
analyzed: vihārena ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayam viharitu tathārūpena pubbaṇhasamayam viharati

original: majjhanhikasamaye, sāyanhasamaye.
analyzed: majjhanhika samaye sāyanha samaye

original: Tena vesa āyasmatā upamāya me āsitāya pathavī vā anuttarā indriyabhāvanā bhāvitacittena.
analyzed: tena vesaḥ āyasmatā upamāya me āsitāya pathavī vā anuttarā indriya bhāvanā bhāvita cittena

original: Tena so āyasmā idaṁ aṭṭhavidhaṁ bhāvanaṁ paṭijānāti catūsu mahābhūtesu, kāyabhāvanaṁ
analyzed: tena saḥ āyasmai idam aṭṭhavidham bhāvanam paṭijānāti catūsu mahābhūtesu kāya bhāvana

original: upakacaṇḍālaṁ purisametakaṁ bhavatalākāsu cittabhāvanaṁ, imāhi bhāvanāhi tāya bhāvanāya
analyzed: upaka caṇḍālam purisa metakam bhava talākāsu citta bhāvanaḥ imāhi bhāvanāhi tāya bhāvanāya

original: ca samathā pāripūrimantehi.
analyzed: ca samathā

original: Imehi catūhi paññāpāripūrimantehi.
analyzed: imehi catūhi paññāpāripūrimantehi

original: Kathaṁ upakacaṇḍālaṁ paṭikūlesu dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
analyzed: katham upaka caṇḍālam paṭikūlesu dhammesu a paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kāyo pakatiyā appaṭikūlaṁ kāye uddhumātakasaññā saṅkhittena nava saññā ime paṭikūlā
analyzed: kāyo pakatiyā a paṭikūlam kāye uddhumātaka saññā saṅkhittena nava saññāḥ ime paṭikūlā

original: dhammā ceso āyasmā paṭikūlato ajigucchito kāyagatāsatiyā bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati,
analyzed: dhammā ca iso āyasmā paṭikūlataḥ a jigucchito kāya gata asatiyā bhāvanā anuyogam anuyuttaḥ viharati

original: na hi tassa jigucchappahāya cittaṁ paṭikūlati.
analyzed: na hi tassa jiguccha pahāya cittam paṭikūlati

original: Kathaṁ appaṭikūlesu dhammesu paṭikūlasaññī viharatīti?
analyzed: katham appaṭikūlesu dhammesu paṭikūla saññī viharati iti

original: Kāyo sabbalokassa appaṭikūlo taṁ so āyasmā asubhasaññāya viharati.
analyzed: kāyo sabba lokassa a paṭikūlo tam so āyasmai asubha saññāya viharati

original: Evaṁ appaṭikūlesu dhammesu paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: evam appaṭikūlesu dhammesu paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharatīti api sabboyaṁ lokassa
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūla saññī viharati iti api sabboyam lokassa

original: yamidaṁ muṇḍo pattapāṇī kulesu piṇḍāya vicarati, tena ca so āyasmā suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇena
analyzed: yam idam muṇḍaḥ patta pāṇī kulesu piṇḍāya vicarati tena ca saḥ āyasmā suvaṇṇa dubbaṇṇena

analyzed: appaṭikūla saññī cittena ca kāyena nibbidā sahagatena appaṭikūla saññī evam paṭikūlesu

original: appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu subhasaññino itthirūpe paṭikūlesu ca jigucchino vinīlakavipubbake tattha so āyasmā paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu subha saññinaḥ itthi rūpe paṭikūlesu ca jigucchinaḥ vinīlaka vipubbake tattha saḥ āyasmā paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu dhammesu tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjayitvā upekkhako viharati sato ca sampajāno ca?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu dhammesu tat ubhayam abhinivajjayitvā upekkhakaḥ viharati sataḥ ca sampajānaḥ ca

original: Appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu subhasaññino itthirūpe paṭikūlesu ca jigucchino vinīlakavipubbake tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjayitvā “netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, neso me attā”ti viharati.
analyzed: a paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu subha saññinaḥ itthi rūpe paṭikūlesu ca jigucchinaḥ vinīlaka vipubbake tat ubhayam abhinivajjayitvā na itam mama na isā aham asmi na isā me attā iti viharati

original: Evaṁ tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjayitvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
analyzed: evam tat ubhayam abhinivajjayitvā upekkhakaḥ viharati sataḥ sampajānaḥ

original: Aparo pariyāyo.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ

original: Tedhātuko lokasannivāso sabbabālaputhujjanānaṁ appaṭikūlasaññā.
analyzed: te dhātukaḥ loka sannivāso sabba bāla puthujjanānam a paṭikūla saññā

original: Tattha ca āyasmā sāriputto appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: tattha ca āyasmā sāriputto a paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Evaṁ appaṭikūlesu dhammesu paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: evam appaṭikūlesu dhammesu paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu dhammesu appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Paṭikūlasaññino sabbasekkhā idha kā tedhātuke sabbaloke.
analyzed: paṭikūla saññinaḥ sabba sekkhāḥ idha kā tedhātuke sabba loke

original: Tattha katamo bhūmippatto samādhiphale sacchikato appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ bhūmippatto samādhi phale sacchikataḥ a paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Na hi taṁ atthi yassa lokassa pahānāya paṭikūlasaññī uppādeyya.
analyzed: na hi tat atthi yassa lokassa pahānāya paṭikūla saññī uppādeyya

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu paṭikūlasaññī viharati?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Tedhātuke lokasannivāse yāva kāmalokabhūmatā hi rāgānaṁ vītarāgānaṁ paṭikūlasamatā rūpārūpadhātuṁ appaṭikūlasamatā.
analyzed: tedhātuke loka sannivāse hi rāgānam vīta rāgānam paṭikūla samatā rūpa arūpa dhātum ap paṭikūla samatā

original: Tattha ca āyasmā sāriputto paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: tattha ca āyasmā sāriputto paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Evaṁ paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: evam paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Yaṁ kiñci parato duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ taṁ vacanaṁ appaṭikūlaṁ yāvatā vācaso appatirūpā tathā janassa appaṭikūlasaññā.
analyzed: yam kiñci paratas duruttānam durāgatānam vacana pathānam tam vacanam appaṭikūlam yāvatā vācasaḥ appatirūpā tathā janassa appaṭikūla saññā

original: Tattha āyasmā sāriputto abhiññāya sacchikato appaṭikūlasaññī viharati, evaṁ paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: tattha āyasmā sāriputtaḥ abhiññāya sacchikataḥ appaṭikūla saññī viharati evam paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjayitvā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu tat ubhayam abhinivajjayitvā upekkhakaḥ ca viharati sataḥ ca sampajāno

original: Yañca nesaṁ samanupassati ye dhammā duccaritā, te dhammā appaṭikūlā.
analyzed: yat ca nesam samanupassati ye dhammā duccaritā te dhammā a paṭikūlā

original: Tattha āyasmā sāriputto iti paṭisañcikkhati ye dhammā duccaritā, te dhammā aniṭṭhavipākā.
analyzed: tattha āyasmā sāriputto iti paṭisañcikkhati ye dhammā duccaritā te dhammā aniṭṭha vipākā

original: Ye dhammā sucaritā, te ācayagāmino.
analyzed: ye dhammā su caritā te ācaya gāminaḥ

original: So ca sucaritaṁ ācayagāminiṁ karitvā duccaritaṁ aniṭṭhavipākaṁ karitvā tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjayitvā upekkhako viharati.
analyzed: saḥ ca su caritam ācaya gāminim karitvā duccaritam aniṭṭha vipākam karitvā tat ubhayam abhinivajjayitvā upekkhakaḥ viharati

original: Atha paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlesu ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: atha paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlesu ca paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Taṇhā paṭikūladhammā kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: taṇhā paṭikūla dhammā

original: Taṇhāvasena hi sattā dvīhi dhammehi sattā, kabaḷīkāre āhāre rasataṇhāya sattā, phasse sukhasaññāya sattā.
analyzed: taṇhā vasena hi sattā dvīhi dhammehi sattā kabaḷīkāre āhāre rasa taṇhāya sattā phasse sukha saññāya sattā

original: Tatthāyasmā sāriputto kabaḷīkāre ca āhāre paṭikūlasaññī viharati, phasse ca dukkhasaññī viharati.
analyzed: tattha āyasmā sāriputto kabaḷīkāre ca āhāre paṭikūla saññī viharati phasse ca dukkha saññī viharati

original: Evaṁ paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: evam paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca paṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Taṇhākkhayaṁ anuttaraṁ nibbānaṁ tathā bālaputhujjanānaṁ paṭikūlasaññā pahatasaññā ca.
analyzed: taṇhā kkhayam anuttaram nibbānam tathā bāla puthujjanānam paṭikūla saññā pahata saññā ca

original: Tatthāyasmato sāriputtassa appaṭikūlasaññā abyāpādasaññā ca sāmaṁ paññāya passitvā evaṁ paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: tattha āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa appaṭikūla saññā abyāpāda saññā ca sāmam paññāya passitvā evam paṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlesu ca appaṭikūlesu ca dhammesu appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Tatiye ca nibbāne paṭikūlasaññino yasena ca kittini ca appaṭikūlasaññino.
analyzed: tatiye ca nibbāne paṭikūla saññinaḥ yasena ca kittini ca a paṭikūla saññinaḥ

original: Tatthāyasmā sāriputto assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ sammāpaññāya paṭijānanto paṭikūlañca appaṭikūlañca dhammaṁ tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjayitvā appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
analyzed: tattha āyasmā sāriputtaḥ assādam ca ādīnavam ca nissaraṇam ca yathābhūtam sammāpaññāya paṭijānantaḥ paṭikūlañca appaṭikūlañca dhammam tat ubhayam abhinivajjayitvā appaṭikūla saññī viharati

original: Kathaṁ paṭikūlaṁ appaṭikūlañca dhammaṁ tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjayitvā upekkhako viharati?
analyzed: katham paṭikūlam appaṭikūlañca dhammam tat ubhayam abhinivajjayitvā upekkhakaḥ viharati

original: Sato ca sampajāno ca, yañca samanupassati anunayo appaṭikūlo dhammo paṭigho ca paṭikūlo
analyzed: sataḥ ca sampajāno ca yat ca samanupassati anunayaḥ a paṭikūlaḥ dhammo paṭigho ca paṭikūlo

original: dhammo, tatthāyasmā sāriputto anunayassa paṭighappahīnattā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno ca.
analyzed: dhammo tattha āyasmā sāriputto anunayassa paṭigha ppahīna ttā upekkhakaḥ viharati sataḥ sampajāno ca

original: Yañcassa samanupassati ayaṁ pañcavidhā anuttarā indriyabhāvanā.
analyzed: yat ca assa samanupassati ayam pañcavidhā anuttarā indriya bhāvanā

original: Ayaṁ suttaniddeso.
analyzed: ayam sutta niddesaḥ

original: Tattha katamo desanāhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ desanā āhāro

original: Imamhi sutte kiṁ desitabbaṁ?
analyzed: imamhi sutte kim

original: Tattha vuccate, imamhi sutte diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro desito, tathā vimuttaṁ cittaṁ paccavekkhaṇā ca adhipaññādhammaṁ desitaṁ.
analyzed: tattha vuccate imamhi sutte diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāraḥ desito tathā vimuttam cittam paccavekkhaṇā ca adhi paññā dhammam desita

original: Tattha katamo vicayo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ

original: Ye kāye kāyānupassino viharanti, tesaṁ cittaṁ anunayappaṭighena na viharati anunayappaṭighena cābhiramamānassa cittaṁ samaggataṁ bhavissatīti bhāvanāya balametaṁ, ayaṁ vicayo hāro.

original: Tattha katamo yuttihāro?

analyzed: yatas ca kusalehi dhammehi na virodhati na vaḍḍhati imam ādīnavam bhagavā deseti

analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parivattanaḥ hāro

analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ hāro

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?

original: Idaṁ hi ativassatīti imassa ca ativassati evañca ativassatīti ayaṁ vemattatāya yā suṇasādhāraṇehi lakkhaṇehi paññāpiyati, sā ekattapaññatti.
analyzed: idam hi ativassati iti imassa ca ativassati evam ca ativassati iti ayam vemattatāya yā suṇa sādhāraṇehi lakkhaṇehi paññāpiyati sā ekatta paññatti

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāro

original: Yañca taṁ ativassiyanti, tassa dve hetū dve paccayā akusalapasuteva vācakattābhirati ca.

original: Ime dve ayonisomanasikāro ca kusalā dhammā vopasaggā ca, ime dve paccayā.

original: Tattha katamo samāropano?
analyzed: tattha katamo samāropano

original: te appasakkhayena saṅkhārā.
analyzed: te appa sakkhayena saṅkhārā

original: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ yāva jarāmaraṇaṁ, ayaṁ samāropano.

original: Yaṁ puna tathā desanā, tasseva akusalā dhammā vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullatamāpajjati tassa saṅkhārā nirodhā, ayaṁ samāropano.
analyzed: yam puna tathā desanā tassa iva akusalāḥ dhammāḥ vuddhim virūḷhim vepulla tam āpajjati tassa saṅkhārāḥ nirodhāḥ ayam samāropanaḥ

original: tattha katamo vuccate tamo nāma?

analyzed: yaḥ tamaḥ andhakāraḥ yathā vuttam bhagavatā yathā andhakāre tasmin bhayānake sa kampi dhātu puriso na passati evam eva aññāṇato pāpaka sa kamma sa vipākam na saddhaḥ hoti

analyzed: so tiṇṇam cakkhūnam tamaḥ masa cakkhunaḥ dibba cakkhunaḥ paññā cakkhunaḥ imesam cakkhūnam idha tamaḥ niddisiyati aññāṇam ti

analyzed: tamena tama parāyanena tamaḥ ti avijjāya niddiṭṭhāya sabba kilesa dhammā niddiṭṭhāḥ honti

analyzed: pamādaḥ niddiṭṭho hoti

analyzed: tamena joti parāyanena appamādaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ hoti

analyzed: ayam lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Imamhi sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: imamhi sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye sattā nīcakulino, na te imaṁ sutvā kusale dhamme samādāya vattissanti.
analyzed: ye sattāḥ nīca kulinaḥ na te imam sutvā kusale dhamme samādāya vattissanti

original: Ye sattā uccakulino, te imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ sutvā bhiyyoso mattāya kusale dhamme samādāya vattissantīti.
analyzed: ye sattāḥ ucca kulino te imam dhamma desanam sutvā bhiyyosaḥ mattāya kusale dhamme samādāya vattissanti iti

original: Ayaṁ catubyūho hāro.
analyzed: ayam catu byūhaḥ

original: Bhūmiyaṁ upadeso.
analyzed: bhūmiyam upadesaḥ

original: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ āvaṭṭaḥ hāro

analyzed: yā avid jātaḥ taṇhā ayam samudayaḥ

original: Yo tamo tamaparāyano, idaṁ dukkhaṁ.

original: Imāni dve saccāni dukkhañca samudayo ca joti yena suttena dhammena paññāpiyati, so dhammo paññindriyassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: imāni dve saccāni dukkhañca samudayo ca yena suttena dhammena paññāpiyati so dhammo paññindriyassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Tena amohena tīṇi kusalamūlāni pāripūriṁ gacchanti saggassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tena amohena tīṇi kusala mūlāni pāripūrim gacchanti saggassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamā vibhatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā vibhatti

original: Tamo tamaparāyanoti na ekaṁsena.
analyzed: naḥ ekasena

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Atthi tamo ca bhavo aparāpariyavedanīyena ca kusalena jotinā puggalena sahopattibhāve.
analyzed: atthi tamaḥ ca bhavaḥ apara apariya vedanīyena ca kusalena jotinā puggalena saha upatti bhāve

original: Atthi joti ca bhavo aparāpariyavedanīyena ca akusalena tamena puggalena sahopattibhāve parivattanā tamesu paṭipakkhoti jotinā tamaparāyano.
analyzed: atthi ca bhavaḥ apara apariya vedanīyena ca akusalena tamena puggalena saha upatti bhāve parivattanā tamesu paṭipakkho ti jotinā tama parāyano

original: Tattha katamo vevacano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vevacanaḥ

original: Yo tamo, so evaṁ attabyāpādāya paṭipanno, so assaddhāya bālo akusalo abyatto anādīnavadassī.
analyzed: yaḥ tamaḥ saḥ evam atta byāpādāya paṭipanno saḥ assaddhāya bālaḥ akusalaḥ a byattaḥ anādīnava dassī

original: Yo joti, so attahitāya paṭipanno paṇḍito kusalo byatto ādīnavadassī.
analyzed: yaḥ so atta hitāya paṭipanno paṇḍito kusalaḥ byattaḥ ādīnava dassī

original: Ayaṁ vevacano.
analyzed: ayam vevacanaḥ

original: Tattha katamā paññatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā paññatti

original: So puggalo vipākapaññattiyā paññāpiyati, akusale pariyādinnatā paññāpiyati.
analyzed: saḥ puggalaḥ vipāka paññattiyā paññāpiyati akusale pariyādinna tā paññāpiyati

original: Jotikusaladhammupapattipaññattiyā paññāpiyati kusaladhammavipākapaññattiyā cāti.
analyzed: joti kusala dhamma upapatti paññattiyā paññāpiyati kusala dhamma vipāka paññattiyā ca ati

original: Otaraṇoti ye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā yañca jarāmaraṇaṁ yā ca avijjā, taṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ,
analyzed: ye avijjā paccayā saṅkhārāḥ yat ca jarā maraṇam yā ca avijjā tam pada ṭṭhāna

original: niddesena vijjuppādo avijjānirodho yo yāva jarāmaraṇanirodho, ime dve dhammā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā.
analyzed: niddesena vijjuppādaḥ avijjā nirodhaḥ yaḥ yāva jarā maraṇa nirodhaḥ ime dve dhammā saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannā

original: Dhammadhātu dhammāyatanañca padaṭṭhānaṁ niddesena dhātūsu.
analyzed: dhammadhātu dhammāyatanañca padaṭṭhānam niddesena dhātūsu

original: Tattha katamo sodhano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhano

original: Imassa suttassa desitassa ārambho.
analyzed: imassa suttassa desitassa ārambhaḥ

original: Adhiṭṭhānoti tamoti bhagavā bravīti, na ekaṁ puggalaṁ deseti.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhānaḥ ti tamaḥ iti bhagavā bravīti na ekam puggalam deseti

original: Yāvatā sattānaṁ gati, tattha ye duccaritadhammena upapannā, te bahulādhivacanena tamo niddisati.
analyzed: yāvatā tattha ye duccarita dhammena upapannā te bahula adhivacanena tamaḥ niddisati

original: Yā joti sabbasattesu kusaladhammopapatti sabbaṁ taṁ jotīti abhilapati ayamekatā paccayo yonisomanasikārapaññatti catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ puggalānaṁ.
analyzed: yā joti sabba sattesu kusala dhamma upapatti sabbam tam joti iti abhilapati ayam ekatā paccayaḥ yoni so manasikāra paññatti catunnam mahābhūtānam puggalāna

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāro

original: Akusalassa pāpamittatā paccayo, ayoniso manasikāro hetu.
analyzed: akusalassa pāpa mitta tā paccayaḥ ayonisaḥ manasikāraḥ hetu

original: Kusalassa kalyāṇamittatā paccayo, yoniso manasikāro hetu.
analyzed: kusalassa kalyāṇa mitta tā paccayaḥ yonisas manasikāraḥ hetu

original: Tattha katamā samāropanāti?
analyzed: tattha katamā samāropanā ati

original: Idhekacco nīce kule paccājāto hotīti nīce kule paccājāto rūpesu saddesu gandhesu rasesu phassesu, so upapanno sabbamhi mānussake upabhogaparibhoge.
analyzed: idha ekaccaḥ nīce kule paccājātaḥ hoti iti nīce kule paccājātaḥ rūpesu saddesu gandhesu rasesu phassesu saḥ upapanno sabbamhi mānussake upabhoga paribhoge

original: Joti paṇītesu kusalesu upapanno sabbamhi mānussake upabhogaparibhoge upapannoti.
analyzed: paṇītesu kusalesu upapanno sabbamhi mānussake upabhoga paribhoge upapannoti

original: Tattha katamaṁ saṅkilesabhāgiyaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ ca suttaṁ?
analyzed: tattha katamam saṅkilesa bhāgiyam nibbedha bhāgiyam ca sutta

original: Na taṁ daḷhaṁ bandhanamāhu dhīrāti gāthā.
analyzed: na tam daḷham bandhanam āhu dhīrāḥ ati gāthā

original: Kena kāraṇena taṁ bandhanaṁ daḷhaṁ?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena tam bandhanam daḷha

original: Catūhi kāraṇehi issariyena sakkā mocetuṁ dhanena vā aññena vā yācanāya vā parāyanena vā.
analyzed: catūhi kāraṇehi issariyena sakkā mocetum dhanena vā aññena vā yācanāya vā parāyanena vā

original: Yesu ca ayaṁ rāgo maṇikuṇḍalesu puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā, idamassa cetasikabandhanaṁ.
analyzed: yesu ca ayam rāgaḥ maṇi kuṇḍalesu puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā idam assa cetasika bandhana

original: Taṁ na sakkā issariyena vā dhanena vā aññena vā yācanāya vā parāyanena vā mocetuṁ.
analyzed: tam na sakkā issariyena vā dhanena vā aññena vā yācanāya vā parāyanena vā mocetu

original: Na ca tattha koci atthi pāṭibhogo.
analyzed: na ca tattha koci atthi pāṭibhogaḥ

original: Iminā bandhanato mocayitthāti devo vā manusso vā tadidaṁ bandhanaṁ rāgānusayena ca chasu bāhiresu ca āyatanesu bandhati.
analyzed: iminā bandhanataḥ mocayittha ati devaḥ vā manussaḥ vā tat idam bandhanam rāga anusayena ca chasu bāhiresu ca āyatanesu bandhati

original: Rūpesu rūpataṇhā bandhati, yāva dhammesu dhammataṇhā.
analyzed: rūpesu rūpa taṇhā bandhati yāva dhammesu dhamma taṇhā

original: Yo idha loke bandho paralokasmiṁ bandho nīyati.
analyzed: yaḥ idha loke bandho para lokasmin bandho nīyati

original: So bandho jāyati, bandho mīyati.
analyzed: saḥ bandhaḥ jāyati bandhaḥ mīyati

original: Bandho asmā lokā paraṁ lokaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: bandhaḥ asmai lokā param lokam gacchati

original: Na sakkā mocetuṁ aññatra ariyamaggena imañca bandhanaṁ.
analyzed: na sakkā mocetum aññatra ariya maggena imañca bandhana

original: Maraṇabhāvañca upapattibhāvañca bhayato viditvā chandarāgaṁ pajahati.
analyzed: maraṇa bhāvam ca upapatti bhāvam ca bhayataḥ viditvā chanda rāgam pajahati

original: So imaṁ chandarāgaṁ pajahitvā atikkamati.
analyzed: saḥ imam chanda rāgam pajahitvā atikkamati

original: Ayañca loko ito paraṁ dutiyo.
analyzed: ayam ca lokaḥ itas param dutiyaḥ

original: Tattha yaṁ bandhanāsaṅkhārānaṁ pahānaṁ idaṁ vuccati ubhayesu ṭhānesu vīriyaṁ, gandhaparivāto sumuni nopalimpati.
analyzed: tattha yam bandhanā saṅkhārānam pahānam idam vuccati ubhayesu ṭhānesu su muni na upalimpati

original: Tatheva pariggahesu puttesu dāresu ca avūḷho salloti tasseva taṇhāya pahānaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: tathā iva pariggahesu puttesu dāresu ca a vūḍhaḥ sallaḥ ti tassa iva taṇhāya pahānam dasseti

original: Ayaṁ taṇhāmūlassa pahānā vare appamattoti kāmo pamādavattati pahānāya nekkhammābhirato appamādavihārī bhavati.
analyzed: ayam taṇhā mūlassa pahānā vare appamatto ti kāmo pamāda vattati pahānāya nekkhamma abhirataḥ appamāda vihārī bhavati

original: Tassa āsayaṁ pahānāya neva imaṁ lokaṁ āsīsati na paralokaṁ.
analyzed: tassa āsayam pahānāya na iva imam lokam na para loka

original: Na idhalokaṁ nissitaṁ, piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ ākaṅkhati.
analyzed: na idha lokam piya rūpam sāta rūpam ākaṅkhati

original: Nāpi paralokaṁ nissitaṁ piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ ākaṅkhati, tena vuccate “nāsīsate lokamimaṁ paraṁ lokañcā”ti.
analyzed: na api para lokam nissitam piya rūpam sāta rūpam ākaṅkhati tena vuccate lokam imam param lokam ca ati

original: Yaṁ tassa pahānaṁ taṁ chedanaṁ aṭṭhakavaggiyesu muni niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: yam tassa pahānam tam chedanam aṭṭhaka vaggiyesu niddiṭṭho

original: So idha virodho aṭṭhakavaggiyesu nāsīsanaṁ idha anāthā.
analyzed: saḥ idha virodhaḥ aṭṭhakavaggiyesu nāsīsanam idha anāthā

original: Tathāyaṁ taṇhāya tassa pariggahassa vatthukāmassa ekagāthāya ete sabbe kāmā dassitā.
analyzed: tathā ayam taṇhāya tassa pariggahassa vatthu kāmassa eka gāthāya ete sabbe kāmāḥ dassitā

original: Tena bhagavā deseti “etampi chetvāna paribbajanti anapekkhino sabbakāme pahāyā”ti.
analyzed: tena bhagavā deseti etam pi chetvāna paribbajanti anapekkhinaḥ sabba kāme pahāya ati

original: Imissā gāthāya dvidhā niddeso saṁsandananiddeso ca samayaniddeso ca, yathā ayaṁ gāthā
analyzed: imissā gāthāya dvidhā niddeso sasandana niddeso ca samaya niddeso ca yathā ayam gāthā

original: saṅkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca, evaṁ tāya gāthāya saṅkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca visajjanā.
analyzed: saṅkilesa bhāgiyam ca nibbedha bhāgiyam ca evam tāya gāthāya saṅkilesa bhāgiyam ca nibbedha bhāgiyam ca visajjanā

original: Evaṁ gāthā sabbagāthāsu byākaraṇesu vā niddiṭṭhaṁ suttaṁ.
analyzed: evam gāthā sabba gāthāsu byākaraṇesu vā niddiṭṭham sutta

original: Tattha katamā desanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā desanā

original: Imaṁ suttaṁ kenādhippāyena desitaṁ.
analyzed: imam suttam kena adhippāyena desita

original: Ye rāgacaritā sattā, te kāme pajahissantīti ayaṁ tattha bhagavato adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye rāga caritā sattā te kāme pajahissanti iti ayam tattha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Tattha katamo vicayo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ

original: Yassa dasavatthukā kilesā uttiṇṇā vantā viditā.
analyzed: yassa dasa vatthukā kilesā uttiṇṇā vantā viditā

original: Katame dasavidhāti, kilesakāmā ca orambhāgiyauddhambhāgiyā ca saṁyojanā dasavatthukāni āyatanāni, ayaṁ vicayo.
analyzed: katame dasavidhā ati kilesa kāmā ca orambhāgiya auddhambhāgiyā ca sayojanā dasa vatthukāni āyatanāni ayam vicayo

original: Tattha katamā yutti?
analyzed: tattha katamā yutti

original: Ye sārattā te gāḷhabandhanena bandhanti atthi esā yutti.
analyzed: ye gāḷhabandhanena bandhanti atthi esā yutti

original: Tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ padaṭṭhāno
