analyzed: maṇi kuṇḍalesu mamaṅkārassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Apekkhāti atītavatthussa sarāgassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: apekkhā ati atīta vatthussa sa rāgassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Etampi chetvāti bhāvanāya padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: etam pi chetvā ati bhāvanāya padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇo

original: Sārattacitto maṇikuṇḍalesu yo ahaṅkāre visatto mamaṅkāre visatto, yo puttadāre sāratto.
analyzed: sāratta cittaḥ maṇi kuṇḍalesu yaḥ ahaṅkāre visattaḥ mamaṅkāre visattaḥ yaḥ putta dāre sārattaḥ

original: Khettavatthusmiṁ sāratto.
analyzed: khetta vatthusmim sārattaḥ

original: Ayaṁ lakkhaṇo hāro.
analyzed: ayam lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ hāro

original: Idha sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo.
analyzed: idha sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye nibbānena chandikā bhavissanti, te puttadāre taṇhaṁ pajahissanti.
analyzed: ye nibbānena chandikāḥ bhavissanti te putta dāre taṇham pajahissanti

original: Ayaṁ tattha bhagavato adhippāyo.
analyzed: ayam tattha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Imāni cattāri saccāni.
analyzed: imāni cattāri saccāni

original: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ āvaṭṭaḥ

original: Yā puttadāre taṇhā, ayaṁ samudayo.
analyzed: yā putta dāre taṇhā ayam samudayaḥ

original: Ye upādinnakkhandhā, te ye ca bāhiresu rūpesu rūpapariggaho, idaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ tattha chedanīyaṁ, ayaṁ nirodho.
analyzed: ye upādinna kkhandhā te ye ca bāhiresu rūpesu rūpa pariggaho idam dukkha yam tattha ayam nirodho

original: Yena bhijjati, ayaṁ maggo.
analyzed: yena bhijjati ayam maggaḥ

original: Vibhattīti natthi vibhattiyā bhūmi.
analyzed: vibhatti iti natthi vibhattiyāḥ

original: Parivattanoti paṭipakkho niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: parivattano ti paṭipakkhaḥ niddiṭṭho

original: Tattha katamo vevacano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vevacanaḥ

original: Niddiṭṭho vevacano.
analyzed: niddiṭṭhaḥ vevacanaḥ

original: Tattha katamo otaraṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ

original: Atthi taṇhā eko satto otiṇṇo tappaccayā viññāṇaṁ yāva jarāmaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: atthi taṇhā ekaḥ satto otiṇṇo tad paccayā viññāṇam yāva jarā maraṇa

original: Yā tattha vedanā, ayaṁ avijjā vijjuppādā avijjānirodho yāva jarāmaraṇanirodho.
analyzed: yā tattha vedanā ayam avijjā vijjuppādā avijjā nirodhaḥ yāva jarā maraṇa nirodhaḥ

original: Tattha katamo sodhano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhano

original: Suddho gāthāya ārambho.
analyzed: suddhaḥ gāthāyaḥ ārambhaḥ

original: Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ adhiṭṭhāno

original: Na taṁ daḷhaṁ bandhanamāhu dhīrāti ekattatāya paññattā, na vemattatāya.
analyzed: na tam daḷham bandhanam āhu dhīrāḥ iti ekatta tāya paññattā na vematta tāya

original: Cattāro rāgā kāmarāgo rūparāgo bhavarāgo diṭṭhirāgo cāti ekattatāya paññattā.
analyzed: cattāro rāgā kāma rāgaḥ rūpa rāgaḥ bhava rāgaḥ diṭṭhi rāgaḥ ca ati ekatta tāya paññattā

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāro

original: Yesaṁ rāgo maṇikuṇḍalesu tassa subhasaññā hetu, anubyañjanaso ca nimittaggāhitā paccayo.
analyzed: yesam rāgaḥ maṇi kuṇḍalesu tassa subha saññā hetu ca nimitta ggāhi tā paccayo

original: Yāya te chinnāni tassa asubhasaññā hetu, nimittaggahaṇaanubyañjanaggahaṇavinodanaṁ paccayo.
analyzed: yāya te chinnāni tassa asubha saññā hetu nimitta ggahaṇa anubyañjana ggahaṇa vinodanam paccayaḥ

original: Tattha katamo samāropano?
analyzed: tattha katamo samāropano

original: Sāratto maṇikuṇḍalesu sammūḷhavidho duṭṭhātipi etampi chetvāna paribbajantīti taṁ pariññātatthaṁ parivajjitatthaṁ pajahitā, ayaṁ samāropano.
analyzed: sārattaḥ maṇi kuṇḍalesu sammūḷha vidhaḥ etam pi chetvāna paribbajanti iti tam pariññāta attham parivajjita attham pajahitā ayam samāropanaḥ

original: Yaṁ cetasikaṁ yaṁ pakappitaṁ vitthārena paccayo, yaṁ vā cetasikaṁ kāyikaṁ cetasikaṁ kammaṁ.
analyzed: yam cetasikam yam pakappitam vitthārena paccayaḥ yam vā cetasikam kāyikam cetasikam kamma

original: Kiṅkāraṇā?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇā

original: Cetasikā hi cetanā manokammāti vuccate, sā cetanākammaṁ, yaṁ cetasikaṁ imaṁ kāyikañca vācasikañca imāni tīṇi kammāni niddiṭṭhāni.
analyzed: cetasikā hi cetanā manaḥ kammā ati vuccate sā cetanā kamma yam cetasikam imam kāyikam ca vācasikam ca imāni tīṇi kammāni niddiṭṭhāni

original: Kāyakammaṁ vacīkammañca tāni kusalāni piyaṁ kāyena ca vācāya ca ārabhati parāmasati, ayaṁ vuccati sīlabbataparāmāso.
analyzed: kāya kammam vacī kammañca tāni kusalāni piyam kāyena ca vācāya ca ārabhati parāmasati ayam vuccati sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ

original: Saṅkappanā te tividhā saṅkhārā puññamayā apuññamayā āneñjamayā, tappaccayā viññāṇaṁ te ārammaṇametaṁ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
analyzed: saṅkappanā te tividhā saṅkhārā puñña mayā apuñña mayā āneñja mayā tad paccayā viññāṇam te ārammaṇam etam hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā

original: Yā subhasaññā sukhasaññā attasaññā ca.
analyzed: yā subha saññā sukha saññā atta saññā ca

original: Idaṁ cetasikaṁ.
analyzed: idam cetasika

original: Yaṁ rūpūpagaṁ viññāṇaṁ tiṭṭhati rūpārammaṇaṁ rūpapatiṭṭhitaṁ nandūpasecanaṁ vuddhiṁ
analyzed: yam rūpa upagam viññāṇam tiṭṭhati rūpa ārammaṇam rūpa patiṭṭhitam nandu upasecanam vuddhi

original: virūḷhiṁ vepullataṁ gacchati, ayaṁ saṅkappanā, iti yaṁ viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu ṭhitaṁ paṭhamābhinibbattiārammaṇavasena
analyzed: virūḷhim vepulla tam gacchati ayam saṅkappanā iti yam viññāṇa ṭṭhitīsu ṭhitam paṭhama abhinibbatti ārammaṇa vasena

original: upādānaṁ, idaṁ vuccati cetasikanti.
analyzed: upādāne idam vuccati cetasikan ti

original: Tattha ṭhitassa arūpassa yā nikanti ajjhosānaṁ, idampi sakampitaṁ manāpikesu rūpesu piyarūpasātarūpesu ābhogo, idaṁ cetasikaṁ.
analyzed: tattha ṭhitassa arūpassa yā nikanti ajjhosāna idam api sa kampitam manāpikesu rūpesu piya rūpa sāta rūpesu ābhogaḥ idam cetasika

original: Yaṁ ceteti sattesu manāpikesu abhijjhākāyagantho paṭighānusayesu byāpādakāyagantho
analyzed: yam ceteti sattesu manāpikesu abhijjhā kāya gantho paṭigha anusayesu byāpāda kāya gantho

original: sabbe cattāro ganthā, ayaṁ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu paṭhamābhinipāto cittassa yā cetanā
analyzed: sabbe cattāro ganthāḥ ayam pañcasu kāmaguṇesu paṭhama abhinipātaḥ cittassa yā cetanā

original: yassa tattha assādānupassissa anekā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṁ arūpavatiyo honti.
analyzed: yassa tattha assāda anupassissa anekā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ cittam arūpavatiyaḥ honti

original: Puggalo rāgānubandhibhūto tehi kilesakāmehi yathā kāmakaraṇīyo, ayaṁ vuccate kāmesu pakappanā.
analyzed: puggalaḥ rāga anubandhi bhūtaḥ tehi kilesa kāmehi yathā kāma karaṇīyaḥ ayam vuccate kāmesu pakappanā

original: Evaṁ sabbe cattāro oghā.
analyzed: evam sabbe cattāro oghā

original: Yaṁ tehi kāmehi saṁyutto viharati bhāvito ajjhosanno, ayaṁ cetanā.
analyzed: yam tehi kāmehi sayuttaḥ viharati bhāvitaḥ ajjhosannaḥ ayam cetanā

original: Yassa tathāyaṁ avītarāgassa adhigatapemassa tassa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjanti
analyzed: yassa tathā ayam avīta rāgassa adhigata pemassa tassa vipariṇāma aññathābhāvāḥ uppajjanti

original: sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā dukkhānuparivattitaṁ viññāṇaṁ hoti saritassa vayadhammasamuppādo
analyzed: soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsāḥ dukkha anuparivattitam viññāṇam hoti saritassa vaya dhamma samuppādo

original: cittaṁ pariyādiyati, idaṁ vuccati pakappitanti.
analyzed: cittam pariyādiyati idam vuccati pakappitanti

original: Ekamekassa ceteti ca pakappeti ca viññāṇassa ṭhiti yā hoti, sā ca ṭhiti dvidhā ārammaṇaṭṭhiti ca āhāraṭṭhiti ca.
analyzed: ekam ekassa ceteti ca pakappeti ca viññāṇassa ṭhiti yā hoti sā ca ṭhiti dvidhā ārammaṇa ṭhiti ca āhāra ṭhiti ca

original: Tattha yā ārammaṇaṭṭhiti, ayaṁ nāmarūpassa paccayo.
analyzed: tattha yā ārammaṇa ṭṭhiti ayam nāma rūpassa paccayo

original: Yā āhāraṭṭhiti yā punabbhavābhinibbattikā ṭhiti yā ca ponobhavikā ṭhiti, ayaṁ vuccati ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: yā āhāra ṭhiti yā punabbhava abhinibbattikā ṭhiti yā ca ponobhavikā ṭhiti ayam vuccati ārammaṇa

original: Taṁ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā tassa viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ yāva jarāmaraṇañca ceteti, atha ca puna patthayate yato na ponobhavikā anāgatavatthumhi, ayaṁ paṭipakkho niddiṭṭho.
analyzed: tat hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā tassa viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpam yāva jarā maraṇam ca ceteti atha ca puna patthayate yatas na ponobhavikā anāgata vatthumhi ayam paṭipakkhaḥ niddiṭṭho

original: Na ceteti na patthayati atha ca dūsetīti duvidho niddeso.
analyzed: na ceteti na patthayati atha ca dūseti iti duvidhaḥ niddesaḥ

original: Assa pubbe hoti taṁ cetasikaṁ taṁ pakappitaṁ asamūhataṁ tappaccayā, ayaṁ viññāṇassa ṭhiti hoti.
analyzed: assa pubbe hoti tam cetasikam tam pakappitam a samūhatam tad paccayā ayam viññāṇassa ṭhiti hoti

original: Atha vā tassa anusayā āvibhavanti tappaccayā tassa punabbhavo nibbattati.
analyzed: atha vā tassa anusayāḥ āvibhavanti tad paccayā tassa punabbhavaḥ nibbattati

original: Atha vā naṁ saṅkiyate appetu āgāre vā, sukhumā vā santi vā na saṅkiyate kāme taṁ evaṁ niccesupi āgāresu jāto hoti.
analyzed: atha vā nam saṅkiyate āgāre vā sukhumāḥ vā santi vā na saṅkiyate kāme tam evam niccesu pi āgāresu jātaḥ hoti

original: Taṁ nayati yaṁ no kappetuṁ evaṁ saṅkhārā cetitā pakappitā ca ārammaṇabhūtā honti,
analyzed: tam nayati yam no kappetum evam saṅkhārā cetitā pakappitā ca ārammaṇa bhūtā honti

original: yā ca cetanā yā ca pakappanā yañca vatthu nibbattaṁ, ubhopi ete ārammaṇaṁ viññāṇassa
analyzed: yā ca cetanā yā ca pakappanā yañca vatthu nibbatta ubho pi ete ārammaṇam viññāṇassa

original: tathā cetanāya ca saṅkappanāya ca patthanāya ca bhūtā sattā ceteti ca saṅkappeti ca.
analyzed: tathā cetanāya ca saṅkappanāya ca patthanāya ca bhūtā sattā ceteti ca saṅkappeti ca

original: Yaṁ gavesanā na ca ceteti na ca saṅkappeti.
analyzed: yam gavesanā na ca ceteti na ca saṅkappeti

original: Katame ca sattā bhūtā?
analyzed: katame ca sattā bhūtā

original: Ye ca tanujātaaṇḍajāpi aṇḍakā anubhinnā saṁsedajā na ca sambhinnā ime bhūtā.
analyzed: ye ca tanu jāta aṇḍa jā api aṇḍakāḥ anubhinnā sa seda jāḥ na ca sambhinnāḥ ime bhūtā

original: Katame sambhavesino gabbhagatā aṇḍagatā saṁsaranto ime na ceteti na pattheti na ca saṅkappeti.
analyzed: katame sambhavesinaḥ gabbha gatāḥ aṇḍa gatā sasarantaḥ ime na ceteti na pattheti na ca saṅkappeti

original: Anusaye na ca punabbhavo nibbattīti?
analyzed: anusaye na ca punabbhavaḥ nibbatti iti

original: Ye bhūtā sattā ye sambhavesino, te thāvarā.
analyzed: ye bhūtā sattā ye sambhavesinaḥ te thāvarā

original: Ye vā sato cetenti patthenti ca ye thāvarā.
analyzed: ye vā satas cetenti patthenti ca ye thāvarā

original: Te na ca cetenti, na ca patthenti, na ca saṅkappenti, anusayena ca saṁsaranti.
analyzed: te na ca cetenti na ca patthenti na ca saṅkappenti anusayena ca sasaranti

original: Aparo pariyāyo.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ

original: Ye ariyapuggalā sekkhā, tattha te na ca cetenti, na ca saṅkappenti, anusayena puna uppajjanti.
analyzed: ye ariya puggalā sekkhā tattha te na ca cetenti na ca saṅkappenti anusayena puna uppajjanti

original: Aparo pariyāyo.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ

original: Sukhumā pāṇā bhūmigatā udakagatā cakkhuno āpāthaṁ nāgacchanti, te na ca cetenti, na ca saṅkappenti, anusayena ca saṁsaranti.
analyzed: sukhumā pāṇāḥ bhūmi gatāḥ udaka gatāḥ cakkhunaḥ āpātham na āgacchanti te na ca cetenti na ca saṅkappenti anusayena ca sasaranti

original: Aparo pariyāyo.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ

original: Bāhikā sabbe bhikkhū abhimānikā, te na ca cetenti, na ca patthayanti, anusayena ca saṁsaranti, na ca cetenti, na ca saṅkappenti, na ca anusenti.
analyzed: bāhikā sabbe bhikkhū abhimānikā te na ca cetenti na ca patthayanti anusayena ca sasaranti na ca cetenti na ca saṅkappenti na ca anusenti

original: Ārammaṇampetaṁ na hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
analyzed: ārammaṇam petam na hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā

original: Na ca cetetīti pariyuṭṭhānasamugghātaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: na ca ceteti iti pariyuṭṭhāna samugghātam dasseti

original: Na ca anusetīti anusayasamugghātaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: na ca anuseti iti anusaya samugghātam dasseti

original: Na ca cetetīti oḷārikānaṁ kilesānaṁ pahānaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: na ca ceteti iti oḷārikānam kilesānam pahānam dasseti

original: Na ca anusetīti sukhumānaṁ kilesānaṁ pahānaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: na ca anuseti iti sukhumānam kilesānam pahānam dasseti

original: Na ca cetetīti yena bhūmi ca na ca patthayantīti sakadāgāmī anāgāmī, na ca anusetīti
analyzed: na ca ceteti iti yena bhūmi ca na ca patthayanti iti sakadāgāmī anāgāmī na ca anuseti iti

original: arahaṁ, na ca cetetīti sīlakkhandhassa paṭipakkhena pahānaṁ dasseti, na ca patthayatīti
analyzed: araha na ca ceteti iti sīlakkhandhassa paṭipakkhena pahānam dasseti na ca patthayati iti

original: samādhikkhandhassa paṭipakkhena pahānaṁ dasseti, na ca anusayatīti paññākkhandhassa
analyzed: samādhi kkhandhassa paṭipakkhena pahānam dasseti na ca anusayati iti paññā kkhandhassa

original: paṭipakkhena pahānaṁ dasseti, na ca cetetīti apuññamayānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ pahānaṁ dasseti,
analyzed: paṭipakkhena pahānam dasseti na ca ceteti iti apuñña mayānam saṅkhārānam pahānam dasseti

original: na ca patthayatīti puññamayānaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ pahānaṁ dasseti, na ca anusetīti āneñjamayānaṁ
analyzed: na ca patthayati iti puñña mayānam saṅkhārānam pahānam dasseti na ca anuseti iti āneñja mayāna

original: saṅkhārānaṁ pahānaṁ dasseti, na ca cetetīti anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ, na ca patthayatīti
analyzed: saṅkhārānam pahānam dasseti na ca ceteti iti na ca patthayati iti

original: aññindriyaṁ, na ca anusayatīti aññātāvino indriyaṁ.
analyzed: na ca anusayati iti aññātāvino indriya

original: Na ca cetetīti mudukā indriyabhāvanā, na ca patthayatīti majjhaindriyabhāvanā, na ca anusetīti adhimattā indriyabhāvanā.
analyzed: na ca ceteti iti mudukā indriya bhāvanā na ca patthayati iti majjhā endriya bhāvanā na ca anuseti iti adhimattā indriya bhāvanā

original: Ayaṁ suttattho.
analyzed: ayam suttattho

original: Tattha katamā desanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā desanā

original: Idha sutte cattāri saccāni desitāni.
analyzed: idha sutte cattāri saccāni desitāni

original: Yañca cetayitaṁ yañca pakappitaṁ atthi etaṁ ārammaṇaṁ cittaṁ patiṭṭhati vicinati yujjati.
analyzed: yat ca cetayitam yat ca pakappitam atthi etam ārammaṇam cittam patiṭṭhati vicinati yujjati

original: Na ca cetetīti na ca patthayatīti atthi evaṁ ārammaṇaṁ anusaye viññāṇamiti viciniyati yujjati na ca ceteti na ca patthayati.
analyzed: na ca ceteti iti na ca patthayati iti atthi evam ārammaṇam anusaye viññāṇam iti viciniyati yujjati na ca ceteti na ca patthayati

original: Anusayappahānā viññāṇaṭṭhitiṁ na gavesanti, viciyantaṁ yujjati.
analyzed: anusaya ppahānā viññāṇa ṭṭhitim na gavesanti viciyantam yujjati

original: Ayaṁ yuttivicayo.
analyzed: ayam yutti vicayaḥ

original: Tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ padaṭṭhāno

original: Cetanā pariyuṭṭhānaṁ cetanāpariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: cetanā pariyuṭṭhānam cetanā pariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Saṅkappanaṁ upādānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: saṅkappanam upādānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Anusayo pariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: anusayaḥ pariyuṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Tesaṁ chandarāgavināsāya bhāvanā bhavarāgassa pahānaṁ.
analyzed: tesam chanda rāga vināsāya bhāvanā bhava rāgassa

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇo

original: Yaṁ cetasikanti vedayitaṁ pakappitaṁ uggahitaṁ viññātaṁ tabbiññāṇaṁ ārammaṇampi paccayopi.
analyzed: yam cetasikanti vedayitam pakappitam uggahitam viññātam tad biññāṇam ārammaṇam pi paccayaḥ pi

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ

original: Idha sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: idha sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye punabbhavaṁ na icchanti, te na cetayissanti na ca patthayissantīti, ayaṁ adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye punabbhavam naḥ icchanti te na cetayissanti na ca patthayissanti iti ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: Āvaṭṭoti yā ca cetanā patthanā ca anusayo ca viññāṇaṭṭhitipahānā ca, imāni dve saccāni.
analyzed: āvaṭṭoti yā ca cetanā patthanā ca anusayo ca viññāṇa ṭṭhiti pahānā ca imāni dve saccāni

original: Vibhattīti natthi vibhattiyā bhūmi.
analyzed: vibhatti iti natthi vibhattiyāḥ

original: Parivattanā pana paṭipakkhaṁ suttaṁ.
analyzed: parivattanā pana paṭipakkham sutta

original: Tattha katamo vevacano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vevacanaḥ

original: Cetanā rūpasañcetanā yāva dhammasañcetanā.
analyzed: cetanā rūpa sañcetanā yāva dhamma sañcetanā

original: Yo anusayo, te satta anusayā.
analyzed: yaḥ anusayaḥ te satta anusayā

original: Paññattīti cetanāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ paññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: paññatti iti cetanā pariyuṭṭhānam paññattiyā paññattā

original: Saṅkappanaṁ upādānapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: saṅkappanam upādāna paññattiyā paññatta

original: Anusayo hetupaññattiyā paññatto.
analyzed: anusayaḥ hetu paññattiyā paññattaḥ

original: Viññāṇaṭṭhiti upapattihetupaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: viññāṇa ṭṭhiti upapatti hetu paññattiyā paññattā

original: Cetanā saṅkappanā anusayo samucchedo chandarāgavinayapaññattiyā paññatto.
analyzed: cetanā saṅkappanā anusayo samucchedaḥ chanda rāga vinaya paññattiyā paññatto

original: Paṭhame keci dvīhi parivattakehi paṭiccasamuppādo idappaccayatāya majjhapaññatti.
analyzed: paṭhame keci dvīhi parivattakehi paṭiccasamuppādaḥ idappaccaya tāya majjha paññatti

original: Otaraṇoti dvīhi parivattakehi dukkhañca samudayo ca majjhimakehi maggo ca nirodho ca.
analyzed: dvīhi parivattakehi dukkham ca samudayaḥ ca majjhimakehi maggo ca nirodho ca

original: Sodhanoti sutte suttassa ārambho.
analyzed: sodhano ti sutte suttassa ārambho

original: Adhiṭṭhānoti yañcetayitaṁ sabbaṁ adhiṭṭhānena ekattāya paññattaṁ.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāno ti yat cetayitam sabbam adhiṭṭhānena ekattāya paññatta

original: Saṅkappitanti upādānekattāya paññattaṁ.
analyzed: saṅkappitanti upādāna ekattāya paññatta

original: Viññāṇaṁ ekattāya paññattaṁ.
analyzed: viññāṇam ekattāya paññatta

original: Parikkhāroti subhañca ārammaṇaṁ ayoniso manasikāro cetanā hetupaccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: parikkhāro ti subhaṃ ca ārammaṇam ayonisaḥ manasikāro cetanā hetu paccaya tāya paccayo

original: Viññāṇassa patiṭṭhāno dhammo ārammaṇapaccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: viññāṇassa patiṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ ārammaṇa paccaya tāya paccayo

original: Tassa manasikāro hetupaccayatāya paccayo.
analyzed: tassa manasikāraḥ hetu paccaya tāya paccayaḥ

original: Tattha katamo samāropano?
analyzed: tattha katamo samāropano

original: Idaṁ suttaṁ saññitaṁ tattha ceteti visajjanā iti niddisitabbā.
analyzed: idam suttam saññitam tattha cetā iti visajjanā iti niddisitabbā

original: Tassa diṭṭhiyā viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ yāva jarāmaraṇaṁ, ayaṁ samāropano.
analyzed: tassa diṭṭhiyāḥ viññāṇa paccayāḥ nāma rūpam yāva jarā maraṇa ayam samāropanaḥ

original: Ārammaṇametaṁ na hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā, viññāṇanirodhā nāmarūpanirodho, nāmarūpanirodhā yāva jarāmaraṇanirodho.
analyzed: ārammaṇam etam na hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā viññāṇa nirodhā nāma rūpa nirodho nāma rūpa nirodhā yāva jarā maraṇa nirodho

original: Tattha katamaṁ saṅkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṁ?
analyzed: tattha katamam saṅkilesa bhāgiyam ca nibbedha bhāgiyam ca asekkha bhāgiyam ca sutta

original: Ayaṁ loko santāpajāto yāva ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṁsu.
analyzed: ayam santāpa jātaḥ ye hi keci samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā bhavena bhavassa vippamokkham āhasu

original: Saṅkilesabhāgiyaṁ upadhiṁ hi paṭicca dukkhamidaṁ sambhoti, yā tā pana taṇhā pahīyanti, bhavaṁ nābhinandatīti nibbedhassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādāya punabbhavo na hoti.
analyzed: saṅkilesa bhāgiyam upadhim hi paṭicca dukkham idam yā tā pana taṇhā pahīyanti bhavam na abhinandati iti nibbedhassa nibbutassa bhikkhuno an upādāya punabbhavaḥ na hoti

original: Upaccagā sabbabhavāni tādīti asekkhabhāgiyaṁ.
analyzed: sabba bhavāni asekkha bhāgiya

original: Tattha santāpajātoti rāgajo santāpo dosajo mohajoti.
analyzed: tattha santāpa jāto ti rāga jo santāpaḥ dosa jo moha joti

original: Tesaṁ sattānaṁ ṭhānaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: tesam sattānam ṭhānam dasseti

original: Loko santāpajātoti phasso tividho sukhavedanīyo dukkhavedanīyo adukkhamasukhavedanīyo.
analyzed: loko santāpa jāto ti phassaḥ tividhaḥ sukha vedanīyaḥ dukkha vedanīyaḥ adukkham asukha vedanīyaḥ

original: Tattha sukhavedanīyo phasso rāgasantāpo, dukkhavedanīyo dosasantāpo, adukkhamasukhavedanīyo mohasantāpo.
analyzed: tattha sukha vedanīyaḥ phassaḥ rāga santāpaḥ dukkha vedanīyaḥ dosa santāpaḥ adukkham asukha vedanīyaḥ moha santāpaḥ

original: Yathā ca bhagavā āha paṭhamakassa valāhakassa gomagge yehi gahapatiputta rāgajehi dosajehi mohajehi santāpehi dukkhaṁ supati, te mama santāpā na santi.
analyzed: yathā ca bhagavā āha paṭhamakassa valāhakassa gomagge yehi gahapati putta rāga jehi dosa jehi moha jehi santāpehi dukkham supati te mama santāpāḥ na santi

original: Rogaṁ vadati attatoti tehi santāpehi santāpito tividhaṁ vipallāsaṁ paṭilabhati saññāvipallāsaṁ cittavipallāsaṁ diṭṭhivipallāsaṁ.
analyzed: rogam vadati tehi santāpehi santāpitaḥ tividham vipallāsam paṭilabhati saññā vipallāsam citta vipallāsam diṭṭhi vipallāsa

original: Tattha asubhe subhanti saññāvipallāso.
analyzed: tattha asubhe subham ti saññā vipallāso

original: Dukkhe sukhanti cittavipallāso.
analyzed: dukkhe sukhanti citta vipallāso

original: Anicce niccanti anattani attāti diṭṭhivipallāso.
analyzed: anicce niccanti an attani attā ti diṭṭhi vipallāso

original: Yathā cittassa vipallāso saññādiṭṭhite tividhā vitakkā—
analyzed: yathā cittassa vipallāso saññā diṭṭhite tividhāḥ vitakkā

original: cittavitakko vipallāso saññāvitakko vipallāso diṭṭhivitakko vipallāsopi.
analyzed: citta vitakko vipallāsaḥ saññā vitakko vipallāsaḥ diṭṭhi vitakko vipallāsaḥ api

original: Tattha avijjā vipallāso gocarā gatipateyyabhūmi, yathā hi taṁ sañjānāti yathā vijānāti yathā sañjānāti ca vijānāti ca.
analyzed: tattha avijjā vipallāsaḥ gocarā gatipateyya bhūmi yathā hi tam sañjānāti yathā vijānāti yathā sañjānāti ca vijānāti ca

original: Yathā khanti ceteti ime cattāro vipallāsā sattā yehi catubbidhaṁ attabhāvavatthuṁ rogabhūtaṁ gaṇḍabhūtaṁ “attā”ti vadanti.
analyzed: yathā ime cattāro vipallāsā sattā yehi catubbidham atta bhāva vatthum roga bhūtam gaṇḍa bhūtam attā ati vadanti

original: Rogaṁ vadati attatoti ayaṁ āvaṭṭo.
analyzed: rogam vadati ayam āvaṭṭaḥ

original: Yena yena hi maññati tato taṁ hoti aññathāti subhanti maññati na tathā hoti.
analyzed: yena yena hi maññati tatas tam hoti aññathā ati maññati na tathā hoti

original: Evaṁ sukhanti niccaṁ attāti so aññathā bhavameva santaṁ anāgataṁ bhavaṁ patthayati, tena vuccati “bhavarāgo”ti.
analyzed: evam sukhanti niccam attā ati so aññathā bhavam eva santam anāgatam bhavam patthayati tena vuccati bhava rāgaḥ ti

original: Bhavamevābhinandati, yaṁ abhinandati, taṁ dukkhanti pañcakkhandhe niddisiyati.
analyzed: bhavam eva abhinandati yam abhinandati tam dukkhanti pañca kkhandhe niddisiyati

original: Yañca tappaccayā sokaparidevadukkhaṁ tassa hi bhāvessati.
analyzed: yat ca tad paccayā soka parideva dukkham tassa hi bhāvessati

original: Ettāvatā saṅkileso hoti.
analyzed: ettāvatā saṅkilesaḥ hoti

original: Pahānatthaṁ kho pana brahmacariyaṁ vussati.
analyzed: pahāna attham kho pana brahmacariyam vussati

original: Tiṇṇaṁ santāpānaṁ chandarāgavinayo hoti.
analyzed: tiṇṇam santāpānam chanda rāga vinayaḥ hoti

original: Upadhiṁ hi paṭicca dukkhamidaṁ bhavatīti ye bhavamevābhinandanti yassa bhāvessati, taṁ dukkhaṁ tassa dukkhassa pahānamāha.
analyzed: upadhim hi paṭicca dukkham idam bhavati iti ye bhavam eva abhinandanti yassa bhāvessati tam dukkham tassa dukkhassa pahānam āha

original: Sabbaso upādānañca yaṁ natthi dukkhassa sambhavoti cattāro vipallāsā yathā niddiṭṭhaupādānamāha.
analyzed: sabbasas upādānam ca yat natthi dukkhassa sambhavaḥ ti cattāro vipallāsāḥ yathā niddiṭṭha aupādānam āha

original: Tassa paṭhamo vipallāso kāmupādānaṁ, dutiyaṁ diṭṭhupādānaṁ, tatiyaṁ sīlabbatupādānaṁ,
analyzed: tassa paṭhamaḥ vipallāsaḥ kāma upādāna dutiyam diṭṭha upādāna tatiyam sīla bbata upādāna

original: catutthaṁ attavādupādānaṁ, tesaṁ yo khayo natthi dukkhassa sambhavo upadhi nidānaṁ dukkhanirodhamāha.
analyzed: tesam yaḥ khayaḥ natthi dukkhassa sambhavaḥ nidānam dukkha nirodham āha

original: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato vibhavataṇhā na hoti.
analyzed: evam etam yathābhūtam sammappaññāya passataḥ vibhava taṇhā na hoti

original: Vibhavaṁ nābhinandatīti dassanabhūmiṁ manteti sabbaso taṇhakkhayaṁ nibbānanti dve vimuttiyo katheti rāgavirāgañca avijjāvirāgañca.
analyzed: vibhavam na abhinandati iti dassana bhūmim manteti sabbaso taṇha kkhayam nibbānam ti dve vimuttiyaḥ kathā iti rāga virāgañca avijjā virāgañca

original: Tassa bhikkhunoti anupādisesanibbānadhātuṁ manteti.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhuno ti an upādisesa nibbāna dhātum manteti

original: Ayaṁ suttassa atthaniddeso.
analyzed: ayam suttassa attha niddesaḥ

original: Tattha katamo vicayo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ

original: Yassa yattha pariḷāheti tassa pariḍayhantassa so yathābhūtaṁ natthi nibbindati ca, ayaṁ vicayo ca yutti ca.
analyzed: yassa yattha pariḷāheti tassa pariḍayhantassa so yathābhūtam natthi nibbindati ca ayam vicayo ca yutti ca

original: Padaṭṭhāno rāgajo pariḷāho sukhindriyassa domanassindriyassa ca padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: pada ṭṭhānaḥ rāga jo pariḷāhaḥ sukha indriyassa domanassa indriyassa ca pada ṭṭhāna

original: Dosajo pariḷāho sukhindriyassa domanassindriyassa ca padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: dosa jo pariḷāho sukha indriyassa domanassa indriyassa ca padaṭṭhāna

original: Mohajo pariḷāho upekkhindriyassa domanassindriyassa ca padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: moha jo pariḷāhaḥ upekkhā indriyassa domanassindriyassa ca padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Phassapareto vedanāpareto saññāparetopi saṅkhāraparetopi yena yena maññati yadi subhanimittena
analyzed: phassa paretaḥ vedanā paretaḥ saññā paretaḥ api saṅkhāra paretaḥ api yena yena maññati yadi subha nimittena

original: yadi sukhanimittena yadi niccanimittena yadi attanimittena asubhe subhanti maññati,
analyzed: yadi sukha nimittena yadi nicca nimittena yadi atta nimittena asubhe subhanti maññati

original: evaṁ sabbaṁ rāgaje pariḷāhe vutte cattāro pariḷāhā vuttā bhavanti.
analyzed: evam sabbam rāga je pariḷāhe vutte cattāro pariḷāhāḥ vuttāḥ bhavanti

original: Rāgajo dosajo mohajo diṭṭhijo ca rāgaṁ vadāmīti attato vadati.
analyzed: rāga jaḥ dosa jaḥ moha jaḥ diṭṭhi jaḥ ca rāgam vadāmi iti attataḥ vadati

original: Sabbāni pannarasa padāni aniccaṁ dukkhanti.
analyzed: sabbāni pannarasa padāni aniccam dukkhanti

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ

original: Idha sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: idha sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye pariḷāhena na acchanti te bhavaṁ nābhinandanti.
analyzed: ye pariḷāhena na acchanti te bhavam na abhinandanti

original: Ye bhavaṁ nābhinandanti, te parinibbāyissanti.
analyzed: ye bhavam na abhinandanti te parinibbāyissanti

original: Ayaṁ adhippāyo.
analyzed: ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ āvaṭṭaḥ

original: Saṅkilesabhāgiyena dukkhañca samudayañca niddisati.
analyzed: saṅkilesa bhāgiyena dukkhañca samudayañca niddisati

original: Nibbedhabhāgiyena maggañca nirodhañca.
analyzed: nibbedha bhāgiyena maggañca nirodhañca

original: Tattha katamā vibhatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā vibhatti

original: Santāpajāto rogajāto rogaṁ vadati attato taṁ na ekaṁsena hoti amanasikārā santāpajāto kho na ca rogaṁ attato vadati.
analyzed: santāpa jātaḥ roga jātaḥ rogam vadati attataḥ tam naḥ ekasenā hoti amanasikārā santāpa jātaḥ kho na ca rogam attataḥ vadati

original: Tattha katamo parivattano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parivattano

original: Pakkhapaṭipakkhanidassanatthaṁ bhūmi parivattanāya.
analyzed: pakkha paṭipakkha nidassana ttham bhūmi parivattanāya

original: Tattha katamo vevacano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vevacanaḥ hāro

original: Rogañca attato vadati sallaṁ attato vadati.
analyzed: rogam ca attataḥ vadati sallam attataḥ vadati

original: Pannarasa padāni sabbāni vattabbāni.
analyzed: pannarasa padāni sabbāni vattabbāni

original: Tattha katamā paññatti?
analyzed: tattha katamā paññatti

original: Santāpajātoti domanassapadaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: santāpa jātaḥ ti domanassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Sabbe vacanapaññattiyā paññapeti.
analyzed: sabbe vacana paññattiyā paññapeti

original: Rogaṁ vadati attato vipallāso saṅkilesapaññattiyā paññapeti.
analyzed: rogam vadati attataḥ vipallāsaḥ saṅkilesa paññattiyā paññapeti

original: Yaṁ nābhinandati, taṁ dukkhanti vipallāsanikkhepapaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: yam na abhinandati tam dukkhanti vipallāsa nikkhepa paññattiyā paññattā

original: Te akatasattā lokā majjhena vemattatāya paññattā.
analyzed: te akata sattāḥ lokāḥ majjhena vemattatāya paññattā

original: Tattha katamo otaraṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ

original: Santāpajātoti tīṇi akusalamūlāni, te saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā, dhātūsu dhammadhātu, āyatanesu dhammāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: santāpa jātaḥ ti tīṇi akusala mūlāni te saṅkhārā saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannā dhātūsu dhamma dhātu āyatanesu dhamma āyatana

original: Indriyesu itthindriyaṁ purisindriyañca padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: indriyesu itthi indriyam purisa indriyam ca padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamo sodhano?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ sodhano

original: Suddho suttassa ārambho.
analyzed: suddhaḥ suttassa ārambhaḥ

original: Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāro

original: Pariḷāhoti ye sattā lokā ekattapaññattiyā paññattā, te akatasattā lokā majjhena vemattatāya paññattā.
analyzed: pariḷāho ti ye sattāḥ lokāḥ ekatta paññattiyā paññattā te akata sattāḥ lokāḥ majjhena vemattatāya paññattā

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāro

original: Santāpajātoti ayoniso manasikāro hetu, vipallāsañca paccayo.
analyzed: santāpa jātaḥ ti ayonisaḥ manasikāraḥ hetu vipallāsaṃ ca paccayo

original: Tattha dvīhi dhammehi attā abhiniviṭṭhā cittañca cetasikañca dhamme ubhayāni tassa viparītena parāmasato.
analyzed: tattha dvīhi dhammehi attā abhiniviṭṭhā cittam ca cetasikañca dhamme ubhayāni tassa viparītena parāmasato

original: Aparo pariyāyo, cetasikehi dhammehi attasaññā anattasaññā samugghāteti.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyo cetasikehi dhammehi atta saññā anatta saññā samugghāte ti

original: Aparo pariyāyo.
analyzed: aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ

original: Aniccasaññā cetasikesu dhammesu, na tu attasaññā.
analyzed: anicca saññā cetasikesu dhammesu na tu atta saññā

original: Idaṁ vuccati cittanti vā manoti vā viññāṇanti vā idaṁ dīgharattaṁ abbhuggataṁ etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti.
analyzed: idam vuccati cittam ti vā manaḥ ti vā viññāṇam ti vā idam dīgharattam abbhuggatam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā ati

original: Tattha cetasikā dhammānupassanā esāpi dhammasaññā.
analyzed: tattha cetasikā dhamma anupassanā esā api dhamma saññā

original: Tassa ko hetu, ko paccayo?
analyzed: tassa kaḥ hetu kaḥ paccayo

original: Ahaṅkāro hetu, mamaṅkāro paccayo.
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ hetu mamaṅkāro paccayo

original: Tattha katamo samāropano?
analyzed: tattha katamo samāropano

original: Ayaṁ loko santāpajātoti akusalaṁ manteti viññāṇaṁ nāmarūpassa paccayo yāva jarāmaraṇanti, ayaṁ samāropano.
analyzed: ayam loko santāpa jāto ti akusalam manteti viññāṇam nāma rūpassa paccayaḥ yāva jarā maraṇan ti ayam samāropano

original: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, sammappaññāya passati akusalamūlānaṁ pahānaṁ.
analyzed: evam etam yathābhūta sammappaññāya passati akusala mūlānam pahāna

original: Tattha avijjānirodho avijjānirodhā yāva jarāmaraṇanirodho, ayaṁ samāropano.
analyzed: tattha avijjā nirodhaḥ avijjā nirodhā yāva jarā maraṇa nirodhaḥ ayam samāropanaḥ

original: Cattāro puggalā—
analyzed: cattāro puggalā

original: anusotagāmī paṭisotagāmī ṭhitatto, tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇoti.
analyzed: anusota gāmī paṭisota gāmī ṭhitatto tiṇṇo pāraṅgataḥ thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ ti

original: Tattha yo anusotagāmī ayaṁ kāme sevati.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ anusota gāmī ayam kāme sevati

original: Pāpañca kammaṁ karoti yāva kāme paṭisevati.
analyzed: pāpam ca kammam karoti yāva kāme paṭisevati

original: Idaṁ lobho akusalamūlaṁ, soyeva taṇhā, so tehi kāmehi vuyhati anusotagāmīti vuccati.
analyzed: idam lobhaḥ akusala mūla sā yā iva taṇhā saḥ tehi kāmehi vuyhati anusota gāmī iti vuccati

original: Yo puggalo tāhi gamito tappaccayā tassa hetu akusalakammaṁ karoti kāyena ca vācāya ca, ayaṁ vuccati pāpakammaṁ karotīti.
analyzed: yaḥ puggalaḥ tāhi gamito tad paccayā tassa hetu akusala kammam karoti kāyena ca vācāya ca ayam vuccati pāpa kammam karoti iti

original: Tassa tīṇi sotāni sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso.
analyzed: tassa tīṇi sotāni sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ

original: Imehi tīhi sotehi tividhadhātuyaṁ uppajjati kāmadhātuyaṁ rūpadhātuyaṁ arūpadhātuyaṁ.
analyzed: imehi tīhi sotehi tividha dhātuyam uppajjati kāmadhātuyam rūpadhātuyam a rūpa dhātuya

original: Tena paṭipakkhena yo kāme na paṭisevati.
analyzed: tena paṭipakkhena yaḥ kāme na paṭisevati

original: Yo sīlavataṁ na parāmasati.
analyzed: yaḥ sīlavatam na parāmasati

original: Yo sakkāyadiṭṭhīnaṁ pahānāya kāmesu yathābhūtaṁ ādīnavaṁ passati.
analyzed: yaḥ sakkāya diṭṭhīnam pahānāya kāmesu yathābhūtam ādīnavam passati

original: Yena ca te dhamme paṭisevati.
analyzed: yena ca te dhamme paṭisevati

original: Yañca tappaccayā tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇoti arahaṁ kira.
analyzed: yat ca tad paccayā tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇa uti araham kira

original: Tattha arahaṁ tassa pāraṅgato hoti, pāraṅgatassa thale tiṭṭhati sopādisesā nibbānadhātu.
analyzed: tattha araham tassa pāraṅgataḥ hoti pāraṅgatassa thale tiṭṭhati sa upādisesā nibbāna dhātu

original: Anusotagāminīti dassanappahātabbānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ appahānamāha.
analyzed: anusota gāminī iti dassana pahātabbānam sayojanānam appahānam āha

original: Paṭisotagāminīti phale diṭṭhekaṭṭhānañca kilesānaṁ pahānamāha, ṭhitattena pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ pahānamāha.
analyzed: paṭisotagāminī iti phale diṭṭha ikaṭṭhānam ca kilesānam pahānam āha pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam pahānam āha

original: Tattha anusotagāminā maggarūpimāha.
analyzed: tattha anusota gāminā magga rūpim āha

original: Paṭisotagāminā ṭhitattena ca maggamitimāha.
analyzed: paṭisota gāminā ca maggamitim āha

original: Pāraṅgatena sāvakā asekkhā ca sammāsambuddhā ca vuttā.
analyzed: pāraṅga tena sāvakāḥ asekkhā ca sammāsambuddhā ca vuttā

original: Anusotagāminā sakkāyasamudayagāminiṁ paṭipadamāha.
analyzed: anusota gāminā sa kāya samudaya gāminim paṭipadam āha

original: Paṭisotagāminā ṭhitattena sakkāyanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadamāha.
analyzed: paṭisota gāminā sakkāya nirodha gāminim paṭipadam āha

original: Pāraṅgatena dasa asekkhā arahantā dhammā vuttā.
analyzed: pāraṅga tena dasa asekkhāḥ arahantā dhammāḥ vuttā

original: Ayaṁ suttattho.
analyzed: ayam suttattho

original: Tattha katamā desanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā desanā

original: Imasmiṁ hi sutte cattāri ariyasaccāni desitāni.
analyzed: imasmin hi sutte cattāri ariya saccāni desitāni

original: Tedhātukalokasamatikkamanañca.
analyzed: tedhātuka loka samatikkamanañca

original: Tattha katamo vicayo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicayaḥ hāro

original: Yo kāme paṭisevati pāpaṁ kareyyāti yo ca kāme na paṭisevati so pāpakammaṁ na kareyyāti yo ca imehi dvīhi bhūmīhi uttiṇṇo pāraṅgatoti yā vīmaṁsā ayaṁ vicayo.
analyzed: yaḥ kāme paṭisevati pāpam kareyyāti yaḥ ca kāme na paṭisevati saḥ pāpa kammam na kareyyāti yaḥ ca imehi dvīhi bhūmīhi uttiṇṇaḥ pāraṅgato ti ayam vicayo

original: Yuttīti yujjati suttesu, nāyujjatīti yā vīmaṁsāya, ayaṁ yutti.
analyzed: yutti iti yujjati suttesu na a yujjati iti yā ayam

original: Padaṭṭhānoti anusotagāminā sattannaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānaḥ ti anusota gāminā sattannam sayojanānam padaṭṭhāna

original: Akusalassa kiriyā akusalassa mūlānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: akusalassa kiriyā akusalassa mūlānaṃ padaṭṭhāna

original: Paṭisotagāminā yathābhūtadassanassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: paṭisota gāminā yathābhūta dassanassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Ṭhitattena asaṁhāriyāya padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: ṭhita ttena a sahāriyāya padaṭṭhāna

original: Pāraṅgatoti kadāci bhūmiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: kadāci bhūmiyā padaṭṭhāna

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Yo anusotaṁ gacchati taṇhāvasena.
analyzed: yaḥ anu sotam gacchati taṇhā vasena

original: Sabbesampi kilesānaṁ vasena gacchati.
analyzed: sabbesam pi kilesānam vasena gacchati

original: Yo paṭisotaṁ vāyamati.
analyzed: yaḥ paṭisotam vā āyamati

original: Taṇhāya sabbesampi so kilesānaṁ vāyamati paṭisotaṁ.
analyzed: taṇhāya sabbesam pi so kilesānam vā āyamati

original: Yo attanā ṭhito kāyenapi so ṭhito vācācittenapi so ṭhito.
analyzed: yaḥ attanā ṭhitaḥ kāyena api saḥ ṭhitaḥ vācā cittena api saḥ ṭhitaḥ

original: Ayaṁ lakkhaṇo hāro.
analyzed: ayam lakkhaṇaḥ hāro

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho?
analyzed: tattha katamo catu byūhaḥ

original: Idha sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: idha sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye anusotagāminiyā paṭipadāya nābhiramissanti, te paṭisotaṁ vāyamissantīti yāva kadāci bhūmiyaṁ, ayaṁ adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye anusota gāminiyā paṭipadāya na abhiramissanti te paṭisotam vāyamissanti iti yāva kadāci ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: Āvaṭṭoti idha sutte cattāri suttāni desitāni.
analyzed: idha sutte cattāri suttāni desitāni

original: Tattha katamo vibhatti hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vibhatti hāro

original: Yo kāme paṭisevati pāpañca kammaṁ karoti.
analyzed: yaḥ kāme paṭisevati pāpam ca kammam karoti

original: So anusotagāmīti na ekaṁsena sotāpannopi kāme paṭisevati.
analyzed: saḥ anusota gāmī iti na eka sena sotāpannaḥ api kāme paṭisevati

original: Taṁ bhāgiyañca pāpakammaṁ karoti.
analyzed: tam bhāgiyam ca pāpa kammam karoti

original: Kiñcāpi sekkhopi kareyya pāpaṁ yathā sutte niddiṭṭho na ca so anusotagāmī, idaṁ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: kiñca api sekkhaḥ api kareyya pāpam yathā sutte niddiṭṭhaḥ na ca saḥ anusota gāmī idam

original: Na ca kāme paṭisevati na ca pāpakammaṁ karoti paṭisotagāmī na ca ekaṁsena sabbe bāhirako
analyzed: na ca kāme paṭisevati na ca pāpa kammam karoti paṭisota gāmī na ca eka sena sabbe bāhirako

original: kāmesu vītarāgo na ca kāme paṭisevati, tena ca pāpakammaṁ karoti anusotagāmī paṭisotagāmī, ayaṁ vibhatti.
analyzed: kāmesu vīta rāgaḥ na ca kāme paṭisevati tena ca pāpa kammam karoti anusota gāmī paṭisota gāmī ayam

original: Tattha katamo parivattano hāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parivattanaḥ hāro

original: Niddiṭṭho paṭipakkho.
analyzed: niddiṭṭhaḥ paṭipakkho

original: Vevacanoti kāmesu vatthukāmāpi kilesakāmāpi rūpasaddagandharasaphassaputtadāradāsakammakaraporisañca pariggahā.
analyzed: kāmesu vatthu kāmā api kilesa kāmā api rūpa sadda gandha rasa phassa putta dāra dāsa kamma kara porisam ca pariggahā

original: Paññattīti sabbe puthujjanā ekattāya paññattā.
analyzed: paññattī iti sabbe puthujjanāḥ ekattāya paññattā

original: Anusotagāmīti kilesasamudācārapaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: anusota gāmī iti kilesa samudācāra paññattiyā paññattā

original: Ye pana sekkhā puggalā, te nibbānapaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: ye pana sekkhā puggalā te nibbāna paññattiyā paññattā

original: Ye pana anāgāmī, te asaṁhāriya paññattiyā paññattā, ayaṁ paññatti.
analyzed: ye pana anāgāmī te asahāriya paññattiyā paññattā ayam paññatti

original: Otaraṇoti yo anusotagāmī, so dukkhaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ anusota gāmī so dukkha

original: Ye tassa dhammā, te dukkhassa samudayo.
analyzed: ye tassa dhammā te dukkhassa samudayaḥ

original: Yaṁ rūpaṁ, ayaṁ rūpakkhandho, evaṁ pañcapi khandhā paṭiccasamuppādo, te kilesā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā dhammāyatanaṁ dhammadhātu indriyesu ca paññattā.
analyzed: yam ayam rūpa kkhandho evam pañca api khandhā paṭiccasamuppādo te kilesā saṅkhāra khandha pariyāpannā dhamma āyatanam dhamma dhātu indriyesu ca paññattā

original: Sodhanoti yenārambhena idaṁ suttaṁ desitaṁ, so ārambho sabbo suddho.
analyzed: yena ārambhena idam suttam desita so ārambho sabbo suddho

original: Adhiṭṭhānoti paṭisotagāminā sabbe sotāpannā ekattena vā niddiṭṭhā rāgānusayapaṭisotagāmino sekkhāva maggo ca sekkho ca puggalo ṭhitattoti.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāno ti paṭisota gāminā sabbe sotāpannāḥ ekattena vā niddiṭṭhāḥ rāga anusaya paṭisota gāmino sekkhā va maggo ca sekkho ca puggalo ṭhita tto ti

original: Vītarāgo ekattāya paññatto.
analyzed: vīta rāgaḥ ekattāya paññattaḥ

original: Pāraṅgatoti sabbe arahanto sabbe paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhā ca ekattāya paññattā.
analyzed: pāraṅgato ti sabbe arahantaḥ sabbe paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhā ca ekattāya paññattā

original: Parikkhāroti anusotagāmino pāpamittapaccayo kāmapariyuṭṭhānaṁ hetu.
analyzed: parikkhāro ti anusota gāmino pāpa mitta paccayo kāma pariyuṭṭhānam hetu

original: Paṭisotagāmino dve hetū dve paccayā ca yāva sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyadiṭṭhi, tassa paṭiladdhamaggo hetu ārambho paccayo kāyiko cetasikassa koṭṭhāso ca.
analyzed: paṭisotagāminaḥ dve hetū dve paccayā ca yāva sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyadiṭṭhi tassa paṭiladdha maggaḥ hetu ārambho paccayo kāyikaḥ cetasikassa koṭṭhāso ca

original: Samāropanoti vibhatti idaṁ suttaṁ natthi samāropanāya bhūmi.
analyzed: samāropanā iti vibhatti idam suttam natthi samāropanāya bhūmi

original: Pañcānisaṁsā sotānugatānaṁ dhammānaṁ yāva diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṁ suttaṁ vitthārena kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: pañcānisasā sotānugatānam dhammānam yāva diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānam suttam vitthārena kātabba

original: Yuñjato ghaṭentassa vāyamato gilāno maraṇakāle devabhūto paccekabodhiṁ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yuñjataḥ ghaṭentassa vā āyamataḥ gilānaḥ maraṇa kāle deva bhūtaḥ pacceka bodhim pāpuṇāti

original: Sotānugatāti saddhammassavanena kataṁ hoti.
analyzed: sotā anugatā ati saddhamma ssavanena katam hoti

original: Na ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāya tassa cittaṁ tasitaṁ hoti, na ca anibbiddhattaṁ,
analyzed: na ca adhipaññā dhamma vipassanāya tassa cittam tasitam hoti na ca

original: idaṁ ca suttaṁ pañcannaṁ puggalānaṁ desitaṁ, saddhānusārino mudindriyassa tikkhindriyassa
analyzed: idam ca suttam pañcannam puggalānam desita saddhā anusārinaḥ mud indriyassa tikkhindriyassa

original: ca dhammānusārino tikkhindriyassa mudindriyassa ca.
analyzed: ca dhamma anusārino tikkha indriyassa mudindriyassa ca

original: Yo pana mohacarito puggalo na sakkoti yuñjituṁ ghaṭituṁ vāyamituṁ yathābhūtaṁ yathāsamādhikā vimutti taṁ khaṇaṁ taṁ layaṁ taṁ muhuttaṁ phalaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana moha caritaḥ puggalaḥ na sakkoti yuñjitum ghaṭitum vā āyamitum yathābhūtam yathā samādhikā vimutti tam khaṇam tam layam tam muhuttam phalam dasseti

original: Sādhu parihāyati paro taṁ duyhati, no tu sukhaavipākinī bhavati.
analyzed: sādhu parihāyati paras tam duyhati no tu sukha avipākinī bhavati

original: Tassa diṭṭheyeva ca dhamme upapajjaaparāpariyavedanīyaṁ.
analyzed: tassa diṭṭheya iva ca dhamme

original: Tattha yo puggalo dhammānusārī tassa yadi sotānugatā dhammā honti so yuñjanto pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: tattha yaḥ puggalaḥ dhamma anusārī tassa yadi sota anugatāḥ dhammāḥ honti saḥ yuñjantaḥ pāpuṇāti

original: Yo dhammānusārī mudindriyo, so gilāno pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yaḥ dhamma anusārī mud indriyo so gilānaḥ pāpuṇāti

original: Yo saddhānusārī tikkhindriyo, so maraṇakālasamaye pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yaḥ saddhā anusārī tikkha indriyaḥ saḥ maraṇa kāla samaye pāpuṇāti

original: Yo mudindriyo, so devabhūto pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yaḥ mud indriyaḥ saḥ deva bhūtaḥ pāpuṇāti

original: Yadā devabhūto na pāpuṇāti, na so teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā paccekabodhiṁ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yadā deva bhūtaḥ na pāpuṇāti na saḥ tena iva dhamma rāgena tāya dhamma nandiyā pacceka bodhim pāpuṇāti

original: Yo sotānugatesu yuñjati ghaṭeti vāyamati, so pubbāpannena visesaṁ sañjānāti, sañjānanto pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: yaḥ sota anugatesu yuñjati ghaṭeti vā āyamati so pubba āpannena visesam sañjānāti sañjānantaḥ pāpuṇāti

original: Sace pana gilānassa manasikāro hoti, tattha yuñjanto pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: sace pana gilānassa manasikāraḥ hoti tattha yuñjantaḥ pāpuṇāti

original: Sace panassa maraṇakāle saṁviggo hoti, tattha yuñjanto pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: sace panassa maraṇa kāle sa viggaḥ hoti tattha yuñjantaḥ pāpuṇāti

original: Sace pana na katthaci saṁvego hoti, tassa devabhūtassa sukhino dhammabhūtā pādā evaṁ avilapati.
analyzed: sace pana na katthaci sa vegaḥ hoti tassa deva bhūtassa sukhinaḥ dhamma bhūtā pādāḥ evam a vilapati

original: So evaṁ jānāti “ayaṁ so dhammavinayo yattha mayaṁ pubbe manussabhūtā brahmacariyaṁ carimhā”ti.
analyzed: saḥ evam jānāti ayam saḥ dhamma vinayaḥ yattha mayam pubbe manussa bhūtāḥ brahmacariyam carimha ati

original: Atha devabhūto pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: atha deva bhūtaḥ pāpuṇāti

original: Dibbesu vā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ajjhosito hoti pamādavihārī, so tena kusalamūlena paccekabodhiṁ pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: dibbesu vā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ajjhositaḥ hoti pamāda vihārī saḥ tena kusala mūlena pacceka bodhim pāpuṇāti

original: Yā paratoghosena vacasā suparicitā, ayaṁ sutamayī paññā.
analyzed: yā paratoghosena vacasā su paricitā ayam suta mayī paññā

original: Ye pana dhammā honti manasā anupekkhitā, ayaṁ cintāmayī paññā.
analyzed: ye pana dhammā honti manasā an upekkhitāḥ ayam cintā mayī paññā

original: Yaṁ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā, ayaṁ bhāvanāmayī paññā.
analyzed: yam diṭṭhiyā su paṭividdhā ayam bhāvanā mayī paññā

original: Yaṁ sotānugatā vacasā paricitā honti, so ca diṭṭheyeva dhamme parinibbāyī, ayaṁ arahaṁ puggalo.
analyzed: yam sota anugatāḥ vacasā paricitāḥ honti so ca diṭṭheya iva dhamme parinibbāyī ayam araham puggalo

original: Yo upapajjati devabhūto pāpuṇāti, tattha ca parinibbāyati, ayaṁ anāgāmī.
analyzed: yaḥ upapajjati deva bhūtaḥ pāpuṇāti tattha ca parinibbāyati ayam anāgāmī

original: Yo tena kusalamūlena paccekabodhiṁ pāpuṇāti, ayaṁ pubbayogasambhārasambhūto puggalo.
analyzed: yaḥ tena kusala mūlena pacceka bodhim pāpuṇāti ayam pubba yoga sambhāra sambhūtaḥ puggalo

original: Sotānugatā dhammāti paṭhamaṁ vimuttāyatanaṁ, vacasā paricitāti dutiyaṁ tatiyañca
analyzed: paṭhamam vacasā paricitā ati dutiyam tatiyam ca

original: vimuttāyatanaṁ, manasā anupekkhitāti catutthaṁ vimuttāyatanaṁ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti
analyzed: vimutta āyatana manasā anupekkhitā ati catuttham vimutta āyatanam diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā ti

original: pañcamaṁ vimuttāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: pañcamam vimutta āyatana

original: Sotānugatāya vimuttiyā vacasā yā vācā suppaṭividdhā anupubbadhammassa sotena sutvā
analyzed: sota anugatāya vimuttiyā vacasā yā vācā su paṭividdhā anupubba dhammassa sotena sutvā

original: sīlakkhandhe paripūreti, manasā anupekkhitā samādhikkhandhaṁ paripūreti, diṭṭhiyā
analyzed: sīla kkhandhe paripūreti manasā anupekkhitā samādhi kkhandham paripūreti diṭṭhiyā

original: suppaṭividdhā paññākkhandhaṁ paripūreti.
analyzed: su paṭividdhā paññā kkhandham paripūreti

original: Sotānugatā dhammā bahussutā hontīti vitthārena kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: sotā anugatāḥ dhammāḥ bahu ssutāḥ honti iti vitthārena kātabba

original: Idaṁ paṭhamaṁ saddhāpadānaṁ manasā anupekkhitāti paṭisallānabahulo viharati, vitthārena kātabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam paṭhamam saddhā apadānam manasā anupekkhitā ati paṭisallāna bahulaḥ viharati vitthārena kātabba

original: Idaṁ dutiyaṁ saddhāpadānaṁ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti anāsavā cetovimuttiyā nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānātīti.
analyzed: idam dutiyam saddhā apadānam diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā ati anāsavā cetaḥ vimuttiyā na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti iti

original: Idaṁ tatiyaṁ saddhāpadānaṁ.
analyzed: idam tatiyam saddhā apadāna

original: Sotānugatā dhammāti sekkhaṁ satthā dasseti.
analyzed: sota anugatāḥ dhammā ati sekkham satthā dasseti

original: Manasā anupekkhitāti arahattaṁ satthā dasseti.
analyzed: manasā anupekkhitā ti arahattam satthā dasseti

original: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti tathāgataṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ satthā dasseti.
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā iti tathāgatam arahantam sammāsambuddham satthā dasseti

original: Sotānugatā dhammāti kāmānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: sotā anugatāḥ dhammā ti kāmānam nissaraṇam dasseti

original: Manasā anupekkhitāti rūpadhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: manasā anupekkhitā iti rūpadhātuyāḥ nissaraṇam dasseti

original: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti tedhātukānaṁ nissaraṇaṁ dasseti.
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā ati tedhātukānam nissaraṇam dasseti

original: Ayaṁ suttattho.
analyzed: ayam suttattho

original: Tattha katamo desanāhāro?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ desanā āhāro

original: Imamhi sutte tayo esanā desitā sotānugatehi dhammehi vacasā paricitehi kāmesanāya samathamaggo.
analyzed: imamhi sutte tayo esanā desitā sota anugatehi dhammehi vacasā paricitehi kāma esanāya samatha maggo

original: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhehi brahmacariyesanāya samathamaggo.
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā su paṭividdhehi brahmacariya īsanāya samatha maggo

original: Vicayoti yathā suttaṁ manasikaronto vicinanto sutamayipaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: vicayaḥ ti yathā suttam manasikarontaḥ vicinantaḥ suta mayi paññam paṭilabhati

original: Yathā ca so manasikarotīti yathā sutadhammā tadā cintāmayipaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: yathā ca saḥ manasikaroti iti yathā sutadhammā tadā cintāmayi paññam paṭilabhati

original: Yathā diṭṭheva dhamme manasikaroti tadā bhāvanāmayipaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: yathā diṭṭhe iva dhamme manasikaroti tadā bhāvanā mayi paññam paṭilabhati

original: Ayaṁ vicayo.
analyzed: ayam vicayaḥ

original: Sutena sutamayipaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: sutena suta mayi paññam paṭilabhati

original: Cintāya cintāmayipaññaṁ bhāvanāya bhāvanāmayipaññaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: cintāya cintā mayi paññam bhāvanāya bhāvanā mayi paññam paṭilabhati

original: Atthi esā yutti.
analyzed: atthi esā yutti

original: Padaṭṭhānoti sotānugatā dhammāti dhammassavanassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: pada ṭṭhānaḥ ti sota anugatāḥ dhammā ti dhammassavanassa pada ṭṭhāna

original: Vacasā paricitāti yuñjanāya padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: vacasā paricitā ati yuñjanāya padaṭṭhāna

original: Manasā anupekkhitāti dhammānudhammāya vipassanāya padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: manasā an upekkhitā ati dhamma anudhammāya vipassanāya padaṭṭhāna

original: Diṭṭhiyā anupekkhitāti paññāyapi anupekkhitā diṭṭhiyāpi anupekkhitā.
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā anupekkhitā ati paññāya api anupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā api anupekkhitā

original: Catubyūhoti imamhi sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: catu byūhaḥ ti imamhi sutte bhagavataḥ kaḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Ye imāhi dvīhi paññāhi samannāgatā tehi ….
analyzed: ye imāhi dvīhi paññāhi samannāgatā tehi

original: Sa nibbutoti maggaphalaṁ anupādisesañca nibbānadhātuṁ manteti, dānena oḷārikānaṁ kilesānaṁ pahānaṁ manteti.
analyzed: sa nibbutaḥ ti magga phalam anupādisesam ca nibbāna dhātum manteti dānena oḷārikānam kilesānam pahānam manteti

original: Sīlena majjhimānaṁ, paññāya sukhumakilesānaṁ manteti, rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti katā ca bhūmi.
analyzed: sīlena paññāya sukhuma kilesānam manteti rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutā ti katā ca bhūmi

original: “Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati,
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyati”.
analyzed: sayamataḥ vā iram na cīyati

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti maggo vutto.
analyzed: kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakan ti maggaḥ vutto

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti maggaphalamāha.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti magga phalam āha

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati, saṁyamatoti tīhi padehi lokikaṁ kusalamūlaṁ vuttaṁ.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati tīhi padehi lokikam kusala mūlam vutta

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti lokuttaraṁ kusalamūlaṁ vuttaṁ.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti lokuttaram kusala mūlam

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati, saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti puthujjanabhūmiṁ manteti.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati sayamataḥ veram na cīyati iti puthujjana bhūmim manteti

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkhabhūmiṁ manteti.
analyzed: kusalaḥ ca jahāti sekkha bhūmim manteti

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti asekkhabhūmi vuttā.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti asekkha bhūmi vuttā

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati, saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti magganiyā paṭipadā vuttā.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati sayamataḥ veram na cīyati iti magganiyā paṭipadā vuttā

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkhavimutti.
analyzed: kusalaḥ ca jahāti sekkha vimutti

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti asekkhavimutti.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti asekkha vimutti

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati, saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti dānakathaṁ sīlakathaṁ maggakathaṁ lokikānaṁ dhammānaṁ desanamāha.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati sayamataḥ veram na cīyati iti dāna katham sīla katham magga katham lokikānam dhammānam desanam āha

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti loke ādīnavānupassanā.
analyzed: kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakanti loke ādīnava anupassanā

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti sāmukkaṁsikāya dhammadesanāyapi paṭividdhā.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbuto ti sāmukkasikāya dhamma desanāya api paṭividdhā

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti pāṇānaṁ abhayadānena pāṇātipātā veramaṇisattānaṁ abhayaṁ deti.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti pāṇānam abhaya dānena pāṇa atipātā veramaṇi sattānam abhayam deti

original: Evaṁ sabbāni sikkhāpadāni kātabbāni.
analyzed: evam sabbāni sikkhāpadāni kātabbāni

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti sīle patiṭṭhāya cittaṁ saṁyameti, tassa saṁyamato pāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: sayamatas veram na cīyati iti sīle patiṭṭhāya cittam sayameti tassa sayamatas pāripūrim gacchati

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti dve vimuttiyo.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti dve vimuttiyaḥ

original: Ayaṁ suttaniddeso.
analyzed: ayam sutta niddesaḥ

original: Tattha katamā desanā?
analyzed: tattha katamā desanā

original: Imamhi sutte kiṁ desitaṁ?
analyzed: imamhi sutte kim

original: Dve sugatiyo devā ca manussā ca, dibbā ca pañcakāmaguṇā, mānussakā ca.
analyzed: dve sugatiyaḥ devā ca manussā ca dibbā ca pañca kāmaguṇā mānussakā ca

original: Dvīhi padehi niddeso.
analyzed: dvīhi padehi niddesaḥ

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati, saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyati, kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti maggo vutto.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati sayamataḥ veram na cīyati kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakanti maggaḥ vutto

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti dve nibbānadhātuyo desitā sopādisesā ca anupādisesā ca.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti dve nibbāna dhātuyaḥ desitā sopādisesā ca anupādisesā ca

original: Ayaṁ desanā.
analyzed: ayam desanā

original: Vicayoti dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti iminā paṭhamena padena dānamayikapuññakiriyavatthu vuttaṁ.
analyzed: vicayo ti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti iminā paṭhamena padena dāna mayika puñña kiriya vatthu vutta

original: Tenassa ānantariyānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ.
analyzed: tena assa ānantariyānam kusalānam dhammāna

original: Dutiyena padena … yanti, niyyānikaṁ sāsananti, ayaṁ adhippāyo.
analyzed: dutiyena padena yanti niyyānikam sāsananti ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: Assavanena ca amanasikārena ca appaṭivedhena ca sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā vuttā.
analyzed: assavanena ca amanasikārena ca appaṭivedhena ca sakkāya samudaya gāminī paṭipadā vuttā

original: Savanena ca manasikārena ca paṭivedhena ca sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā vuttā.
analyzed: savanena ca manasikārena ca paṭivedhena ca sakkāya nirodha gāminī paṭipadā vuttā

original: Ayaṁ āvaṭṭo.
analyzed: ayam āvaṭṭaḥ

original: Vibhattīti ekaṁsabyākaraṇīyo.
analyzed: vibhatti iti

original: Natthi tattha vibhattiyā bhūmi.
analyzed: na atthi tattha vibhattiyā bhūmi

original: Parivattanāti ye pañcānisaṁsā, te pañcādinā paṭipakkhena teneva diṭṭheva dhamme pāpuṇāti, taṁ upapajjamānā aparo pariyāyo.
analyzed: ye pañcānisasā te pañca ādinā paṭipakkhena tena iva diṭṭhe iva dhamme pāpuṇāti tam upapajjamānā aparaḥ pariyāyo

original: Vevacananti sotānugatā dhammāti yaṁ suttaṁ diṭṭhampi paññindriyaṁ viññattampi diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhampi vibhāvitampi.
analyzed: sota anugatāḥ dhammā ti yam suttam diṭṭham pi paññindriyam viññattam pi diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdham pi vibhāvitam pi

original: Paññattīti sotānugatādhammāti desanā avijjāpaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: paññatti iti sotānugatā adhammā ati desanā avijjā paññattiyā paññatta

original: Manasikāro pāmojjapaññattiyā paññatto, diṭṭhadhammāpi ānisaṁsapaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: manasikāraḥ pāmojja paññattiyā paññatto diṭṭhadhammā api ānisasa paññattiyā paññattā

original: Otaraṇoti tisso paññā vacasā paricitesu sutamayī paññā manasā anupekkhitesu cintāmayī paññā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāsu bhāvanāmayī paññā.
analyzed: tisso paññā vacasā paricitesu suta mayī paññā manasā anupekkhitesu cintā mayī paññā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāsu bhāvanā mayī paññā

original: Imāni ariyasaccāni indriyāni vijjuppādā avijjānirodho paṭiccasamuppādo indriyesu tīṇi indriyāni, āyatanesu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā dhātūsu dhammadhātupariyāpannāti.
analyzed: imāni ariya saccāni indriyāni vijjuppādāḥ avijjā nirodho paṭiccasamuppādo indriyesu tīṇi indriyāni āyatanesu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā dhātūsu dhamma dhātu pariyāpannā ati

original: Sodhanoti yo ārambho suttassa paveso niyutto.
analyzed: sodhanaḥ ti yaḥ ārambho suttassa pavesaḥ niyuttaḥ

original: Adhiṭṭhānoti pañcānisaṁsāti vemattatāya paññattā ānisaṁsā sotā anugatāti vemattatāya ariyavohāro paññatto, dhamme ca savananti ekattatāya paññattaṁ.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāno ti pañca anisasā ati vemattatāya paññattā ānisasā sotā anugatā ati vemattatāya ariya vohāro paññatto dhamme ca savanam ti ekattatāya paññatta

original: Parikkhāroti dhammassavanassa payirupāsanā paccayo, saddhā hetu.
analyzed: parikkhāro ti dhammassavanassa payirupāsanā paccayaḥ saddhā hetu

original: Manasā anupekkhitāti atthappaṭisaṁveditā paccayo, dhammappaṭisaṁveditā hetu, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti saddhammassavanañca manasikāro ca paccayo, sutamayī cintāmayī paññā hetu.
analyzed: manasā anupekkhitā ati attha paṭisaveditā paccayaḥ dhamma paṭisaveditā hetu diṭṭhiyā su paṭividdhā ati saddhamma ssavanañca manasikāro ca paccayo suta mayī cintā mayī paññā hetu

original: Samāropanoti vibhattaṁ suttaṁ aparo pariyāyo nibbatti bale natthi.
analyzed: samāropanaḥ ti vibhattam suttam aparaḥ pariyāyaḥ nibbatti bale natthi

original: Tattha samāropanāya bhūmi.
analyzed: samāropanāya bhūmi

original: Tattha katamaṁ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṁ?
analyzed: tattha katamam vāsanā bhāgiyam ca nibbedha bhāgiyam ca sutta

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti gāthā.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti gāthā

original: Dadatoti dānamayikapuññakiriyavatthu vuttaṁ.
analyzed: dadato ti dāna mayika puñña kiriya vatthu

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti sīlamayikapuññakiriyavatthu vuttaṁ.
analyzed: sayamatas veram na cīyati iti sīla mayika puñña kiriya vatthu

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byāpādassa ca pahānamāha.
analyzed: kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byāpādassa ca pahānam āha

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byāpādassa ca chandarāgavinayamāhāti.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byāpādassa ca chanda rāga vinayam āha ati

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti gāthā alobho kusalamūlaṁ bhavati.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti gāthā alobhaḥ kusala mūlam bhavati

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti adoso kusalamūlaṁ bhavati.
analyzed: sayamataḥ veram na cīyati iti adosaḥ kusala mūlam bhavati

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti averā asapattā abyāpādatāya sadā.
analyzed: sayamataḥ veram na cīyati iti a verāḥ a sapattāḥ a byāpāda tāya sadā

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti ñāṇuppādā aññāṇanirodho.
analyzed: kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti ñāṇa uppādāḥ aññāṇa nirodho

original: Catutthapadena rāgadosamohakkhayena rāgavirāgā cetovimuttimohakkhayena avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti, ayaṁ vicayo.
analyzed: catuttha padena rāga dosa moha kkhayena rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti moha kkhayena avijjā virāgā paññā vimutti ayam vicayo

original: Yuttīti dāne ṭhito ubhayaṁ hi paripūreti.
analyzed: yutti iti dāne ṭhitaḥ ubhayam hi paripūra iti

original: Macchariyañca pajahati.
analyzed: mat śariyam ca pajahati

original: Puññañca pavaḍḍhati.
analyzed: puññañca pavaḍḍhati

original: Atthi esā yutti.
analyzed: atthi esā yutti

original: Padaṭṭhānanti dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti cāgādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam ti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti cāga adhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti paññādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti saccādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: sayamatas veram na cīyati iti paññā adhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānam kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sacca adhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānam

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti upasamādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti upasamādhi ṭhānassa padaṭṭhāna

original: Ayaṁ padaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: ayam padaṭṭhānaḥ

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo?
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇo

original: Dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyati.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati sayamataḥ veram na cīyati

original: Dadatopi veraṁ na kariyāti kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṁ rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbuto
analyzed: dadataḥ api veram na kariyāti kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakam rāga dosa moha khayā sa nibbutaḥ

original: rūpakkhayāpi vedanakkhayāpi, yena rūpena diṭṭhaṁ, tena tathāgato paññapento paññapeyya
analyzed: rūpa kkhayā api vedanā kkhayā api yena rūpena diṭṭha tena tathāgataḥ paññapentaḥ paññapeyya

original: rūpassa khayā virāganirodhāti evaṁ pañcakkhandhā.
analyzed: rūpassa khayā virāga nirodhā ti evam pañca kkhandhā

original: Catubyūho idha bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
analyzed: catu byūhaḥ idha bhagavato kaḥ adhippāyo

original: Ye mahābhogānaṁ patthayissanti?
analyzed: ye mahā bhogānam patthayissanti

original: Te dānaṁ dassanti parissayapahānāya, ye averābhichandakā, te pañca verāni pajahissanti, ye kusalābhichandakā, te aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvessanti aṭṭhannaṁ micchattānaṁ pahānāya.
analyzed: te dānam dassanti parissaya pahānāya ye a vera abhichandakā te pañca verāni pajahissanti ye kusala abhichandakā te aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessanti aṭṭhannam micchattānam pahānāya

original: Ye nibbāyitukāmā, te rāgadosamohaṁ pajahissantīti ayaṁ bhagavato adhippāyo.
analyzed: ye nibbāyitu kāmā te rāga dosa moham pajahissanti iti ayam bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ

original: Āvaṭṭoti yañca adadato macchariyaṁ yañca asaṁyamato veraṁ yañca akusalassa pāpassa appahānaṁ, ayaṁ dukkhaniddeso na samudayo.
analyzed: yat ca a dadataḥ macchariyam yat ca a sayamataḥ veram yat ca akusalassa pāpassa appahāna ayam dukkha niddesaḥ na samudayaḥ

original: Alobhena ca adosena ca amohena ca kusalena imāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni.
analyzed: alobhena ca adosena ca amohena ca kusalena imāni tīṇi kusala mūlāni

original: Tesaṁ paccayo aṭṭha sammattāni, ayaṁ maggo.
analyzed: tesam paccayaḥ aṭṭha sammattāni ayam maggo

original: Tesaṁ rāgadosamohānaṁ khayā, ayaṁ nirodho.
analyzed: tesam rāga dosa mohānam khayā ayam nirodhaḥ

original: Vibhattīti dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti na ekaṁsena yo rājadaṇḍabhayena deti, yo ca
analyzed: vibhatti iti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti naḥ eka sena yaḥ rāja daṇḍa bhayena deti yaḥ ca

original: akappiyassa paribhogena sīlavantesu deti, na tassa puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti so cetaṁ dānaṁ
analyzed: akappiyassa paribhogena sīlavantesu deti na tassa puññam pavaḍḍhati iti saḥ ca itam dāna

original: akusalena deti, daṇḍadānaṁ satthadānaṁ apuññamayaṁ pavaḍḍhati, na puññaṁ.
analyzed: akusalena deti daṇḍa dānam sattha dānam apuñña mayam pavaḍḍhati na puñña

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti na ekaṁsena kiṅkāraṇaṁ yañca yo padaṁ diṭṭhadhammikaṁ passati yadi mama rājāno gahetvā hatthaṁ vā chindeyya …pe…
analyzed: sayamatas veram na cīyati iti na ekasena kiṅkāraṇam yat ca yaḥ padam diṭṭhadhammikam passati yadi mama rājānaḥ gahetvā hattham vā chindeyya pe

original: na tena saṁyamena veraṁ na karoti.
analyzed: na tena sayamena veram na karoti

original: Yo tu evaṁ samādiyati pāṇātipātassa pāpako vipākoti, diṭṭhe yeva dhamme abhisamparāye ca evaṁ sabbassa akusalassa hetuto ārati.
analyzed: yaḥ tu evam samādiyati pāṇātipātassa pāpakaḥ vipākaḥ ti diṭṭhe yeva dhamme abhisamparāye ca evam sabbassa akusalassa hetutaḥ ārati

original: Iminā saṁyamena veraṁ na cīyati.
analyzed: iminā sayamena veram na cīyati

original: Parivattanāti dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti adadato puññaṁ na pavaḍḍhati.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti a dadataḥ puññam na pavaḍḍhati

original: Yaṁ dānamayaṁ, taṁ saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyati, asaṁyamato veraṁ karīyati.
analyzed: yam dāna maya tam sayamataḥ veram na cīyati a sayamataḥ veram karīyati

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṁ akusalo na jahāti.
analyzed: kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakam akusalaḥ na jahāti

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sanibbutoti dūtaṁ pesetvā paṇītaṁ pesetvāpi na pakkosāmi, so sayameva
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti dūtam pesetvā paṇītam pesetvā api na pakkosāmi saḥ sayam eva

original: pana mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro amhākaṁ vasanaṭṭhānaṁ sampatto amhehi ca santhāgārasālā
analyzed: pana mahā bhikkhu saṅgha parivāraḥ amhākam vasanaṭṭhānam sampattaḥ amhehi ca santhā āgāra sālā

original: kāritā, ettha mayaṁ dasabalaṁ ānetvā maṅgalaṁ bhaṇāpemāti cintetvā upasaṅkamiṁsu.
analyzed: kāritāḥ ettha mayam dasabalam ānetvā maṅgalam cintetvā upasaṅkamisu

original: Yena santhāgāraṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsūti taṁ divasaṁ kira santhāgāre cittakammaṁ niṭṭhāpetvā aṭṭakā muttamattā honti.
analyzed: yena santhāgāram tena upasaṅkamisu iti tam divasam kira santhāgāre citta kammam niṭṭhāpetvā aṭṭakāḥ mutta mattāḥ honti

original: Buddhā nāma araññajjhāsayā araññārāmā antogāme vaseyyuṁ vā no vāti tasmā bhagavato manaṁ jānitvāva paṭijaggissāmāti cintetvā te bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamiṁsu.
analyzed: buddhāḥ nāma arañña ajjhāsayā arañña ārāmāḥ antogāme vaseyyum vā no vā ati tasmai bhagavataḥ manam jānitvā ava paṭijaggissāma ati cintetvā te bhagavantam upasaṅkamisu

original: Idāni pana manaṁ labhitvā paṭijaggitukāmā yena santhāgāraṁ, tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
analyzed: idāni pana manam labhitvā paṭijaggitu kāmāḥ yena tena upasaṅkamisu

original: Sabbasantharinti yathā sabbaṁ santhataṁ hoti evaṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsūti.
analyzed: sabba santharin ti yathā sabbam santhatam hoti evam yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu iti

original: Ettha pana te mallarājāno santhāgāraṁ paṭijaggitvā nagaravīthiyopi sammajjāpetvā
analyzed: ettha pana te malla rājānaḥ santhāgāram paṭijaggitvā nagara vīthiyaḥ api

original: dhaje ussāpetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭikadaliyo ca ṭhapāpetvā sakalanagaraṁ dīpamālāhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṁ
analyzed: dhaje ussāpetvā suvaṇṇa ghaṭika daliyaḥ ca ṭhapāpetvā sakala nagaram dīpa mālāhi vippakiṇṇa tāraka

original: viya katvā khīrapake dārake khīraṁ pāyetha, dahare kumāre lahuṁ lahuṁ bhojāpetvā
analyzed: katvā khīrapake dārake khīram pāyetha dahare kumāre lahum lahum bhojāpetvā

original: sayāpetha, uccāsaddaṁ mākari, ajja ekarattiṁ satthā antogāmeva vasissati, buddhā
analyzed: uccāsaddam mā akari ajja eka rattim satthā antogāmā iva vasissati buddhā

original: nāma appasaddakāmā hontīti bheriṁ carāpetvā sayaṁ daṇḍakadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
analyzed: nāma appasadda kāmāḥ honti iti bherim carāpetvā sayam daṇḍaka dīpikāḥ ādāya yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: Bhagavantaṁyeva purakkhatvāti bhagavantaṁ purato katvā, tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno ativiya virocati.
analyzed: bhagavantayā iva purakkhatvā iti bhagavantam puratas katvā tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnam ca iva upāsakānam ca majjhe nisinnaḥ ativiya virocati

original: Samantapāsādiko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo abhirūpo dassanīyo puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṁ ṭhānaṁ gaṇhāti.
analyzed: samantapāsādikaḥ suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ abhirūpaḥ dassanīyaḥ puratthima kāyataḥ suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā gagana tale asīti hattham ṭhānam gaṇhāti

original: Pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇahatthato vāmahatthato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā heṭṭhā pādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇarasmi
analyzed: pacchima kāyataḥ dakkhiṇa hatthataḥ vāma hatthataḥ suvaṇṇa vaṇṇā heṭṭhā pāda talehi

original: uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṁ asītihatthaṁ ṭhānaṁ gaṇhāti, evaṁ samantā asītihatthamattaṁ
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvā ghana pathaviyam asīti hattham ṭhānam gaṇhāti evam samantā asīti hattha matta

original: ṭhānaṁ chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vitaṇḍamānā vidhāvanti, sabbe disābhāgā
analyzed: ṭhānam chabbaṇṇa buddha rasmiyaḥ vijjotamānāḥ vitaṇḍamānāḥ vidhāvanti sabbe disābhāgā

original: suvaṇṇacampakapupphehi vikiriyamānā viya suvaṇṇaghaṭato nikkhantasuvaṇṇarasadhārāhi
analyzed: suvaṇṇa campaka pupphehi vikiriyamānā viya suvaṇṇa ghaṭataḥ nikkhanta suvaṇṇa rasa dhārāhi

original: siñcamānā viya pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭaparikkhittā viya verambhavātasamuṭṭhitakiṁsukakiṁsukārakaṇikārapupphacuṇṇasamokiṇṇā
analyzed: siñcamānā viya pasārita suvaṇṇa paṭa parikkhittā viya verambha vāta samuṭṭhita kisuka kisukāra kaṇikāra puppha cuṇṇa samokiṇṇā

original: viya vippakasantaṁ asītianubyañjanabyāmappabhā dvattiṁsavaralakkhaṇasamujjalaṁ sarīraṁ
analyzed: viya vippakasantam sarīra

original: samuggatatārakaṁ viya gaganatalaṁ vikasitamiva padumavanaṁ sabbaphāliphullo viya
analyzed: samuggata tārakam viya gagana talam vikasitam iva paduma vanam sabba phāli phullaḥ viya

original: yojanasatiko pāricchattako paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitānaṁ dvattiṁsacandānaṁ dvattiṁsasūriyānaṁ
analyzed: pāricchattako paṭipāṭiyā

original: dvattiṁsacakkavattīnaṁ dvattiṁsadevarājānaṁ dvattiṁsamahābrahmānaṁ nibbuto asekkhassa natthi nibbuti.
analyzed: dvattisa cakkavattīnam dvattisa devarājānam dvattisa mahābrahmānam nibbutaḥ asekkhassa natthi nibbuti

original: Vevacananti dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati, anumodatopi puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati anumodataḥ api puññam pavaḍḍhati

original: Cittassa samādahatopi veyyāvaccakiriyāyapi puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti.
analyzed: cittassa samādahataḥ api puññam pavaḍḍhati iti

original: Paññattīti dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati, alobhassa paṭinissayaghātapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: paññattī iti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati alobhassa paṭinissaya ghāta paññattiyā paññatta

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti adosassa paṭinissayaghātapaññattiyā paññattaṁ kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti amohassa paṭinissayaghātapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: sayamatas veram na cīyati iti adosassa paṭinissaya ghāta paññattiyā paññattam kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti amohassa paṭinissaya ghāta paññattiyā paññatta

original: Otaraṇoti pañcasu indriyesu dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhati, saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyati saṁyamena sīlakkhandho.
analyzed: pañcasu indriyesu dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati sayamataḥ veram na cīyati sayamena sīlakkhandho

original: Otiṇṇo chasu indriyesu saṁvaro, ayaṁ samādhikkhandho, yaṁ kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṁ, ayaṁ paññākkhandho, rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti vimuttikkhandho.
analyzed: otiṇṇaḥ chasu indriyesu savaraḥ ayam samādhi kkhandho yam kusalo ca jahāti ayam paññā kkhandho rāga dosa moha khayā sa nibbutaḥ ti vimutti kkhandho

original: Dhātūsu dhammadhātu, āyatanesu manāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: dhātūsu dhammadhātu āyatanesu manāyatana

original: Sodhanoti yenārambhena idaṁ suttaṁ desitaṁ so ārambho suddho.
analyzed: yena ārambhena idam suttam desitam saḥ ārambho suddho

original: Adhiṭṭhāno dānanti ekattatāya paññattaṁ.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhānaḥ dānam ti ekatta tāya paññatta

original: Cāgo pariccāgo dhammadānaṁ āmisadānaṁ, aṭṭha dānāni vitthārena kātabbāni, ayaṁ vemattatā.
analyzed: cāgaḥ pariccāgaḥ dhamma dānam āmisa dāna aṭṭha dānāni vitthārena kātabbāni ayam vematta tā

original: Na ca dadato ekattapaññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: na ca dadataḥ ekatta paññattiyā paññatta

original: Khantī anavajjanti paññattiyā paññattaṁ.
analyzed: khantī an avajjanti paññattiyā

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti rodhavīriyapaññattiyā paññattā.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti rodha vīriya paññattiyā paññattā

original: Parikkhāroti dānassa pāmojjaṁ paccayo, alobho hetu.
analyzed: parikkhāro ti dānassa pāmojjam paccayaḥ alobhaḥ hetu

original: Saṁyamato yoniso manasikāro hetu, pariccāgo paccayo.
analyzed: sayamataḥ yonisas manasikāraḥ hetu pariccāgaḥ paccayo

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti yathābhūtadassanaṁ paccayo, ñāṇappaṭilābho hetu.
analyzed: kusalo ca jahāti pāpakan ti yathābhūta dassanam paccayaḥ ñāṇa ppaṭilābhaḥ hetu

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti parato ca ghoso ajjhattañca yoniso manasikāro maggo ca hetu ca paccayo ca.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti paratas ca ghosaḥ ajjhattam ca yonisaḥ manasikāro maggo ca hetu ca paccayo ca

original: Samāropanoti dadato puññaṁ pavaḍḍhatīti gāthā tassa sīlampi vaḍḍhati.
analyzed: samāropanī uti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti gāthā tassa sīlam pi vaḍḍhati

original: Saṁyamopi vaḍḍhati.
analyzed: sayamaḥ upi vaḍḍhati

original: Saṁyamato veraṁ na cīyatīti.
analyzed: sayamatas veram na cīyati iti

original: Aññepi kilesā na cīyanti yepissa tappaccayā uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātā, tepissa na uppajjanti.
analyzed: aññe pi kilesāḥ na cīyanti ye pissa tad paccayāḥ uppajjeyyum āsavāḥ vighātā te pissa na uppajjanti

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti rāgadosassāpi khayā rāgānusayassapi khayā dosassa mohassāpi sa nibbutoti sopādisesā nibbānadhātu anupādisesāpi.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti rāga dosassa api khayā rāga anusayassa api khayā dosassa mohassa api sa nibbutaḥ ti sā upādisesā nibbāna dhātu anupādisesā api

original: Ayaṁ samāropano.
analyzed: ayam samāropanaḥ

original: Therassa mahākaccāyanassa peṭakopadese hārassa sampātabhūmi samattā.
analyzed: therassa mahākaccāyanassa peṭaka upadese hārassa sampāta bhūmi samattā
